1a1(brgyad stong): @#/ 'phags pa brgyad kyang bags sbyangs 'azhug /
2a1(brgyad stong): ar+ya aSh+Ta sa ha sra
2a2(brgyad stong): ka pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ bod skad
2b1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad sto
2b2(brgyad stong): pa/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
2b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang /
3a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshan
3a2(brgyad stong): lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na
3a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i
3b1(brgyad stong): ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
3b2(brgyad stong): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa
3b3(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/
3b4(brgyad stong): shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba
4a1(brgyad stong): byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bo ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa//
4a2(brgyad stong): srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par shes pas sem
4a3(brgyad stong): shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol
4a4(brgyad stong): du son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/
4b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
4b2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
4b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams te/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4b4(brgyad stong): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos
4b5(brgyad stong): shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i 'di snyam du sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di bdag rang gi
5a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi spongs pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam/
5a2(brgyad stong): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa
5a3(brgyad stong): dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i de lta bur sems
5a4(brgyad stong): kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/
5a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams gang ci smra ba dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rab tu
5b1(brgyad stong): ston pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang
5b2(brgyad stong): bstan pa'i chos ston pa de la bslabs nas de dag chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do// chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas/ gang ci
5b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rab tu ston pa de thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/
5b4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid ston pa rnams/ chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston pa'i
5b5(brgyad stong): rgyu 'thun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
5b6(brgyad stong): to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha
6a1(brgyad stong): / rol tu phyin pa brtsams te/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol
6a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa las nges par 'byong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin/ khyod spobs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
6a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba
6a4(brgyad stong): 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de/ bdag gis
6a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de dag gis
6a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang bdag
6b1(brgyad stong): gis ma 'tshal/ ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal/ ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su/
6b2(brgyad stong): ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la/ gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
6b3(brgyad stong): 'das 'on kyang gal te 'di ltar bshad cing bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi zham mi 'gong ste/ yid phyir phyog
6b4(brgyad stong): par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
6b5(brgyad stong): bstan pa lags so// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// de nyid shes rab kyi pha
6b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la gdams pa lags so// gal te de ltar gnas de nyid gdams pa dang / bstan pa lags so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang
6b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas ji ltar bslabs na/
7a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i sems des kyang / rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
7a2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan
7a3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
7a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ ci'i sems med pa gang
7a5(brgyad stong): yin pa de la yod dam med pa dmigs sam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
7a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la sems yod pa 'am/ med cing mi dmigs na/ gang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad du/
7a7(brgyad stong): sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ zhes zer na/ khyod kyis brgal ba de rung ngam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
7b1(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
7b2(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa'o// rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus
7b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar khyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la
7b4(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legaso legs so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
7b5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
7b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
7b7(brgyad stong): mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
8a1(brgyad stong): la bslab par bya/ rnal 'byor du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod
8a2(brgyad stong): pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol gyi phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya/ kun
8a3(brgyad stong): chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la
8a4(brgyad stong): slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun
8a5(brgyad stong): chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub
8a6(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir/ rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab cing rnal 'byor du bya'o//
8a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bstan te/ blan med pa yang dag par
8b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar
8b2(brgyad stong): klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
8b3(brgyad stong): chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ni/
8b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor du bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan
8b5(brgyad stong): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
8b6(brgyad stong): dpa'i ming 'di nyid bdag gis ma 'tshal/ mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
8b7(brgyad stong): shes rabakyi pha rol du phyin pa yang ma 'tshal/ mi dmigs yang dag
9a1(brgyad stong): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi
9a2(brgyad stong): mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9a3(brgyad stong): pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis byang chub
9a4(brgyad stong): dpa' zhes 'du ba dang / 'jig par bgyid pa ni bdag gis blo la bcag mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ming de yang mi gnas shing / mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/
9a5(brgyad stong): rnam par gnas pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ de ltar ming de mi gnas shing / mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/
9a6(brgyad stong): rnam par mi gnas pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
9a7(brgyad stong): ma zham/ ma 'god / yid ma sad/ yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang / dbang bar mi 'gyur zhing / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub
9a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste/
9b1(brgyad stong): mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis lags par gnas so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
9b2(brgyad stong): spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la
9b3(brgyad stong): ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gnas na/ gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/
9b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// gal te de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la gnas na//
9b5(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'du byed rnams la spyod na/ shes
9b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
9b7(brgyad stong): su rdzogs par ma gyur na/ yongs su mi bzung ba dang / yongs su bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes
9b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzugs yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
10a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// gzugs yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so// gzugs yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
10a2(brgyad stong): gzugs pa lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags
10a3(brgyad stong): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o//
10a4(brgyad stong): 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yangs pa mdun du ma bgyis pa/ tshad ma nges pa/
10a5(brgyad stong): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar bzung ba ma lags so//
10a6(brgyad stong): gal te mtshan mar bzung bar gyur na/ kun du rgyu sde can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun du rgyu bzo spyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su
10a7(brgyad stong): yid rangs shing phyogs cig pa'i ye shes kyis zhugs so// de zhags nas kyang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin te/ de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed
10a8(brgyad stong): rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa dga' ba dang / bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang na yang dag
10b1(brgyad stong): par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol na yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de
10b2(brgyad stong): de gzugs las gzhan la yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi nang dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang na
10b3(brgyad stong): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang yang dag
10b4(brgyad stong): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di las kun du rgyu bzo sbyang mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing /
10b5(brgyad stong): chos nyid tshad mar bgyid de mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo // gang bzung ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs so// /
10b6(brgyad stong): de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems su mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par
10b7(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// gzugs gang lags pa yang yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang
10b8(brgyad stong): lags pa yang yongs su mi 'dzin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
11a1(brgyad stong): brgyad rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par/ bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
11a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
11a3(brgyad stong): la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgoms pas 'di ltar brtag cing 'di ltar bsams te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang gi yin/ ci chos gang med pa dang /
11a4(brgyad stong): mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar brtags/ de ltar bsams nas/ ma zhum/ ma gong / yid mi gsod/ yi gsod par mi
11a5(brgyad stong): bgyid/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang / dngang par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
11a6(brgyad stong): dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs
11a7(brgyad stong): nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang rnam par
11a8(brgyad stong): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad
11b1(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces
11b2(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu gzugs
11b3(brgyad stong): nyid gzugs nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/
11b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan
11b5(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang
11b6(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de skad ces
11b7(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la
11b8(brgyad stong): slob par 'gyur ba de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub
12a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
12a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu chos thams cad ni ma byung ma skyes pa ste/ de ltar spyod na tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
12a3(brgyad stong): la nye ba yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin// /
12a4(brgyad stong): gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
12a5(brgyad stong): do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du spyod na/ mtshan ma la sbyong ngo // gal te gzugs 'byung ba la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'gag pa la
12a6(brgyad stong): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'jigs pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi byed na// mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam
12a7(brgyad stong): du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na/ dmigs pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
12a8(brgyad stong): gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la/
12b1(brgyad stong): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'jigs pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal
12b2(brgyad stong): te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dmigs pa la spyod do// gal te
12b3(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na mtshan ma la spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs la mi mkhas par rnyig bya'o//
12b4(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyad na/
12b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzug
12b6(brgyad stong): la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi tshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs 'byung ba la mi spyod/ gzugs 'gags pa la mi spyod / gzugs
12b7(brgyad stong): 'jigs pa la mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te
12b8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la mi spyod/
13a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa 'gag pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'jigs pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa'
13a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyod kyang spyod la mi
13a3(brgyad stong): spyod kyang mi spyod do snyam du myi 'gro/ spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin la/ mi spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin pa snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyod par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi 'gro/ spyod par mi
13a4(brgyad stong): bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par yang bya la mi spyad par yang bya'o snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin la/ mi spyad par bya ba yang ma yin pa snyam du
13a5(brgyad stong): nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rjes su nye bar ma song ba/ ma blangs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
13a6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ste/ yangs pa mdun du ma byas pa/ tshad ma nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa ste/ ting nge
13a7(brgyad stong): 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas/
13a8(brgyad stong): kyi mthus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
13b1(brgyad stong): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de ni ting nge 'dzin
13b2(brgyad stong): de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ting nge
13b3(brgyad stong): 'dzin la snyam par gzhag go// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta de la/ thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis so//
13b4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ byang
13b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/
13b6(brgyad stong): lung bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bstan du rung ngam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de la
13b7(brgyad stong): yang mi shes/ yang dag par mi shes so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
13b8(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na/ mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes/
14a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di ltar khyod sangs rgyas kyi
14a2(brgyad stong): mthus spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa le gso legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de
14a3(brgyad stong): bzhin du 'di la slab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slobs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po// de nas bcom
14a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
14a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
14a6(brgyad stong): ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
14a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa chos gang la slob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni/
14a8(brgyad stong): chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu chos de dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo ji ltar mngon par zhan pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// sha ri'i
14b1(brgyad stong): dus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on dang lta bur mchis sha ri'i bu ji ltar yod pa de bzhin te/ de ltar med pa de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la byis pa so so'i sbyoro
14b2(brgyad stong): thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la btags so// de dag gis rtags nas mtha' gnyis la zhes pas chos de dag mi mthong
14b3(brgyad stong): mi shes te/ de'i phyir chos thams cad la rtog go// rtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen te/ de'i gnyis dmigs pa gnas nas/ 'das pa'i chos la rtog go// ma 'ong
14b4(brgyad stong): pa'i chos la rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis rtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag gis/ med pa'i chos de dag thas cad la rtag so//
14b5(brgyad stong): de dag gis med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la rtags pas/ lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum na nges par mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i
14b6(brgyad stong): mtha' khong du ma chud de/ de'i phyir de dag la byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos bden pa la yid mi ches so// yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
14b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnam ni/ chos gang sa yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de skad ces paka'aphrul ba dang bcom ldan 'das la ched brjen pag ri'i thas
14b8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsor to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dalar thothon/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi
15a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mi slob ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub
15a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos thams cad la slob po// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
15a3(brgyad stong): slob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
15a4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du/ ci'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ram/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba
15a5(brgyad stong): yin nam/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'gyur ram/ zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
15a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de bas na khyod nyid la dri ba byas/ khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du ston cig ces bka'
15a7(brgyad stong): sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad/
15a8(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam/ sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de dag gzhan nam/
15b1(brgyad stong): / sgyum de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs/
15b2(brgyad stong): nyid kyang sgyum lags so// sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de dag gzhan ma lags/
15b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lag so// sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das
15b4(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la len pa'i phung po lnga la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'du shes kun shes pa btags pa tha snyad yin no//
15b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
15b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa de/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
15b7(brgyad stong): phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dag
15b8(brgyad stong): po drug dang / phung po lnga po de dag lags te/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sgyu ma lta bu'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'o// /
16a1(brgyad stong): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de yang dbang po drug dang / phung po lnga po de dag lags na/ theg pa la/
16a2(brgyad stong): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos nas/ skrag cing dngang ba dang / shin du dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das
16a3(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur na ni/ skrag cing
16a4(brgyad stong): dngangs pa dang / shin du dngangs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ mi skrag
16a5(brgyad stong): mi dngangs/ shin du dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
16a6(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang rnams lags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
16a7(brgyad stong): ston cing 'doms pa dang / gang de la bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi nyes pa 'di ni 'di dag yin/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/
16a8(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las ni 'di dag rtogs nas spangs par bya'o// zhes bdud kyi las ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos/
16b1(brgyad stong): pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
16b2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// /
16b3(brgyad stong): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces
16b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad
16b5(brgyad stong): chags pa med pa la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad ma chags pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag
16b6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi don gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol
16b7(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
16b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi rigs chen po'i gtso bo byed par gyur pas na/ de'i phyir
18a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
18a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha
18a3(brgyad stong): ri'i bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par byos shig/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu
18a4(brgyad stong): lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang
18a5(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du/ chos bstan to snyam pas na/ don de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
18a6(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan
18a7(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
18a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gang byang chub sems de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
18b1(brgyad stong): thams cad dang thun mongs ma lags pa'i sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ sems de yang ma chags/ yongs su mazin to// de'i ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
18b2(brgyad stong): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis pa/ yongs su ma zin pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de yang zag pa ma mchis shing yongs su ma zin te/
18b3(brgyad stong): sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
18b4(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir sems de la ma chags shing yongs su ma zin to// rab 'byor
18b5(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin to// sha ri'i bus sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
18b6(brgyad stong): ci sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa zhes bya ba yod dam/ dmigs
18b7(brgyad stong): sam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/
18b8(brgyad stong): med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir de skad du/ sems gang med pa'i sems de yod dam/ zhes zer/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
19a1(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar khyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa leg so leg so// de nas
19a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ sems pa de go cha chen
19a3(brgyad stong): po bgos pa/ sems pa de theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'tshal ba lags pas na/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su
19a4(brgyad stong): mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi
19a5(brgyad stong): ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
19a6(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las zla'o// bdag gis sems can grangs
19a7(brgyad stong): med pa yongs su mya ngan las zla'o// sems can de dag de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can gang yang
19a8(brgyad stong): med do snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin te/ rab 'byor dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pa'am/ sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pa'i
19b1(brgyad stong): slob ma chen pa'i bzhi mdor skye ba'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul nas/ mngon par sprul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du/
19b2(brgyad stong): sems/ de la chos gang yang bsad pa 'am/ shi ba 'am/ bshig pa 'am/ mi snang bar gyur pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
19b3(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ sems can dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa rnams yongasu mya ngan
19b4(brgyad stong): las bzlas kyang / chos gang la yang yongs su mya ngan las zlas pa'i chos gang yang med do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di lta
19b5(brgyad stong): bur bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngangs/ shin du dngas par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ go cha chen po bgos par
19b6(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/
19b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ go cha ma mchis par bgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
19b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ go cha chen po bgos pa med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
20a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// sems can gang dag gi gong du go cha bgos pa'i sems
20a2(brgyad stong): can de dag kyang ma byas pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
20a3(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcing ma
20a4(brgyad stong): grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang ma bcing ma grol ba'o// bcom
20a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcing ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du
20a6(brgyad stong): byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcing ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
20a7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcing ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
20a8(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcing ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcing ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
20b1(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings
20b2(brgyad stong): ma grol ba zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcing ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshe ba dang / 'du shes dang /
20b3(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams gang yin/ rnam par shes pa gang ma bcing ma grol ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcing ma
20b4(brgyad stong): grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin
20b5(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcing ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de skad ces
20b6(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gab po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs de gang yin
20b7(brgyad stong): pa de ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par
20b8(brgyad stong): shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i
21a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid rang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin/
21a2(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas na ma bcing ma grol ba'o// dben pas na ma bcing ma grol ba'o// ma skyes ma
21a3(brgyad stong): bcing ma grol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i go cha chen po'i go cha med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
21a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji
21a5(brgyad stong): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// go cha chen po bgos pas theg chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs/
21a6(brgyad stong): bar 'tshal ba lags/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po de gang de gang du gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po de gang nas nges par 'byung
21a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni dpag
21a8(brgyad stong): tu med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di skad du theg pa chen po gang na nges par 'byung bar
21b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ste/ sgrib pa med pa ga la ba der yang dag par zhugs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par
21b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po gang yang nges par 'byung / nges par mi 'byung nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang /
21b3(brgyad stong): gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyi ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos rnams med cing mi dmigs la/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par
21b4(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa
21b5(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na mkha' yas pa
21b6(brgyad stong): na theg pa chen po ste/ ji ltar na mkha' la sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i go skabs ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen
21b7(brgyad stong): po la yang sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i go skabs ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
21b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ong ba yang mi gda'/ 'di la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mi gda'/ de la gnas kyang ma mchiso// /
22a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa chen po la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan/
22a2(brgyad stong): 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
22a3(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor leg so legs so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin no// /
22a4(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du//
22a5(brgyad stong): gsol ba btab pas 'di yang theg pa chen pos bshad par sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
22a6(brgyad stong): 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma
22a7(brgyad stong): yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
22a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar mi mchi/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye
22b1(brgyad stong): bar mi mchi/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar mi mchi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar mi mchi zhes bgyi ba ni/ gzugs mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'/
22b2(brgyad stong): yang mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
22b3(brgyad stong): mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mi mchi ste/ 'di'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
22b4(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mi mchi ste/ de yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams na
22b5(brgyad stong): du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag
22b6(brgyad stong): par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi dmig so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs te/
22b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig chos
22b8(brgyad stong): gang gis chos gang gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi
23a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di yang ming tsam mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam ste/ ji ltar bdag ces bgyi ba 'di dag shin du mngon par ma
23a2(brgyad stong): grub pa de bzhin du/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la gang gzugs ma mchis/ mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
23a3(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams de dag gang lags shing gzung du ma mchis/ mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa
23a4(brgyad stong): de ni mngon par ma grub pa'o// gang chos rnams kyi mngon par ma grub pa de ni chos ma lags na ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas//
23a5(brgyad stong): mngon par ma grub pa gdams shing bstan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/
23a6(brgyad stong): byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmigs so// gal te de ltar bshad cing snyan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong // yi mi gsod/
23a7(brgyad stong): yi gsod par mi bgyid/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag/ mi dngangs/ shin du dngangs par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23a8(brgyad stong): 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// zhes de ltar rig
23b1(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag rab tu
23b2(brgyad stong): rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi 'gro/ gzugs la nye bar mi rig/ gzugs 'gag par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
23b3(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi 'gro/ rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su
23b4(brgyad stong): mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jigs pa gang lags pa de ni gzug
23b5(brgyad stong): ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 'jigs pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba
23b6(brgyad stong): 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar
23b7(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// /
23b8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bzhi bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis
24a1(brgyad stong): shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 'jig pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/
24a2(brgyad stong): gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su rtog so zhes de ltar chos la yongs su rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar mi 'gro
24a3(brgyad stong): gzugs la nye bar mi rig/ gzugs 'gag par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nye bar
24a4(brgyad stong): mi 'gro// rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma
24a5(brgyad stong): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// gzugs kyi 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni
24a6(brgyad stong): gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 'jig pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du/
24a7(brgyad stong): gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su rtog so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar
24a8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te// 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su
24b1(brgyad stong): ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 'jig pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di
24b2(brgyad stong): skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su rtog so// 'phags pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/
24b3(brgyad stong): bam po gnyis pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// /
24b4(brgyad stong): de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar bshad pa'i don kho bos shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byung ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub
24b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' 'byung ba med pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa ci'i phyir spyod/ sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yod pa de dag bzod par byed cing
24b6(brgyad stong): myong bar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub
24b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ gang dka' bar 'du shes pas spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
24b8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bde bar 'du shes pa nyid du byas shing / sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor
25a1(brgyad stong): 'du shes pa ma byas pa ma gtogs par sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don bya bar mi nus so// de ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag la
25a2(brgyad stong): 'du shes byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sem
25a3(brgyad stong): can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// bdag nyid kyi bar du'ang 'du shes bskyed
25a4(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang
25a5(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi btang ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi
25a6(brgyad stong): phung po dpag tu med pa las thar bar bya'o// bdag gis lus brgyar gtub kyang chung ngu na/ 'di dag la bdag gis gnod sems kyang ma bskyed do// snyam du de ltar byang
25a7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
25a8(brgyad stong): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji nas kyang bdag ni thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de ltar sems
25b1(brgyad stong): bskyed par byaste/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar skyong nga/ dka' ba'i 'du shes can masrung ba/ tshe dang ldan pa ga po/
25b2(brgyad stong): bu gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba med pa'o zhes smras pa de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba med pa'o//
25b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'byung ba med pa 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa
25b4(brgyad stong): yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub
25b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i chos rnams 'byung ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
25b6(brgyad stong): kyang 'byung ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang
25b7(brgyad stong): 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
25b8(brgyad stong): ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis chos rnams nyi tshe 'byung ba med dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i
26a1(brgyad stong): @skye bo yang 'byung ba med do// sha ri'i nus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi so so'i skye bo 'di nyid 'byung ba med dag/ 'on te so so'i skye
26a2(brgyad stong): bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
26a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byung ba med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
26a4(brgyad stong): chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba med pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa/ so so'i skye bo yang 'byung
26a5(brgyad stong): ba med pa/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes
26a6(brgyad stong): su thob pa ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ma byung ba'i chos
26a7(brgyad stong): la thob par ma byung ba 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma byung ba'i chos kyis thob pa ma byung ba thob par 'gyur ras/ 'on te byung ba'i
26a8(brgyad stong): chos kyi thob pa ma byung ba thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci ma byung ba'i chos ma byung ngam/ 'on te byung ba'i chos nyid ma byung / sha ri'i
26b1(brgyad stong): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'byung ba nyid 'byung ba med pa 'am/ 'on tem byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung /
26b2(brgyad stong): ba med pa'i chos shes smra bar mi spobs so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'byung ba med pa'i chos la smras par khyod mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis
26b3(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa nyid smras pa yin la/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa nyid spobs par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba
26b4(brgyad stong): med pa nyid spobs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos
26b5(brgyad stong): ston pa'i nang na mchog tu gzhag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang la yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las
26b6(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// /
26b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi gnas pa'i chos can rnams ni/ de dag las gang dang gang la dris pa de dang de nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
26b8(brgyad stong): chos nyid las kyang 'gal bar mi byed do// chos nyid las kyang mi mnga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro// de skad
27a1(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so//
27a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
27a3(brgyad stong): bu chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir// theg pa thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
27a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bur bshad cing bstan pa la/ nem nur mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
27a5(brgyad stong): de gnas pa 'di lta bur gnas shing / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
27a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / ma bral bar 'gyur/
27a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur na/ de yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
27a8(brgyad stong): gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
27b1(brgyad stong): byin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur te/ de ltar yin du zin kyang sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur ro//
27b2(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
27b3(brgyad stong): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu 'di legs so legs so// khyod la dris te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod pas
27b4(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can ngo bo nyid med pas/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can
27b5(brgyad stong): dngos po med pas na/ yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// sems can dben pas na/ yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sem
27b6(brgyad stong): can mngon par byang ma chub pas na/ yid la byed pa mngon par byang chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la
27b7(brgyad stong): byed pa 'di lta bu dang / gnas 'di lta bus gnas par 'dod ngo do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ spyad pa'i lar zhes bya ba rab 'byor gyis
27b8(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// / yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa
28a1(brgyad stong): gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi khri dang / lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i
28a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs pa'i rigs kyi lha'i bu khrir bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu lnga stong 'khor de
28a3(brgyad stong): nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// lha'i bu rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od ci yod pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi
28a4(brgyad stong): brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis zil gyis gnan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phag
28a5(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa 'di rnams/ 'phags pa rab 'byor las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems
28a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi man ngag dang / gdam pa dang / bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab
28a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs
28a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod la bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa de dag gis
28b1(brgyad stong): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// gang yang dag par nyid du nges par zhugs pa de ngag kyang bla na med pa
28b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bskal pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis mtshams bcas pas yang dang yang
28b3(brgyad stong): du 'khor zhing // de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang gal te de dag gis bla na med pa yang /
28b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par du dmigs
28b5(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la kho bo bar chad mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
28b6(brgyad stong): leg so legs so// gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro bar byed pa lags so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
28b7(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar drin 'azo bar bgyi/ mi
28b8(brgyad stong): bzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du/
29a1(brgyad stong): / sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas/ byang chub tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa la nyan thos gzhan dag gis/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams la gdas/
29a2(brgyad stong): shing bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sem
29a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o// rjes su bskor bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongs su bskor bar bgyi'o//
29a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su bzung ba dang / rjes su bskor ba dang / yang dag
29a5(brgyad stong): par rjes su bzung ba dang / yang dag par rjes su bskor bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas
29a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyin shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems
29a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba kho bos khyed la bshad par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
29a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gnas par bya ste/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des/ gzugs la gnas
29b1(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// brgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan
29b2(brgyad stong): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas
29b3(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'o zhes/ 'du shes so zhes/ 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
29b4(brgyad stong): du rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'o/
29b5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas so zhes
29b6(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
29b7(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// /
29b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag
30a1(brgyad stong): med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag dang / bdag med/
30a2(brgyad stong): nga'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
30a3(brgyad stong): shes pa sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa 'am/ dmigs pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
30a4(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa 'am/ dmigs pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyi rab tu phye ba'o zhes
30a5(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o/
30a6(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu che ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes
30a7(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas shes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa po zos kyang srid pa lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi
30a8(brgyad stong): bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ongs pa sbyin pa'i gnas shes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir// 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ong /
30b1(brgyad stong): bas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir
30b2(brgyad stong): phyir mi 'ong ba de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa 'di nyid du
30b3(brgyad stong): phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las mnga' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so
30b4(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las mda' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas
30b5(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
30b6(brgyad stong): 'das nas/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do// grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las zlas/ grangs su med
30b7(brgyad stong): dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas//
30b8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las mda'o zhes des 'di ltar yang dag par gnas par mi bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhug
31a1(brgyad stong): shing sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa mdzad de/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad nas/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i
31a2(brgyad stong): sems can yongs su mya ngan las zlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las mda' bas yongs su mya ngan las mda' bar 'gyur ro zhes des de ltar yang gnas par mi bya na//
31a3(brgyad stong): des ji ltar gnas par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas/
31a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji
31a5(brgyad stong): zhig la gnas/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
31a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni mi gnas pa ste/ de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la// 'dus ma
31a7(brgyad stong): byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe
31a8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
31b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas ci la yang mi gnas pa yang ma yin la/ rnam par mi gnas pa de bzhin du des de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ji lta ba de bzhin
31b2(brgyad stong): du gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ji lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa ni/ mi gnas pa'i tshul
31b3(brgyad stong): gyis legs par gnas pa yin te/ de ltar 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam
31b4(brgyad stong): du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis gang gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa'i gnod sbyin gyi tshig de dag dang gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyis brjod pa de dag sman
31b5(brgyad stong): shes par rung gi/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang ji smra zhing brjod pa dang / ston cing 'chad pa 'di ni shes par mi rung ngo snyam mo// de nas rab 'byor gyis
31b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung / shes par mi
31b7(brgyad stong): rung zhes bya ba de ni/ 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de/ cung zad kyang thos pa med rung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e
31b8(brgyad stong): ma 'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa'o// e ma ho 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ni ring ba bas
32a1(brgyad stong): ches ring du 'jug/ phra ba bas ches phra bar 'jug/ zab pas bas kyang ches rab tu 'jug ste/ ston cing 'chad do snyam mo// de nas yang
32a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag
32a3(brgyad stong): de lta bas na/ gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
32a4(brgyad stong): 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong
32a5(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par
32a6(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa na yang / bzod pa 'di la ma bsten par mi 'grub po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
32a7(brgyad stong): 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod na yang bzod pa 'di la ma bsten par mi 'grub bo// de nas yang lha'i bu de dag
32a8(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa ji lta bu dag btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
32b1(brgyad stong): gyis/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyum dang / sprul pa lta bu dag
32b2(brgyad stong): btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur/ mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lba'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
32b3(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin nam/ rmi lam lta bu yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag sems
32b4(brgyad stong): can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu/ sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar sgyu ma dang / sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
32b5(brgyad stong): de ltar rmi lam dang / sems can de dag ni gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun du zhugs pa yang sgyu ma
32b6(brgyad stong): lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
32b7(brgyad stong): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu/
32b8(brgyad stong): rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
33a1(brgyad stong): @rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmil pa lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de nas lha'i bu/
33a2(brgyad stong): de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o// /
33a3(brgyad stong): zhes zer ram/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis skyes pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las
33a4(brgyad stong): 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu zhes smra na/ chos gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam
33a5(brgyad stong): lta bu'o// zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod
33a6(brgyad stong): kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smras so// de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su byar med do// de nas
33a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa lho rings chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
33a8(brgyad stong): 'od bsrungs chen po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di
33b1(brgyad stong): la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog
33b2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom ldan pa zag pa zad pa gang yin
33b3(brgyad stong): pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ gnas brtan de
33b4(brgyad stong): dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i
33b5(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang yang ma smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma gces te/ de lta bas na ji ltar 'di la
33b6(brgyad stong): chos gang yang ma smos so// chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bcas pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang
33b7(brgyad stong): dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs
33b8(brgyad stong): 'di bstan na/ bdag gis kyang 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po
