34a1(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis/ de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to// de nas gnas brtan tshe
34a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha'i dbang po brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me
34a3(brgyad stong): tog 'di dag ni/ bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na yang yod par yang ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i
34a4(brgyad stong): dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ shing dang / gel ba dang / 'khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi/ yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang /
34a5(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
34a6(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de/ shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri shing las skyes
34a7(brgyad stong): pa yang ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/
34a8(brgyad stong): me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma yin/ shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// zhes zer na/ ke'u shi ka gang ma skyes pa ni me
34b1(brgyad stong): tog kyang ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di skadam du sems te/ e pa'o 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ste/ ming dang tshig
34b2(brgyad stong): tu btags pa yang ston la/ de dang yang 'gal bar mi byed/ de nyid gsal bar byed cing de nyid nye bar ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan
34b3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ji skad du ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub
34b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la slab par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
34b5(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la bslab par bya'o// ke'u shi
34b6(brgyad stong): ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob po// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
34b7(brgyad stong): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob bo// rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang sa 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas nyid dang thar
34b8(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa'i tshad med pa la slob po// /
35a1(brgyad stong): gang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de tshor ba
35a2(brgyad stong): la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po// gang gzugs
35a3(brgyad stong): 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa gang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel/
35a4(brgyad stong): bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/ gzugs yongs su bzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma
35a5(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob po// gang chos yongs su bzung ba dang nub par bya ba'i
35a6(brgyad stong): phyir mi slob po// chos gang yang yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i
35a7(brgyad stong): phyir mi slob bo// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
35a8(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
35b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang chos gang yang yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par
35b2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad
35b3(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
35b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos gang yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su bzung ba dang nub par
35b5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing /
35b6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
35b7(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub
35b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis le'u las btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang /
36a1(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes
36a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'chad pa 'di su'i mthu/ su'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab
36a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'chad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
36a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang 'di skad du bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa 'di su'i mthu su'i
36a5(brgyad stong): byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ ke'u shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin
36a6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
36a7(brgyad stong): pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las kyang btsal bar
36a8(brgyad stong): mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// tshor ba las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa
36b1(brgyad stong): las kyang btsal bar mi bya rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu
36b2(brgyad stong): byin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes pa yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/
36b3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de skad ces smras pa dang /
36b4(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu
36b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor
36b6(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin te/
36b7(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin
36b8(brgyad stong): pa'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs mtha' yas
37a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du chad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /
37a2(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
37a3(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi
37a4(brgyad stong): ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes mngon par chags par mi byed do// ke'u shi ka de lta
37a5(brgyad stong): bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
37a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
37a7(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang ke'u shi ka ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i
37a8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang / dbus dang / tha ma mi dmigs te/ de bas na ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
37a9(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
37b1(brgyad stong): 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'di skar chos thams cad mthara' yas mu med de/ de dag gi thog ma 'ag/ dbus sam/
37b2(brgyad stong): tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
37b3(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi thog ma 'am/ dbus sam/ tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
37b4(brgyad stong): pa'i thog ma 'am/ dbus sam/ tha ma mi dmigs te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs de lta bur 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i ba
37b5(brgyad stong): rol tu bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am/ dbus sam/ tha ma yang mi dmigs
37b6(brgyad stong): te/ de bas na 'di lta ste/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
37b7(brgyad stong): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
37b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor smras pa/ ke'u shi ka bgrang ba'i tshul lam/ bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di
38a1(brgyad stong): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'on ji ltar/
38a2(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji
38a3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems
38a4(brgyad stong): can sems can zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ ming du btags pa 'di ni blo bur du byung ba'o// ming du
38a5(brgyad stong): btags pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni bdag pa dang / bdag gi zhes bya ba med pa'o// 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes ming du btag
38a6(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa gang
38a7(brgyad stong): yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka ga la sems can yongs su bstan par byas pa
38a8(brgyad stong): med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ ke'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi
38b1(brgyad stong): bye ma snyed du byin gyis brlabs te/ dbyangs mtha' yas pas go bar byed pa dang / gsungs dbyangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin kyang /
38b2(brgyad stong): de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ram/ skye ba 'am/ 'gags pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags
38b3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// sems can thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ ke'u
38b4(brgyad stong): shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin pas na/ ke'u shi ka de ltar yang sems
38b5(brgyad stong): can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
38b6(brgyad stong): skye dgu'i bdag por bcas pa dang / drang srong dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod do// kye ma/ chos/ kye ma chos rnams chos
38b7(brgyad stong): kyi chos nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas/ brjod cing bstan te rab tu bshad do//
38b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems
39a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'di la gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa legs par 'dzin/
39a2(brgyad stong): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag por bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang /
39a3(brgyad stong): skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na/ mar me can gyis
39a4(brgyad stong): tshongs 'das kyi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar
39a5(brgyad stong): gyur pas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med
39a6(brgyad stong): pa na/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar shegs pa/ 'jig
39a7(brgyad stong): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// zhes nga bla na med pa yang /
39a8(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab
39b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsdud cing / rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa
39b2(brgyad stong): ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa shin du ngo mtshar to// zhes zer to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/
39b3(brgyad stong): gnyis pa'o// // bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan
39b4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus par gyur pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag der 'dus te 'khod par
39b5(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'od
39b6(brgyad stong): gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs
39b7(brgyad stong): ris dang / 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin tam/ 'chang /
39b8(brgyad stong): ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu ston na/ de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / glags lta ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//
40a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
40a2(brgyad stong): mo de yang mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang lha'i bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
40a3(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bcang ba dang / ma glags pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa dang / rab tu ma 'don
40a4(brgyad stong): pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
40a5(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/
40a6(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
40a7(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de bas mthar dgon par song yang rung / shing drung du song yang rung / khyim stong par song yang rung / lam du song
40a8(brgyad stong): yang rung / lam gol bar song yang rung / 'brog dgon par song yang rung / nye bar song yang rung / 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas de'i
40b1(brgyad stong): tshe bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
40b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung bar bya/ bskyab par bya/ sba bar bgyi'o//
40b3(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo
40b4(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la bsrung
40b5(brgyad stong): ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas 'di skad ces
40b6(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'bri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
40b7(brgyad stong): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par bgyid pa de bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
40b8(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
41a1(brgyad stong): @pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de'i tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag thob cing / yongasu
41a2(brgyad stong): 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/
41a3(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka
41a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
41a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshe 'di la yon tan
41a6(brgyad stong): gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba shin du legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
41a7(brgyad stong): gyis leg so zhes gsol nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
41a8(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka de la gang la la zhig chos 'di rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed par 'dod pa zhig byung na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang /
41b1(brgyad stong): rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed par 'dod pa de dag gis rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa gang byung zhing / skyes pa med par 'gyur/
41b2(brgyad stong): te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gis bsam pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
41b3(brgyad stong): ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
41b4(brgyad stong): chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur na/ de'i tshe rtsed pa'i gzhi 'byung zhing / skyes pa de dag med par 'gyur/ te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol
41b5(brgyad stong): bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
41b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de'i tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag
41b7(brgyad stong): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi ma g+ni zhes bya ba dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de/ der skye bo sbrul sdug
41b8(brgyad stong): pa bkres shing zas 'dod de/ zas tshol ba zhig gis/ srog chags su gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste/ sbrul bdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas/
42a1(brgyad stong): srog chags su gyur pa de'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsnyags pa dang / srog chags su gyur pa de rtsi ma gI gang na yod pa der song ste/ phyin nas
42a2(brgyad stong): 'dug pa dang / de nas sbrul bdug pa de rtsi de'i dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ltar sbrul gyis bdug pa zil gyis non pa de rtsi ma g+hi de'i
42a3(brgyad stong): yon tan de yon te/ ke'u shi ka rtsi ma gI de ni 'di ltar mthu che'o// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
42a4(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la ni ke'u shi ka rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang / 'gal bar byed pa gang
42a5(brgyad stong): dang gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang mthus de dag med par 'gyur te/ nye bar zhi zhing nub par 'gyur te/ de gang
42a6(brgyad stong): dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du nub par 'gyur zhing / 'gags te 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
42a7(brgyad stong): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
42a8(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la bsrungs pa dang / skyab pa dang / snga bar byed de/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yang yon tan de dag
42b1(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
42b2(brgyad stong): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de'i tshig gzung bar 'gyur/ tshig ran par 'gyur/ tshig 'khyal pa med par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i zil gyis non par
42b3(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dul bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha
42b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgyur te/ khro ba 'phel bar mi byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed/ 'khon du 'dzin pa yongs su mi 'chang la/ gnod sems yongasu mi
42b5(brgyad stong): 'dzin cing / bag la nyal ba yongs su mi 'dzin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa la dran pa dang / byams pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / de 'di snyam du
42b6(brgyad stong): sems te/ gal te bdag gis gnod sems bskyed du zin na/ bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing / bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang
42b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing / 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro bo'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rigs so// de myur du dran pa rnyed par
42b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
43a1(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po
43a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
43a3(brgyad stong): po rnams yongs su dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi
43a4(brgyad stong): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed
43a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
43a6(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha don byed pa de 'thab mo g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/ g.yul gyi thog mar byung na/ de 'thab mo'i g.yul du 'jug
43a7(brgyad stong): gam/ g.yul du zhags sam/ thal te 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug pa 'di lta bu'i gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
43a8(brgyad stong): mo 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa 'am/ rab tu 'don pa 'am/ kha ton byed pa de'i srog gi bar
43b1(brgyad stong): chad du 'gyur ba/ gzhan gyis bar chad du 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byed pa srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas ma yin no// gal te de la
43b2(brgyad stong): mtshon 'phangs na/ lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o//
43b3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
43b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngag so// ke'u shi ka
43b5(brgyad stong): rigs sngags 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la gnod par bya bar yang mi sems te/ gzhan la gnod par bya bar yang mi sems/
43b6(brgyad stong): gnyis ka la gnod par bya bar yang mi sems te/ ke'u shi ka rigs sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
43b7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
43b8(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyang sngags 'di la bslab pa'i
44a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang la thob pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ mngon par du byas pa gang yang med do// de'i phyir thams cad/
44a2(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes bya ste/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
44a3(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na
44a4(brgyad stong): yod pa der/ tha na bris te glegs bam du chud par byas nas/ mchod pa byas bzhag la/ bkur sti byas te/ mi 'dzin/ mi 'chang / mi klog/ kun chub par mi byed/
44a5(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don par yang mi 'gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma togs/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//
44a6(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
44a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yug na 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i drung na 'dug pa'i mi dang mi yin pa dag gis rgyal ka bya ba dang / bsad pa 'am/
44a8(brgyad stong): gnod par byed mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ der 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
44b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems can thams cad mi 'jigs
44b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / mi mgon pa dang / mi skrag pa ston cing brjod pa de bzhin du/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'dzin pa
44b3(brgyad stong): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu ston par byed pa de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa dag gi
44b4(brgyad stong): rgyal ka bya ba 'am/ bsad pa 'am/ gnod par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis/ sa phyogs de sems can
44b5(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa byas pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / de na sems can
44b6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du byas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
44b7(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par
44b8(brgyad stong): bgyis te/ bzhags pa de la lha'i me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
45a1(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyis pa
45a2(brgyad stong): dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjod pa dang / gsol ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
45a3(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag mchod rten du nang stsal te/ yongs su 'dzin cing bcangs la/ de dag la yang de bzhin du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
45a4(brgyad stong): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa
45a5(brgyad stong): rnam pa mang po dag gis bkar stir bgyis/ bla mar bgyis/ ri mor bgyis/ mchod cing brjod de gsol na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang / bsod
45a6(brgyad stong): nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka
45a7(brgyad stong): de'i phyir 'dir khyod la dri bar bya ste/ khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
45a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ska mngon par grub pa 'di/ lam gang la bslabs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
45b1(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad
45b2(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
45b3(brgyad stong): bslabs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
45b4(brgyad stong): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsnyes so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na/ sku de lta bu
45b5(brgyad stong): bsnyes pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsres pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin
45b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thams
45b7(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin te/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis dngos po'i sku gdung 'grub
45b8(brgyad stong): pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no// de ltar
46a1(brgyad stong): chos su rab tu dbye'o//
46a2(brgyad stong): na gnas la brten gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su rab tu dbye'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung du rab tu dbye'o// dge 'dun du rab tu dbye/
46a3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gi dngos po'i sku gdung du 'grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur pas/
46a4(brgyad stong): na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing / phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / brjod
46a5(brgyad stong): par bya ba dang / gsol bar bya bar gyur pa yin no// de lta bas na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung de dag la yang mchod pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka
46a6(brgyad stong): de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / me tog
46a7(brgyad stong): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i
46a8(brgyad stong): phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bsnyen bkur byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid
46a9(brgyad stong): de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa
46b1(brgyad stong): byas par 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te/ bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar
46b2(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba dang / gsol ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag byed na/ 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams
46b3(brgyad stong): ches mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par 'gyur ba des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su mchod par
46b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang dag
46b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bkur stir mi ste mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ brjod par mi bgyid//
46b6(brgyad stong): gsal bar mi bgyid pa de dag bcom ldan 'das 'tshal bar 'gyur ram/ de ste 'tshal bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
46b7(brgyad stong): tu phrin pa 'di la/ mchod par bgyis pa de ltar don che ba dang / phan yon che ba de dag gi mi 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
46b8(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang
47a1(brgyad stong): ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dag gang dag dge 'dun la shes nas rang bstan paji snyed yod/ de skad ces
47a2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las/ gang dag
47a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa nyung ngo //
47a4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i
47a5(brgyad stong): gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la shes
47a6(brgyad stong): nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de bas ches nyung ngo // gang dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
47a7(brgyad stong): dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang
47a8(brgyad stong): chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo //
47b1(brgyad stong): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla
47b2(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa de rgyas par byas nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de bas
47b3(brgyad stong): kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47b4(brgyad stong): la spyod pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ni nyung ba des kyang ches nyu'o// /
47b5(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang dag byang
47b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
47b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
47b8(brgyad stong): nye bar ston cing / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / 'chang du 'jug pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / kun chub par byed du 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'don du 'jug pa dang / shes rab
48a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
48a2(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed du 'jug/ bla mar byed du 'jug/ ri mor
48a3(brgyad stong): byed du 'jug/ mchod du 'jug/ brjod du 'jug/ slob du 'jug pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi
48a4(brgyad stong): sems rgyas par byed cing / byang chub kyi sems rgyas par bya ste/ byang chub tu spyod pa'i sems can ni grangs med dpag tu med par yod do// ke'u shi ka sems can grangs med
48a5(brgyad stong): dpag tu med par yod do// ke'u shi ka sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i byang chub la spyod pa de dag las gal te na/ gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
48a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhen pa dang / le lo can dang /
48a7(brgyad stong): sems stobs zhan pa dang / 'du shes dman pa dang / dad pa dman pa dang / shes rab dman pa rnams kyis sgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu
48a8(brgyad stong): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rgyun mi 'chad par
48b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// bzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// rab tu 'don par bya'o// yongs su/
48b2(brgyad stong): bri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di lta bur shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
48b3(brgyad stong): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe'ang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs kyis/ bdag gis kyang de'i rjes su slob par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni bdag gis ston pa'o// snyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan
48b5(brgyad stong): las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsten par bya'o// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs
48b6(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod
48b7(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de la ji srid mtsho'i
48b8(brgyad stong): bar du/ lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
49a1(brgyad stong): @khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar/
49a2(brgyad stong): byed/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dem/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
49a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
49a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
49a5(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chud par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam
49a6(brgyad stong): par 'grel pa yid kyis rjes su rtogs pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam
49a7(brgyad stong): pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub par byas
49a8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba/ tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang //
49b1(brgyad stong): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bzar dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa
49b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// ke'u
49b3(brgyad stong): shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/
49b4(brgyad stong): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun du rin po che'i mchod rten gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang de dag ji srid mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /
49b5(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdags dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam
49b6(brgyad stong): pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs
49b7(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
49b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing
50a1(brgyad stong): mos la/ sems dang zas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i thasam pas nyan pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang / klog 'jug/
50a2(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rjes su rtog pa dang
50a3(brgyad stong): ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos
50a4(brgyad stong): yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan dgas pa bsgrub par byas par 'gyur bar/ tha na glegs bam du chud
50a5(brgyad stong): par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
50a6(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshal dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mang me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gi bkur stir byed/ bla mar bya/ ri mor byed/ mchod
50a7(brgyad stong): par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de
50a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can rnams kyis gang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de
50b1(brgyad stong): thams cad las/ sems can so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag ji srid tshe'i bar/
50b2(brgyad stong): du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor
50b3(brgyad stong): yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnams pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol
50b4(brgyad stong): bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
50b5(brgyad stong): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
50b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
50b7(brgyad stong): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / 'don du byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don
50b8(brgyad stong): rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyi yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur
51a1(brgyad stong): @cing / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bar byang chub sems
51a2(brgyad stong): dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur ba/ tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
51a3(brgyad stong): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang /
51a4(brgyad stong): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
51a5(brgyad stong): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog gi/
51a6(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las/ sems can so so nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin
51a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can re re byas te/ de dag la ji srid mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
51a8(brgyad stong): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur
51b1(brgyad stong): bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi las
51b2(brgyad stong): bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u
51b3(brgyad stong): shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed/
51b4(brgyad stong): lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la
51b5(brgyad stong): yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rjes su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyi yongs su spyod par byed cing /
51b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdag
51b7(brgyad stong): pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar/ tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
51b8(brgyad stong): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur
52a1(brgyad stong): bstir byed bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di
52a2(brgyad stong): nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyis khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis
52a3(brgyad stong): pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las/ sems can so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa
52a4(brgyad stong): ring srel gyi snying po can byed du bcug ste/ de dag la ji srid mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
52a5(brgyad stong): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/
52a6(brgyad stong): ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du
52a7(brgyad stong): bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
52a8(brgyad stong): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos las sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed
52b1(brgyad stong): na/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang /
52b2(brgyad stong): kha don du byed byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji ltar bur
52b3(brgyad stong): grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i
52b4(brgyad stong): chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags par bsgrub par byas par 'gyur bar/ tha na gleg
52b5(brgyad stong): kham du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
52b6(brgyad stong): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/
52b7(brgyad stong): ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i
52b8(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de
53a1(brgyad stong): thams cad las/ sems can de dag so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can byed
53a2(brgyad stong): du bcug ste/ de dag la ji srid mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdug
53a3(brgyad stong): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri
53a4(brgyad stong): mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams
53a5(brgyad stong): mang du bskyed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
53a6(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas
53a7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don
53a8(brgyad stong): pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ba rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rje su
53b1(brgyad stong): rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur/
53b2(brgyad stong): cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags par byas par 'gyur bar/
53b3(brgyad stong): tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag pa de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang /
53b4(brgyad stong): na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/
53b5(brgyad stong): bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyis stong chen
53b6(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can byed du bcug ste/ de dag la
53b7(brgyad stong): ji srid mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byung ba dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
53b8(brgyad stong): ngangan dag dang / khor lug tu mar po'i phreng ba dang / mtshang pa rnam pa mang ba dag gis 'akur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri sor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod
54a1(brgyad stong): #par byed/ gsol bar byed pa lta zhog gis/ ke'u shi ka gal te skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang su dag yod
54a2(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad nag par yongasu bzung ste/ snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag las kyang sems so so nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de
54a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ byed du bcug nas kyang sems can so so nas mchod rten de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/
54a4(brgyad stong): bskal pa las lhag pa'i sil snyan thams cad dang / glu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar thams cad dang / rnga dang pheg rdo ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /
54a5(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag
54a6(brgyad stong): gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ sems can de dag thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nas bya ba des/
54a7(brgyad stong): mchod rten tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag byed du bcug la/ de lta bu'i mchod rten la mchod pa dag byed du bcug na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can
54a8(brgyad stong): de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
54b1(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed/
54b2(brgyad stong): nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don byed pa
54b3(brgyad stong): dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang / ji yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par
54b4(brgyad stong): byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas/
54b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ phan gdags pa bsgrub par byas par 'gyur bar tha na glegs bam la chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la/ de la
54b6(brgyad stong): lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar
54b7(brgyad stong): me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de
54b8(brgyad stong): bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de
55a1(brgyad stong): bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang /
55a2(brgyad stong): ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / brjod par bgyid pa dang / gsol bar bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
55a3(brgyad stong): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa rnams la/ shin tu bkur stir bgyis/ bla mar bgyis pa dang /
55a4(brgyad stong): ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / brjod pa dang / gsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'di lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
55a5(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ sems can
55a6(brgyad stong): so so nas/ rin po sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can re re bgyid du stsal te/ sems can de dag so so nas mchod rten de dag thams cad la/
55a7(brgyad stong): bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'i sil sman thams cad dang / glu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar thams cad dang / rnga dang / pheg brdob pa thams cad dang / lha'i me
55a8(brgyad stong): tog dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i
55b1(brgyad stong): phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bskor bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ gsol bar bgyid pa 'am/
55b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad du rtog cing mos la/ sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/
55b3(brgyad stong): lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / gzhan
55b4(brgyad stong): dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji lta bar grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed cing //
55b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
55b6(brgyad stong): phan gdags pa bsgrub par 'gyur na/ tha na glegs bam du chud par bgyis te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des lha'i me tog dang / bdag
55b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod
55b8(brgyad stong): pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ gsol bar bgyid na/ 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du
56a1(brgyad stong): bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
56a2(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang po dpag tu med par bskyed do// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i gzhi las bsod
56a3(brgyad stong): nams grangs med pa bskyed do// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskyed do// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
56a4(brgyad stong): bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mtshungs pa med par bskyed do// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i gzhi las bsod nams gzhal du med pa bskyed do// ke'u shi ka
56a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes so// /
56a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ste/ ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
56a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
56a8(brgyad stong): chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis
56b1(brgyad stong): rjesu rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyis tshul chud par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyis tshul rgyun chad par ma gyu
56b2(brgyad stong): cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/ ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa
56b3(brgyad stong): byas par 'gyur bar/ tha na gleg bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la de lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
