111a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / 'chad pa dang / chos de la gang gis
111a6(brgyad stong): bslabs pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba dang / slob pa dang / mos pa dang / mos par 'gyur ba dang / mos par byed pa dang / gnas pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
111a7(brgyad stong): gnas par byed pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / chos de la so so skye bo gang dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang / lha dang /
111a8(brgyad stong): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lce ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gi chos de thos pa dang /
111b1(brgyad stong): thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang / thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can
111b2(brgyad stong): gang dag gis dam pa'i chos de thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang / thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa
111b3(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la/ gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa
111b4(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ btsal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rang / mchog rab
111b5(brgyad stong): gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/ gong na med pa'i rjes su yid rang bas rjes su yid rang la/ de ltar rjes su yid rang nas rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya
111b6(brgyad stong): ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes tshig 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdad
111b7(brgyad stong): par gyur cig ces/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ blta ba phyin ci log
111b8(brgyad stong): tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du chos de dag ni zad cing 'gags te/ med par gyur pa rnam par gyur pa ste/ chos de ni mi zad pa'o snyam du sems
112a1(brgyad stong): shing de la yongs su bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// yang gal te 'di ltar chos ni chos la
112a2(brgyad stong): yongs su mi bsngo'o// snyam du sems shing de la yongs su bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// yang gal te 'di ltar chos
112a3(brgyad stong): ni chos la yongs su mi bsngo'o snyam du sems nye bar rtog na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongs su bsngo
112a4(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin cig tu mi 'gyur/ blta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
112a5(brgyad stong): zhe na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de lta yang mngon par mi chags so// gal te 'di ltar sems te/ sems kyang sems su ma shes/ chos kyang chos su ma shes na/ de bla na med
112a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba bla na med pa'o// gal te yang byang chub sems
112a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de shes na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
112a8(brgyad stong): de ltar bsngo ba de la mngon du chags pa'i phyir ro// gal te yang 'di snyam du bsod nams mngon par 'ang byed pa yang dben pa zhi ba'o// rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
112b1(brgyad stong): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi pa'o// sum du sems pa dang / sagal te 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni dben pazhi pa'o snyam du shes ma deni byang
112b2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin
112b3(brgyad stong): pa de yang bsngo ba ci 'dra ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gis yongs su bsngo ba de yang de'i rigs can/ de'i mtshan nyid can/ de'i rigs su gtogs/
112b4(brgyad stong): pasade'i rang bzhin can no// gal te de ltar shes na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
112b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba gnang bar mi mdzad de/ gang 'das pa de ni zad pa med par gyur la/ 'gags pa rnam par gyur pa'o//
112b6(brgyad stong): gang ma 'ongs pa de'ang ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba de yang gnas pa mi dmigs te/ chos gang mi dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma yang ma yin/ yul yang ma yin no// gal
112b7(brgyad stong): te de ltar mtshan mar 'dzin cing sems na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar 'dzin na/ mi
112b8(brgyad stong): sems pa dang dran pa dang bral ba 'am/ khong du ma chud pas yid la mi byed na/ de ltar na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no//
113a1(brgyad stong): de ste mtshan ma de la mi sems shing mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par
113a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la bslab par bya'o// thabs la mkhas pas gang dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
113a3(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de las kyang rig par bya ste/ thabs mkhas pa de la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
113a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rgyun mi 'chad par mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/
113a5(brgyad stong): rab tu gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ kha don du bya/ yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi rten par thos pa dang ldan pas/ shes rab
113a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la 'jug par mi sems so// de la 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi rten kyang bsod nams bya ba'i
113a7(brgyad stong): dngos po de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngor rung po/ zhes zer na/ de la de skad ma zer cig/ ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus de
113a8(brgyad stong): dag kyang 'gags/ 'du byed de dag kyang 'gags shing dben pa dmigs pa dang bral ba yin na/ gang zag de ni mtshan mar byas te/ yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pas
113b1(brgyad stong): yang dag pa ji lta ba rnam par brtags na/ yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes pas dmigs pa dag mi dmigs pa la yongs su bsngo bar 'dod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
113b2(brgyad stong): rnams ni de lta bur yongs su bsngos pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngor gnang bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
113b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa de yang mtshan mar byed cing / rnam par rtog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang rnam pa de dag gis dmigs
113b4(brgyad stong): na/ de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis
113b5(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba don chen po byed pa'o// zhes mi gsung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa/ zug rngu dang bcas pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/
113b6(brgyad stong): kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la/ kha dog dang / ro dang dri srid par 'gyur ba zhig yin na/ dug yod pa yin pas na/ mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya
113b7(brgyad stong): ste/ yongs su longs spyod pa ma yin no// skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin ni/ de yongs su longs spyod par sems te/ des zas
113b8(brgyad stong): zos nas/ kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / mya ngan nas zhu ba'i tshe/ tshe la sdug bsngal ba/ smin par 'gyur te/ de de'i gzhi las shi ba 'am/ shi ba tsam gyis sdug bsngal
114a1(brgyad stong): du gyur pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la kha cig log par zin cing log par rig pa dang / log par kha dog byas par log par
114a2(brgyad stong): smras pa'i don mi shes shing / don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du ma chud pa dag 'di ltar 'doms shing 'di ltar ston te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sheg/ 'das pa dang /
114a3(brgyad stong): ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol
114a4(brgyad stong): ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / de dag nyid nyan thos gang dag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs
114a5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du de dag gi
114a6(brgyad stong): bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
114a7(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
114a8(brgyad stong): dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba
114b1(brgyad stong): dang / lung ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag lung ston pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed gcig sred pa dang / bskyed/
114b2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
114b3(brgyad stong): pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te bcal
114b4(brgyad stong): nas rjes su yid rang zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yang mtshan ma'i tshul gyis
114b5(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngos pas/ yang bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas dag dang bcas pa bzhin du/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba
114b6(brgyad stong): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'i/ de bas na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis/ de ltar mi bslabs kyis/ des 'di
114b7(brgyad stong): ltar bslab par bya ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bar bya ba dang
114b8(brgyad stong): ji ltar yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su bsngos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs
115a1(brgyad stong): par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de bzhin gshegs pa la
115a2(brgyad stong): bskur ba mi gdab par 'dod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/
115a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis ji ltar mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji lta ba dang / rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gar
115a4(brgyad stong): gtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du/ rjes su yid rangs te/ dge ba'i
115a5(brgyad stong): rtsa ba de yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ ji ltar gnang ba de bzhin du bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ bla na med
115a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o snyam na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bsngo na/ nyes pa med cing yang dag par
115a7(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bskur ba mi 'debs so// de ltar na de'i yongs su bsngo ba de na
115a8(brgyad stong): dug med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin/ yongs su bsngos pa chen po yin no// chos kyi dbyings su yong su bsngo ba/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//
115b1(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mos pas byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis 'di ltar tshul khrims
115b2(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa dang /
115b3(brgyad stong): ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtogs/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo
115b4(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khams gsum du mi gtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o// chos gang la yang yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de
115b5(brgyad stong): yang ma gtogs pa'o// gal te de ltar mos shing de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yongs su bsngo ba ni
115b6(brgyad stong): chud ma zos pa yin te/ ma gtogs pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'o// yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa la chos kyi dbyings kyis yongs su rdzogs/ legs par yongs su
115b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa yin no// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par ma chags shing / mtshan mar 'dzin na/ log par yongs su bsngo ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
115b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyis yongs su bsngo ba 'dis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen pa ltar yongs su bsngos na/ bla
116a1(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no// 'di ni yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyis/ de ltar
116a2(brgyad stong): bdag gis yongs su bsngo'o snyam na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan
116a3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor bos te bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa/ rab 'byor leg so legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems
116a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyis yongs su
116a5(brgyad stong): bsngo ba ste/ chos nyid 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar gzigs pa dang / mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gar
116a6(brgyad stong): gtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngol
116a7(brgyad stong): snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
116a8(brgyad stong): cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par btsud cing bkod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed yod pa dang /
116b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces/
116b2(brgyad stong): bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
116b3(brgyad stong): dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon
116b4(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
116b5(brgyad stong): cad bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur la/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ci yod pas/ rab 'byor sems can de dag la yongs su bsngos pa dang ldan pa'i byang
116b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o//
116b7(brgyad stong): mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klu
116b8(brgyad stong): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi bsgrub pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong
117a1(brgyad stong): gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ tshad med pa
117a2(brgyad stong): bzhi thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can thams cad tshad med pa bzhi thob pa'i
117a3(brgyad stong): bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa
117a4(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
117a5(brgyad stong): snyed dag na/ sems can thams cad gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen
117a6(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi
117a7(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor
117a8(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong
117b1(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ lan cig phyir 'ongs par gyur kyang / rab
117b2(brgyad stong): 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'dra
117b3(brgyad stong): byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi 'ong
117b4(brgyad stong): bar gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon
117b5(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ dgra
117b6(brgyad stong): bcom par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa'i bsod nams
117b7(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/
117b8(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
118a1(brgyad stong): cad @#can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs la/ de dag thams cad kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen
118a2(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
118a3(brgyad stong): mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byed dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bde bar gnas pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim 'gror byas te/
118a4(brgyad stong): de la 'ang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byin la/ rnam grangs de lta bur de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
118a5(brgyad stong): rim gro byed cing gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams
118a6(brgyad stong): cad kyi bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjod par byed/ gsol bar byed de/ de bzhin du re res kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
118a7(brgyad stong): cad la/ rnam grangs de lta bur sbyin par byed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ rab
118a8(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so// /
118b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ni grangs su bzung bar yang sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams de la grangs su yang / dper yang / rgyur yang / bgyi slab/
118b2(brgyad stong): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci ste bsod nams mngon par 'du bgyid pa de/ gzugs can zhig lags na ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
118b3(brgyad stong): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'ang mi shong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
118b4(brgyad stong): to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba ste/ chos kyi
118b5(brgyad stong): dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba byed na/ des bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyis yongs su bsngo ba de las/ skyes pa'i
118b6(brgyad stong): bsod nams 'di las ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi sbyin pa las byang ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma'i rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi char
118b7(brgyad stong): yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba rgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ grangs su yang /
118b8(brgyad stong): bgrang bar yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snga ma'i dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag byin pa ni yongs su chad
119a1(brgyad stong): cang @#pa yin no// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
119a2(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
119a3(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags te/ de ni 'di ltar dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems
119a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zil gyis mnan pa lags so// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsu
119a5(brgyad stong): gyis ris kyi lha'i bu brgya phrag stong gis/ lha'i me tog dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i
119a6(brgyad stong): char dang / lha'i na bza'i char gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas/ lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bkur bstir
119a7(brgyad stong): bgyis/ bla mar bgyis/ ri mor bgyis/ brjod par bgyis/ gsol bar byas te/ lha'i sil snyan rnams rab tu dkrol nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol nas/ kye ma bcom
119a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dmigs pa can gyis byang chub
119b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' de dag gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de nyid kyang zil gyis mnan pa lags so// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
119b2(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lag so// de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur bstir bya ba
119b3(brgyad stong): dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dam pa dang / ri mor bya ba dam pa dang / mchod par bya ba dam pa dang / brjod par bya ba dam pa dang / gsol bar bya ba dam pa rnams kyis bkur
119b4(brgyad stong): bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ brjod par byas/ gsol bar byas nas/ de skad du sgra 'byin cing de skad du dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// de
119b5(brgyad stong): bzhin du 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /
119b6(brgyad stong): 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du
119b7(brgyad stong): shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi zhwa de dag kyang de bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/ btsam/
119b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu
120a1(brgyad stong): bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis yun ring por de tsam du bsags pa dang /
120a2(brgyad stong): de ltar rgya cher yang dag par bsdus pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa yang zil gyis gnon pa ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rig
120a3(brgyad stong): kyi lha'i bu la sogs te/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/

120a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur la/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur nas/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzhan
120a7(brgyad stong): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la

120b1(brgyad stong): shes can gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / rnam grangs de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/
120b2(brgyad stong): sems can de dag thams cad la/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde bar
120b3(brgyad stong): reg pa la gnas pa thams cad kyis/ rim gror byed cing sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis byin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
120b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims
120b5(brgyad stong): kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
120b6(brgyad stong): nga'i phung po dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can de dag gi bar dang / de la sems can gzhan gang dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskyed pa
120b7(brgyad stong): dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed par byed pa de dag rnams cad gcig tu rdzus shing sdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la
120b8(brgyad stong): rjes su yid rang nas// rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rab/ mchog rab/ gya nom pa// bra ma/ bla med pa/ gong ma'i yang gong ma/

121a3(brgyad stong): par gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngon/ rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub

121b1(brgyad stong): rjes su yid rang bar 'dod pa dang / des 'di ltar rjes su yid rang bar byas te/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du
121b2(brgyad stong): tshul khrims kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtson 'grus kyang de bzhin no// rnam par
121b3(brgyad stong): grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gtan kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji ba bzhin du shes rab kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji ba bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
121b4(brgyad stong): mthong ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su yid rang ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
121b5(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba
121b6(brgyad stong): bzhin du de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos gang 'das shing 'gags pa yang de bzhin no//
121b7(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos gang ma 'ongs pa dang ma byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos gang dag da ltar byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin no//
121b8(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i
122a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
122a2(brgyad stong): 'das rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams dang yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba
122a3(brgyad stong): bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de bzhin du chos de dag ma bcings pa/ ma grol ba/ ma chags pa/ de dag gi chos
122a4(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba'i tshul dang / mi 'pho ba dang / mi 'jigs pas yongs su bsngo ba/ rab 'byor 'di ni
122a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog yin no// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
122a6(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/
122a7(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / byang
122a8(brgyad stong): ngachub sems dpa' re re la dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / gos dang / bsos snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang // yo byad dang / bde
122b1(brgyad stong): bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rib 'gror byed cing / sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis byin pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor gang
122b2(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
122b3(brgyad stong): chub la yang dag par btsud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud de/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus kyis legs par spyod pa
122b4(brgyad stong): dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul khrims dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa dang / rnam grangs
122b5(brgyad stong): de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems re res bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug la/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed lus
122b6(brgyad stong): kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul khrims dmigs pa'i 'du shes dag gis/ yang dag par blangs te/
122b7(brgyad stong): gnas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
122b8(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang //
123a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas dag gis tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
123a2(brgyad stong): nyan thos de dag gis tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de dag thams cad bsdus shing sdom te/
123a3(brgyad stong): gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa rjes su yid rang bar byas nas/ rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rab/ mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/
123a4(brgyad stong): gong na med pa/ gong ma'i yang gong ma/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i rjes su yid rang bas/ rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
123a5(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod na pas bya ba'i dngos po 'di
123a6(brgyad stong): la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can dag gi tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de'i rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do//
123a7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
123a8(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
123b1(brgyad stong): tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul
123b2(brgyad stong): khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pa lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med
123b3(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhags/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
123b4(brgyad stong): dag tu 'dug cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' re re la/ spros shing brdegs te
123b5(brgyad stong): brgyab kyang de dag thams cad dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis/ bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bzod pa yang dag
123b6(brgyad stong): par blangs te gnas pa dang / rnam grangs de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las/ byang chub sems dpa' so so nas kyang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
123b7(brgyad stong): 'dug cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re re la spros shing brdegs te/
123b8(brgyad stong): rgyab kyang / de dag thams cad dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
124a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung
124a2(brgyad stong): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / nyan thos de dag gi tshul
124a3(brgyad stong): khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / nyan thos de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting
124a4(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par
124a5(brgyad stong): byas nas/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rab/ mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/ gong ma'i yang gong ma/ mnyam
124a6(brgyad stong): pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i rjes su yi rang shing / rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po// bla na med
124a7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngon/ rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can snga ma de dag
124a8(brgyad stong): gi bzod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de ni rgya'i char nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ mdor bsdus te rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang
124b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de dmigs pa can de dag bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
124b2(brgyad stong): bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
124b3(brgyad stong): dag par zhugs nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyis spyos shing brdegs te brgyab kyang /
124b4(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad dmig pa'i 'du shes can gyis bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
124b5(brgyad stong): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud de/ bla na med pa yang
124b6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par btsud nas/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing / bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yi mi bsod cing /
124b7(brgyad stong): rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis zil gyis mnon par brtson 'grus dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis yang dag par blangs te gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b8(brgyad stong): chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
125a1(brgyad stong): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
125a2(brgyad stong): gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i

125a4(brgyad stong): thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas nas/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed de/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rab/ mchog rab/
125a5(brgyad stong): gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ gong ma'i yang gong ma/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i rjes su yid rang bas rjes
125a6(brgyad stong): su yid rang ba la/ rjes su yid rang nas rjes su yid rang ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
125a7(brgyad stong): su bsngo na/ rab 'byor rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can snga ma de dag gis brtson 'grus
125a8(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de ni/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
125b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can de dag brtson 'grus dang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

125b3(brgyad stong): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs na/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag yi mi bsod cing rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis zil gyis gnon
125b4(brgyad stong): par brtson 'grus yang dag par blangs te gnas pa lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
125b5(brgyad stong): thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal
125b6(brgyad stong): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gang gis bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par bzhags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes
125b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ tshul
125b8(brgyad stong): khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /
126a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol pa dang / rnam par grum pa'i le shes pazang ba'i phu
126a2(brgyad stong): dang / nyan thos de dag gi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de dag thams cad
126a3(brgyad stong): gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas shing / ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed de/ rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo/ mchog

126a6(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gyi bsam gtan las bya ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga
126a7(brgyad stong): ma de ni rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang bye ba rgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char
126a8(brgyad stong): yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang / dper yang / rgyar yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmig
126b1(brgyad stong): rjes su tI rang ba dang
126b2(brgyad stong): pa can dag bsam gtan dag la mnyam par gzhog pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
126b3(brgyad stong): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
126b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das
126b5(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bu ji skad zer ba de bzhin no// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gsal bar bgyid
126b6(brgyad stong): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mi
126b7(brgyad stong): gos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten
126b8(brgyad stong): pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
126b9(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa ni rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mchog tu btsun pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
127a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni bde bar bcad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dongs pa rnams la snang bar gyid/
127a2(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gti mug dang / rab rib rnams ma
127a3(brgyad stong): mchis par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
127a4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa ni lam log par mchis pa'i sems can lam thams cad du 'jug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
127a5(brgyad stong): nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad ni chos thams cad mi bskyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
127a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mi 'gag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
127a7(brgyad stong): yum lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
127a8(brgyad stong): byin pa ni 'khor ba'i gnyen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes
127b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba yongs su rdzogs pa lags na/
127b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
127b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu ston pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du gnas par
127b4(brgyad stong): bya'o// sha ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya'o// sha ri'i bu ston pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o// de nas lha'i
127b5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'dri bar 'gyur/ kye ma 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir gzhi las 'dri bar 'gyur//
127b6(brgyad stong): snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa sha ri'i
127b7(brgyad stong): bu ci'i gzhi las 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
127b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
128a1(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yongs su bsngos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can de dag thams cad kyi/ sbyir ba las byung ba'i
128a2(brgyad stong): bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba gang yin pa dang / bzod pa las byung ba gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus las byung ba gang
128a3(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba gang yin pa dang / shes rab las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to//
128a4(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya stong ngam/ yongs su mtshon pa med na/ lam du 'jug pa'i bskal pa med cing / grong ngam/ grong
128a5(brgyad stong): khyer du 'gro ba'i bskal ba med de/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
128a6(brgyad stong): mi thob ste/ yongs su mtshon pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ dmus long lta bu yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i skal pa yang med na/
128a7(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa lta ga la byed/ ke'u shi ka nas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128a8(brgyad stong): phyin pas yongs su bzung ba de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang thob po// de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam
128b1(brgyad stong): du 'jug pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su thob par bya ba'i mig rab tu thob par bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces
128b2(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa
128b3(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu gzugs la mngon par mi bsgrub par lta ste/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du
128b4(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par mi bsgrub par lta'o// sha ri'i bu phung po lnga rnams mngon par mi bsgrub pa gang yin pa
128b5(brgyad stong): de ni/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar mngon par bsgrub pas phung po lnga rnams mngon par bsgrub na/ shes rab
128b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub pa ste/ mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di
128b7(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
128b8(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs na/ chos gang yang thob par byed pa med do// sha ri'i bu nam chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i tshe/
129a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gral/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsam/
129a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi
129a3(brgyad stong): ka 'di skad ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed dam/ zhes zer ba ni/ ji ltar dmigs pa de lta bur thob par mi byed
129a4(brgyad stong): do// ming ji lta ba de lta bur thob par mi byed do// mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de lta bur thob par mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji
129a5(brgyad stong): lta bu thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka ji ltar thob par mi byed pa de ltar thob par byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
129a6(brgyad stong): 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang mi bskyed/ chos gang yang mi 'gog cing / chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gog pa ma mchis
129a7(brgyad stong): bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ gnas pa yang ma lags pa ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
129a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bur yang 'tshal bar bgyid na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha
129b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu bgyid/ shes rab kyi pa rab tu phyin pa 'di gsob tu bgyid de/ shes rab ci rob tu phyin pa 'dimi bgyid do// de na byas rnam ma pa dang /
129b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis shes rab
129b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsob tu byed pa dang /
129b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gsal bar
129b5(brgyad stong): byas nas/ gzugs yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin no// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gsal bar
129b6(brgyad stong): byas pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin/
129b7(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas nyid gsal bar byas pa ma
129b8(brgyad stong): yin no// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
130a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen
130a2(brgyad stong): po yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzugs bsdud par mi bgyid/ g.yeng bar
130a3(brgyad stong): mi bgyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung
130a4(brgyad stong): ngur mi bgyid/ rnam par shes pa bsdad par mi bgyid/ g.yeng bar mi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags pa de dag
130a5(brgyad stong): kyang stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid do/ bsdud par mi bgyid/
130a6(brgyad stong): g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma sdus pa/ ma g.yengs pa lags so// gal te de ltar yang 'chal bar
130a7(brgyad stong): mi bgyid na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
130a8(brgyad stong): can du rig par bya ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na shes
130b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par rigs par bgyi'o// sems can bsam gyi mi khyab pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o//
130b2(brgyad stong): sems can mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid lags pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs
130b3(brgyad stong): par 'tshang mi brgya pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi brgya par rigs par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par ji lta ba bzhin du
130b4(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi brgya pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi brgya par rig par bgyi'o// sems
130b5(brgyad stong): can stobs yang dag par bsgrub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yang dag par bsgrubs par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de lta bur/ 'di lta ste/
130b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
130b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ zab mo 'di la mos shing nem nur mi bgyid/ the tshom mi 'tshal/ rmongs par mi 'gyur
130b8(brgyad stong): na bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang / chos nyid dang / don gyi tshul
131a1(brgyad stong): dang / chos kyi tshul bzhin du 'tshal bar bgyid cing rjes su rtogs par bgyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ yun ji srid/
131a2(brgyad stong): gcig tu spyad par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
131a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing / yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas/ shi 'phos te
131a4(brgyad stong): 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
131a5(brgyad stong): byas shing yongs su dris nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag 'dir skyes pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/
131a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ston par 'du shes bskyed do// bdag gi ston pa mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag gi ston pa mthong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// shes rab
131a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rna ba blags te gus par nyan to// gtam gyis bar chad mi byed do// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ yun ring por
131a8(brgyad stong): spyad pa de lta bur rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
131b1(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa 'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/
131b2(brgyad stong): bskyed par nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o// zhes 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gang na zhes rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma gang gis
131b3(brgyad stong): kyang bstan par mi nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phung po 'am/ khas sam/ skye
131b4(brgyad stong): mched du bstan cing nye bar gzung mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad shin du dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab
131b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bstan pa 'am/ nye bar bzung ba 'am/ rtogs par mi nus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po 'am/ khams sam/ skye mched las
131b6(brgyad stong): gzhan du yang med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched nyid stong pa dben pa ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
131b7(brgyad stong): dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// stong zhing dben pa dang / zhi ba'i phyir dmigs su med do// chos thams cad
131b8(brgyad stong): kyi mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// nam 'du shes dang / kun shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes
132a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
132a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ rnal 'byor du bgyid pa de yun ji srid gcig spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub
132a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dbang po'i rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste/ lung bstan par phye ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang
132a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dag mthong na/ de dag
132a5(brgyad stong): gi drang na tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma dang / ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang
132a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / bshad pa la ma gus pas nyan par mi 'dod do//
132a7(brgyad stong): nyan par mi 'dod pas bsnyen bkur mi byed do// bsnyen par mi byed pas yongs su mi 'dri'o// yongs su mi 'dri bas ma dad do// ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ de
132a8(brgyad stong): ngag de'i phyir chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las brtsegs shing / kun brtsegs te nye bar bsdus te nye bar bsdus pas/ da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
132b1(brgyad stong): mo 'di la dad cing ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa las 'byol zhing ma gus pas/ ma dad pas mos par mi byed de/ lus dang sems kyis kyang 'thur par mi byed pas shes
132b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes/ mi rig/ khong du mi chud de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad pas mi nyan te/ mnyan pas
132b3(brgyad stong): mi shes so// ma shes pas mi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas khong du mi chud do// khong du ma chud pas chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i la stsogs shing / nye bar bsdu de dag
132b4(brgyad stong): chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las de stsogs shing nye bar bsdus pas/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag shes
132b5(brgyad stong): rab 'chal pa de las mngon par 'dus shing bstsags pa dang / kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bsdus pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang /
132b6(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa la spong zhing / dbang bzas nas 'byor par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spong zhing dbang bzlas te mi sman
132b7(brgyad stong): par brjod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur/ dbang bzas
132b8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ mi snad pa brjod par 'gyur/ de dag bdag gi rgyud kyang ma rungs bar byas shing bsregs nas/ gzhan blo chung ba/ shes rab chung ba/ bsod nams chung ba
133a1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / dad pa tsam dang ldan pa/ dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa/ mos pa tsam dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa tsam dang ldan pa/ las dang
133a2(brgyad stong): po skal pa med pa rnams kyi dad pa tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / 'dod pa tsam yang phyir bzlog cing 'bral bar byed/ ldog par byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig
133a3(brgyad stong): ma yin gyis/ bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer ro// de dag rang gi rgyud kyang ma rungs par byas shing bsregs nas/ pha rol gyi rgyud ma rungs par byas/ shes rab kyi
133a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa btab na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bskur pa btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bkur pa btab na/ 'das
133a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bskur pa btab par 'gyur ro// de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
133a6(brgyad stong): rnams la 'byol bar 'gyur ro// chos las yongs su 'phangs par 'gyur/ dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol tu 'gyur/ de dag sems can rnams la phan
133a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / bde ba rgyun gcod par byas pas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las nye bar stsogs so// de dag de lta bur chos kyi
133a8(brgyad stong): 'phongs par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par nye bar gnas pas/ lo brgya phrag mang po// lo stong phrag mang po/ lo bye ba
133b1(brgyad stong): khrag khrig stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su btso zhing / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bur yun ring por sem
133b2(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na/ me yis bsdud pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// me yis bsdad pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba
133b3(brgyad stong): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na/ sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//
133b4(brgyad stong): de dag der bor te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skyes ma thag tu de ni yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyur ro//
133b5(brgyad stong): de dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na/ yang me yis bsdud pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi
133b6(brgyad stong): 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu/ sems can dmyal ba chen por yod pa der 'dor te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//
133b7(brgyad stong): de dag der yang de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de dag der yang de bzhin du yun ring por sems can
133b8(brgyad stong): dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho na/ der yang de bzhin du me yis bsdad pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag me yis bsdud pa'i
134a1(brgyad stong): bskal pa 'byung ba dang / yang de nas shi 'phos te las de nyid du ma zad cing / lhag ma lus pas yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dor te/
134a2(brgyad stong): bor nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ yang de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong
134a3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// nam me'i skal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de'i bar du de dag lta bu'i sdug bsngal mang po'i tshor bar 'gyur ba'i las myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i
134a4(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ de ltar tshig nyes pa smras pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams
134a5(brgyad stong): med pa lnga'i las bgyid pa yang yid kyis nongs pa bgyis pa dang / ngag gis nong pa spyad pa 'di'i gzugs bstan du'ang 'dra ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
134a6(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni/ yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa de'i gzug
134a7(brgyad stong): bstan du'ang 'dra bar ma lags so// las de bstsags shing kun nas bstsags te/ nye bar bsdus pa'i tshul 'dra ba ba tsam yang ma yin no// geng su dag shes rab kyi pha rol
134a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la phyir gzhi la bar sems zhing spong bar 'gyur/ mi snyan pa zer bar 'gyur te/ 'di la bslab par mi bya
134b1(brgyad stong): zhes tshig tu smra bar 'gyur te// de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa sa yin// zhes tshig tu smra par 'gyur ro// de dang sems can gzhan das kyang 'jam bar bya
134b2(brgyad stong): de de bdag gi rgyud kyang ma rungs par byas nas/ gzhan gyi rgyud kyang ma rungs par byed do// bdag gi rgyud kyang dug can du byas nas/ gzhan gyi rgyung kyang drug can du
134b3(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang phungs nas/ gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo mi shes pa rtogs pa/
134b4(brgyad stong): gzhan dag kyang 'di la bslab par mi bya bar 'dzin du 'jug pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni sha ri'i bu ltar yang ngas mi gnang na/ de dag dang / 'grogs pa lta ci smos/
134b5(brgyad stong): bsnyen pa dang / bkur bstir bya ba lta ci smos/ gnas pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de lta bu ni gang zag de dag chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i
134b6(brgyad stong): bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni shing rul pa de lta bur gyur pa yin no// sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni/ nag po'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag
134b7(brgyad stong): de lta bu de las gang nyan pa dang / dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pas brlag par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
134b8(brgyad stong): pa la/ sun 'byin par sems pa de dag ni sha ri'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der skyes
135a1(brgyad stong): shing // sems can dmyal ba na mchis pa'i lus de'i tshad ma bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu gang zag der skyes pa'i
135a2(brgyad stong): lus de'i tshad zhog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i lus kyis tshad thos nas/ khrag dron mo kha nas skyug cing / 'chi bar gyur pa 'am/ 'chi ba tsam gyis sdug
135a3(brgyad stong): bsngal mi zad pa dang / nad kyis reg cing tshig pa las/ mya ngan gyi zug ngur zhugs sam/ g.yangs sa chen por lhung ngam/ skam pas snyes par gyur na mi rung ngo // gang la
135a4(brgyad stong): nges pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i tshad ni 'jigs pa chen po'i bar du mi thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i ched 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la
135a5(brgyad stong): go skabs ma phye'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de'i lus kyi phyi ma'i skye bo mang pos snang bar bgyis par
135a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur gyis/ ngag dang yid kyis las bstsags shing / kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i lus 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par
135a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du
135a8(brgyad stong): byed pa de dag bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pas yun ring por 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la snang ba
135b1(brgyad stong): byas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu sdug bsngal de gnyis dpag tu med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag dkar ba'i
135b2(brgyad stong): skal pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
135b3(brgyad stong): chos lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang gis las nongs par smras pa de lta bur
135b4(brgyad stong): bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po skyes so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
135b5(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor ngag gi nyes par smras par/ bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po de legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba de nyid la rab tu byung la/ shes rab kyi pha
135b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sun phang bar sems/ spongs par sems/ phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhi la na/ sangs rgyas
135b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang phyir gzhil bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir gzhil bar gyur na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
135b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyir gzhil bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir gzhi la na/ dam pa'i chos
136a1(brgyad stong): phyid gnyil na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyi gzhil bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi
136a2(brgyad stong): gzhil nas/ 'o na ni dkon mchog gsum las yod de phyi rol du gyur pa yin te/ dpag tu med pa'i yang ches dpag tu med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du
136a3(brgyad stong): byed pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
136a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir gzhil bar sems dpa' de'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
136a5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs sam/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las kyis chos zab mo dag la ma
136a6(brgyad stong): dad ma mos par 'gyur ba 'am/ rab 'byor sdig pa'i chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyir gzhi la
136a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma nges/ sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu song ba yin nam/ mi rtson pa yin nam/ mngon par
136a8(brgyad stong): zhan pa yin nam/ bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa dang / nyes pa'i klan ka tshol ba yin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
136b1(brgyad stong): pa bab mo 'di bshad cing bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la phyir gzhil bar sems pa 'di ni rnam pa de dag dang ldan pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
136b2(brgyad stong): stong pa las/ sems can dmyal ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / bam po dgu pa'o//
136b3(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi brtson pas mos par dka'o//
136b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi brtson pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang /
136b5(brgyad stong): blo zhan pa dang / mi 'dod pa dang / thos pa nyung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po nye bar brten pa dang / sri zhu chung ba dang / mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin
136b6(brgyad stong): can dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/ chos la mi rtson pas mos par dka'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das e ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mos
136b7(brgyad stong): par dka' ba'i slad du ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
136b8(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings
137a1(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor/
137a2(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni sngon gyis mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs ni phyi
137a3(brgyad stong): ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi da ltar byung ba
137a4(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
137a5(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' ngo bo nyid
137a6(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' ngo
137a7(brgyad stong): bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i
137a8(brgyad stong): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
137b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka' ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
137b2(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu'i rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu'i rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa ste/
137b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med cing tha mi dad te ma chad pa'o// rab 'byor
137b4(brgyad stong): de ltar 'bras bu rnam par dag pas na/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pas na/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du
137b5(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag
137b6(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di la
137b7(brgyad stong): gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med cing tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar 'bras bu rnam par dag pas na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o//
137b8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas na/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen
138a1(brgyad stong): pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/
138a2(brgyad stong): de ltar gzugs rnam par dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med cing tha mi dad de ma chad pa'o//
138a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas na/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par
138a4(brgyad stong): dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
138a5(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam
138a6(brgyad stong): bar dag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med cing so so ma yin tha mi dad de ma chad pa'o// rab 'byor
138a7(brgyad stong): de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas na/ thams cad mkhyen
138a8(brgyad stong): pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab
138b1(brgyad stong): po/ bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gsal bar bgyid pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam
138b2(brgyad stong): par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ snang ba bgyid pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//
138b3(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/
138b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal po/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
138b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// /

138b7(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams shin tu skye ba ma mchis
138b8(brgyad stong): pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma 'tshal/ yang dag par ma 'tshal ba'o//
139a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci zhig ma 'tshal cing /
139a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par ma 'tshal to// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi shes yang dag par ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu

139a8(brgyad stong): pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan
