139b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam
139b8(brgyad stong): par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshu rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas/ pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga'i
140a1(brgyad stong): bar rgyang ring po na yang mi gnas so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang
140a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dor bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgyang ring du byed par 'gyur ro// /
140a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming las kyang chags par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma las kyang

140a5(brgyad stong): 'di dag bshad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par bshad cing / legs par bstan te/ shin du mthar btugs pa ngo
140a6(brgyad stong): mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chags pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
140a7(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs stong pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
140a8(brgyad stong): bu rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos rnams su shes pa ni chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la
140b1(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams su shes pa ni chags pa'o// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams su shes pa ni chags pa'o// gang zag byang chub sems/
140b2(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa can sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ bsod nams 'di tsam bskyed do zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
140b3(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis chags par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub kyi sems
140b4(brgyad stong): dang po bskyed pa'o// zhes byang chub kyi sems su yang dag par shes shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes yongs su bsngo
140b5(brgyad stong): na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de bas na ke'u shi ka gzhan
140b6(brgyad stong): yang yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
140b7(brgyad stong): chub la yang dag pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pas yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ yang dag par
140b8(brgyad stong): gzung bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag nyid la yang gnod par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pas/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
141a1(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi nu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag rnam par blangs pa yin no// de nas bcom na'
141a2(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la/ chags pa'i mtha' khong du
141a3(brgyad stong): chud par byed pa leg so legs so// rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa rab tu phra ba gzhan dag kyang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad
141a4(brgyad stong): do// bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
141a5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan
141a6(brgyad stong): mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma ji snyed pa chags pa de'ang de snyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma las ni chags pa 'byung ste/ nga 'das pa dang /
141a7(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes su yid rang ngo zhes/ rjes su yi rang nas
141a8(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o snyam mo// rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid
141b1(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ni dus gsum las grol ba'o// gang dus gsum las grol ba de ni yongs su bsngo ba
141b2(brgyad stong): mi nus so// mtshan mar byar mi rung / dmigs par byar mi rung ste/ de ni mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis
141b3(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin ni zab po// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
141b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ni/ rang bzhin zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rang bzhin dben pas na/
141b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin dben pas na/ bcom ldan 'das shes
141b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ rab 'byor
141b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ltar rab 'byor chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
141b8(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas par/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/
142a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom
142a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis chos de dag gang yang med do// rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med do// rang bzhin
142a3(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin te/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pas chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid cig pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de bzhin
142a4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
142a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang
142a6(brgyad stong): bzhin med pa'o// rang bzhin med pa yin pa de ni rang bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na chags pa'i mtha' de dag thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor
142a7(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rjes su rig par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor su yang mngon
142a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bcom
142b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sems kyis rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
142b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142b3(brgyad stong): pa ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi//
142b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma
142b5(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs
142b6(brgyad stong): stong pa'o// zhes mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/
142b7(brgyad stong): gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o// snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs gang ma yin no// snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab
142b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs kyi gang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ de ltar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin
143a1(brgyad stong): du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gang ba ma yin no snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
143a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa gang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes de ltar yang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
143a3(brgyad stong): spyod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ltar chag
143a4(brgyad stong): pa nyid dang / chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi
143a5(brgyad stong): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la chag
143a6(brgyad stong): bo med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltar spyod na/ gzugs la chag
143a7(brgyad stong): pa mi bskyed/ tshor ba lo ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la chags pa mi bskyed/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
143a8(brgyad stong): chags pa mi bskyed/ lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi bskyed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi bskyed/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chag
143b1(brgyad stong): pa mi bskyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi bskyed/ thos cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa mi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir
143b2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags pa/ ma bcings pa/ yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chags pa thams cad las rab tu
143b3(brgyad stong): zla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
143b4(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa'i chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni bstan kyang mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang
143b5(brgyad stong): mi phel ba ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so leg
143b6(brgyad stong): so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid
143b7(brgyad stong): mtsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / na mkha'i sngags pa ma brjod kyang / na mkha' yongasu 'grib par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa brjod kyang na mkha' yongs su 'phel bar mi
143b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/
144a1(brgyad stong): bsngags pa sa brjod kyang khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos
144a2(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa de'ang bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// ma bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// gnas bstan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
144a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la zhum par mi 'gyur/ yam yam por
144a4(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur/ 'di la rnal 'byor du'ang bgyid la/ phyir mi ldog na dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
144a5(brgyad stong): bsgom pa 'di ni/ na mkha' bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ go cha 'di bgos pa ni phyag bgyi ba lag so//
144a6(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba 'di ni/ na mkha' la go cha 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
144a7(brgyad stong): sems can gyi dbyings dang / mtshungs pa rnams kyi slad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ go cha chen po bgos pa lags
144a8(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
144b1(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba de ni/ na mkha' 'degs par 'tshal ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na mkha' dang batshungs pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du rga
144b2(brgyad stong): cha 'tshal ba de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po thob pa lags so// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
144b3(brgyad stong): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
144b4(brgyad stong): 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang mi bskyed/ chos gang yang 'gog par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi lha'i dbang /
144b5(brgyad stong): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de/ ci la rnal 'byor du byed par
144b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni/ na mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro//
144b7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par sems pa de ni/ bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya
144b8(brgyad stong): byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzin pa dang / bsrid pa dang / bsgrub
145a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / sba ba ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
145a2(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka chos gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma
145a3(brgyad stong): yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bshad pa la gnas na/
145a4(brgyad stong): de nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ mi dang mi ma yin pa de la glags lta ba dang /
145a5(brgyad stong): glags tshol ba dag gis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa la/
145a6(brgyad stong): bsrung ba dang / sba bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / sba bar bya bar sems so// ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod brag cha la bsrung ba dang /
145a7(brgyad stong): sbyang ba dang / sba bar byed par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du
145a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gnas pa yang chos rnams kyang brag cha lta bur yang dag par rjes su mi
145b1(brgyad stong): mthong / mi shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi shes yang dag par mi shes/ mi snang ba med cing dmigs par gnas te/ gal te de de ltar gnas na/ shes
145b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po bzhi ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i
145b3(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te/
145b4(brgyad stong): lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig
145b5(brgyad stong): tu 'khod pa dang / rgyal po chen po de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po
145b6(brgyad stong): yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas stong yang dag par rjes su dran te/ de dag gis ming 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di
145b7(brgyad stong): dag nyid dang / rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhus pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid/
145b8(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag yongasu 'dri zhing / kun 'dri bar byed pa dang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dran no// byang chub sem
146a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/

146a3(brgyad stong): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
146a4(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// ming de yang mi dmigs te/ gang gi dngos po nyid ming zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
146a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa de yang ma mchis/ mi dmigs te/ ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming
146a6(brgyad stong): yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ bla na med
146a7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag gis/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ shes rab kyi pha
146a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di lta/
146b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni/ gzugs stong pa'o zhes 'am/ gzugs grol ba'o zhes 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi
146b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa bcings pa dang /
146b3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa grol ba'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rnam pa de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146b4(brgyad stong): byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di nyid yi ge 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ shes
146b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
146b6(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
146b7(brgyad stong): gzugs yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

147a1(brgyad stong): su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor

147a5(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags par gyur pa de dag kyang / rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa legs na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang /
147a6(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni yang ba mi spong
147a7(brgyad stong): pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi bgyid do// de dag la lha stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dang bcu zhi dang / bcwo lnga la chos
147a8(brgyad stong): smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang der bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de
147b1(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs
147b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / lha stong phrag mang po dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi
147b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rin po che bla na med pa'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i gzhi las
147b4(brgyad stong): bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur mod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa la bar chad mang du byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
147b5(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rin po che chen po la dgra mang ngo / ji tsam du dbyig tu gyur pa bzhin du dgra ji lci bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
147b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa rin po che'i phung po 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i rin po che ste/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag
147b7(brgyad stong): par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang mi gnas/ chos gang la yang mi sbyor/ chos
147b8(brgyad stong): gang la yang mi spyod/ chos gang la yang mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa'i
149a1(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs
149a2(brgyad stong): ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha
149a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di yang ma gos so// gal te de ltar yang dag par mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la
149a4(brgyad stong): yang 'jug pa 'am/ nges par 'jug pa 'am/ yang dag par ston pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa 'am/ nges par thob pa med do// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag
149a5(brgyad stong): bar snang la ca co dang / ga sha dag byed de gos dag 'thor zhing / a ma/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis su byung bar snang ngo zhes zer ro// de nas
149a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang
149a7(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor ba 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de skad ces bka'
149a8(brgyad stong): skul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang la chos thams cad la chags pa ma mchis pa dang /
149b1(brgyad stong): gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi brgya ba dang / chos kyi
149b2(brgyad stong): 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang / chos gang yang mi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang yang smos
149b3(brgyad stong): par bgyi ba'i chos de ni dmigs te/ chos gang yang rab tu bskor ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin du mngon par ma grub
149b4(brgyad stong): pa ste/ chos gang yang mngon par bsgrub par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa'o// de skad ces
149b5(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor
149b6(brgyad stong): mtshan ma med pa ni 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// smon pa med pa ni 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// gang 'di ltar bstan pa de ni chos thams cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang
149b7(brgyad stong): bstan pa med la/ sus kyang thob pa med/ sus kyang gnos pa med/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma byas/ sus kyang mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'di ni su
149b8(brgyad stong): yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las mi mnga' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su
150a1(brgyad stong): byas pa med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
150a2(brgyad stong): nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mnyam pa
150a3(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin du stong pa'i slad du 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmig
150a4(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du/ 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis shing lus ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i
150a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
150a6(brgyad stong): thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/
150a7(brgyad stong): 'di ni mi 'phrog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
150a8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du/ 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di
150b1(brgyad stong): ni byed pa po sa mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni shes pa po dang / mthong ba po ma mchis pa'i
150b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mi skye ba'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang /
150b3(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ma mchis rnam par grol bar
150b4(brgyad stong): mi bgyid pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rgyu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rmi laM gyi pha rol
150b5(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chag dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
150b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni gos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad
150b7(brgyad stong): du// 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o//
150b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni mi g.yos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa/ de bzhin
151a1(brgyad stong): nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du/
151a2(brgyad stong): 'di ni mnga' ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
151a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du/ 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i slad du/ 'di ni sems can
151a4(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
151a5(brgyad stong): rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni yang dag pa ji lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mtha'
151a6(brgyad stong): mi rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma bral ba'i slad du/ 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /
151a7(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'i slad du/ 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rtogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni ma
151a8(brgyad stong): rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
151b1(brgyad stong): nyid bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du/ 'di
151b2(brgyad stong): ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin gyi slad du/ 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
151b3(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni chags pa mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gnas mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni
151b4(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
151b5(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nyid na mkha' dang 'dra ba'i slad
151b6(brgyad stong): 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par chags pa'i slad du/ 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
151b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i
151b8(brgyad stong): slad du/ 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni dpag tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
152a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi rdzi ba'i slad du/ 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba'i tshul las shin du 'das
152a2(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin du ma zhum pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin
152a3(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
152a4(brgyad stong): cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du/
152a5(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bstod
152a6(brgyad stong): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// // bam po bcu pa'o// /
152a7(brgyad stong): / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu grang gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba
152a8(brgyad stong): de dag kyang / sngon gyi rgya ba rnams la bya ba byas pa yin na/ gang 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
152b1(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod shing kha ton byas nas/
152b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de dag ni ngan ngon gyi ma yin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
152b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
152b4(brgyad stong): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / yongs su dri ba byas pa yin te/ gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152b5(brgyad stong): 'di nyid thos nas/ da ltar na yang nyan te/ mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu
152b6(brgyad stong): 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ kha ston byed par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ sngon gyi de
152b7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid thos pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/
152b8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun du zhum par mi 'gyur/ yid mi gsod yi gsod par mi
153a1(brgyad stong): byed/ yid phyir phyogs par mi byed/ mi skrag/ mi dngang / shin du dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
153a2(brgyad stong): pa yin par rig par bya snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan
153a3(brgyad stong): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mngon par dad de rtog
153a4(brgyad stong): cing mos la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod par bgyid
153a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du slob dang / de bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin du rnal 'byor du bgyid na/ de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
153a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni za ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge
153a7(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yongs su mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du gyur par ma thos pa dang / sngon spyad pa dang ldan pa
153a8(brgyad stong): rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag ma rtogs pas spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
153b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mtha' na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa la spong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/
153b2(brgyad stong): ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du sngon ma spyad pa dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
153b3(brgyad stong): mo 'di 'chad pa dang / spong bar gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bya ste/ de dag gi sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa la spangs pas na/ 'di
153b4(brgyad stong): ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos pa ma mchis/ dad pa ma mchis/ dga' ba ma mchis/ dang ba ma mchis/ bzod pa ma
153b5(brgyad stong): mchis te/ de dag gis sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongs su ma dris te/ yongs su dri ba ma mchis so//
153b6(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab te/ byang chub sems
153b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la mos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar ngo mtshar ci che/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lngan
153b8(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a1(brgyad stong): @pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shika
154a2(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shika gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de
154a3(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las skyes te/ ke'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las kyang
154a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes par rab tu bzhag go// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
154a5(brgyad stong): gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// /
154a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags//
154a7(brgyad stong): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i dbang
154a8(brgyad stong): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka legs so legs so// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
154b1(brgyad stong): don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// ke'u shi ka 'di yang sangs rgyas kyis mthus khyod kyi spobs pa skyes so// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
154b2(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spong na/ gzugs la mi gnas/ gzugs so zhes mi gnas te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154b3(brgyad stong): chen po gzugs la mi gnas/ gzugs so zhes mi gnas pas/ ke'u shi ka de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed//
154b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub
154b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o// zhes mi gnas pas/ ke'u shi ka de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
154b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// ke'u shi ka gzugs so zhes mi sbyor te/ ke'u shi ka nam gzugs so zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na/
154b7(brgyad stong): gzugs so zhes mi gnas so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// zhes mi sbyor te/ ke'u shi ka rnam
154b8(brgyad stong): par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'od skad ces gsol to//
155a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtog par dka'o// bcom
155a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
155a3(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i khu gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas so// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas pas/ de ltar
155a4(brgyad stong): na gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas pas/ de
155a5(brgyad stong): ltar na rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// sha ri'i bu gzugs zab po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed do// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zang po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi
155a6(brgyad stong): byed pas/ de ltar na gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab mo snyam
155a7(brgyad stong): du rnal 'byor du mi byed do// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa zab mo snyam du mi
155a8(brgyad stong): gnas so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
155b1(brgyad stong): zab pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni nem nur mi
155b2(brgyad stong): bgyid/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang
155b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa'i mdun du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad na ni/ nyes pa ci yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
155b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang lung ma bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan te phyag bya ba
155b5(brgyad stong): dang / mnyan pa thos par 'gyur la/ thos nas kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / shin du dngang par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ yun ring
155b6(brgyad stong): po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ des ring por mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa bsnyen pa yin no// byang chub sem
155b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis las mi mnga' ste/ de nas bla na med
155b8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
156a1(brgyad stong): mnyes par 'gyur te/ thugs byung bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na yang lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par
156a2(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan thob par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gang shes
156a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thob par gyur la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
156a4(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa
156a5(brgyad stong): yin te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
156a6(brgyad stong): pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab
156a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thob par 'gyur la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
156a8(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba yin te/
156b1(brgyad stong): yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yin no//
156b2(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so// bde bar gsheg
156b3(brgyad stong): pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems pa'i theg pa can gang de'i rmi lam du
156b4(brgyad stong): 'ang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rmi ba mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du/
156b5(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
156b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
156b7(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba rnyed par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi gang zag de ni rgyang ring po nas mchis pa lags te/
156b8(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa lags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
157a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i rig par bgyi'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di tha na nyan pa dang /
157a2(brgyad stong): bsnyen par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par lags par rigs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
157a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das phal cher gyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bstsags pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems can de dag las phal cher ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
157a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la sems mi mthun par 'gyur ro// sems log par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug ste/
157a5(brgyad stong): yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi gnon cing / yang dag par dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
157a6(brgyad stong): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du bsags pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'brog
157a7(brgyad stong): dgon pa dpag tshad brgya 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya 'am/ dpag
157a8(brgyad stong): tshad brgya phrag bcu'i 'brog dgon pa nas byung ba dang / des 'di ltar mtshan ma gang gis na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal mchis par mngon pa'i
157b1(brgyad stong): mtshan ma sngar rnga ba/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ 'tshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ de ma lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag
157b2(brgyad stong): sngar mthong la/ des mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di lta mtshan ma de dag gda' ba las grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong brdal du nye bar gyur to
157b3(brgyad stong): snyam nas/ de ni dbugs 'byin pa snyed pa lags te/ de la slan chad chom po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
157b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bran
157b5(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag
157b6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sems par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur ro//
157b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lhas sngar gda' ba 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan par thob
157b8(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de
158a1(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis mthus smras pa dang / smras par 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang gnas 'di la 'di khyor spong bar bgyis/
158a2(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig
158a3(brgyad stong): rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen por mchis na ji lta ji ltar mchis pa dag la/ gal te des ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/
158a4(brgyad stong): ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni da dung ring ngo snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te phyis ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan
158a5(brgyad stong): ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ de 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni
158a6(brgyad stong): dma' ba lags pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du/ ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ rgya mtsho blo de ni mig gi ma mthong
158a7(brgyad stong): mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya mtsho chen po ni/ bdag gi bsnyen te/ 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mi rung ngo snyam du rtogs par rig go// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
158a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
158b1(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon sum du lung bstan kyang / 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du/
158b2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan par thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/
158b3(brgyad stong): dpyid ga'i nye bar gnas pa na/ shing sna tshogs kyi yal ga dang / lo ma rnams lhags pas lo ma 'byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams
158b4(brgyad stong): nag tshal la mtshan ma sngar byung ba de dag mthong nas/ de ni me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ring por mi thogs par 'byung ngo snyam nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ro//
158b5(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
158b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
158b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid bsgrub pa/
158b8(brgyad stong): lags so// de la gang sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha de dag ni 'di snyam du sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par
159a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang
159a2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring por mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rab tu dga' zhing rang te/ yid mgu ba skyes par 'gyur ro//
159a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ bud med sbrum ma mngal lci bar gyur pa/ de ji lta ji lta bur lus nam bskyed na cher snyoms par 'gyur te/ chags pas
159a4(brgyad stong): dad pa cher mi 'gyur/ kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur rmug pa dang / gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ smra ba nyung bar 'gyur/ stobs chung bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal
159a5(brgyad stong): ba mang bar 'gyur/ 'chag pa la yun ring du mi gnas par 'gyur/ grogs 'grogs pa la dad pa che bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la
159a6(brgyad stong): bgyid pa ston cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba lus kyi myong ngo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mtshan ma 'di dag 'da' ba'i slad du/ bud
159a7(brgyad stong): med 'di ni ring por mi thogs par bu 'byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
159a8(brgyad stong): smin pa 'di ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyen pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ nyan pa na de na dga' zhing shes
159b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don du gnye ba'i sems skye na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
159b2(brgyad stong): byang chub tu ring por mi thogs par lung snyan pa thob par 'gyur ba 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
159b3(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu legs so legs so// sha ri'i bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod spobs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
159b4(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
159b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar legs par yongs su gtad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
159b6(brgyad stong): ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i
159b7(brgyad stong): don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang me rnams la snying brtse ba can dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
159b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'dod pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'dod pa'o//
160a1(brgyad stong): @rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ ji ltar shes
160a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
160a3(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la
160a4(brgyad stong): ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spod
160a5(brgyad stong): do// gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/
160a6(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos yang dag par rjes su mi
160a7(brgyad stong): mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// rab 'byor
160a8(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab
160b1(brgyad stong): ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab po/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces byas
160b2(brgyad stong): par mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis
160b3(brgyad stong): mi khyab ces bya bar mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
160b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sem
160b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par 'gyur ba gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
160b6(brgyad stong): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprad pa lags/ ji ltar na spyad par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
160b7(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mi rtog/ mi 'jig pa rnams la mi rtog/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la
160b8(brgyad stong): mi rtog/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis
161a1(brgyad stong): mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod
161a2(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de spyad par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i zhing spyad par 'gyur
161a3(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ming thob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dag pa'i
161a4(brgyad stong): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
161a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni yang dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
161a6(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la bar chad bgyid pa mang du mi 'byung ba
161a7(brgyad stong): 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
161a8(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
161b1(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba'i bar chad byed pa mang du 'byung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rigs
161b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa
161b3(brgyad stong): dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la bdud sdig can dag bar chad bya bar brtson par byed de/ ci ste/ lo gcig gi 'dris par gyur na
161b4(brgyad stong): yang myur du bris pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
161b5(brgyad stong): 'di lta bu ni yod de/ gang rin po che chen po yin par chad byed pa mang du 'byung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
161b6(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa la bdud
161b7(brgyad stong): sdig can bar chad bgyi bar spro ba chen po skyes nas brtson par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161b8(brgyad stong): 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa la bdud sdig can byas bya bar brtson pa ni/ 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang yid ma mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po la bar chad mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
162a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab
162a3(brgyad stong): tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / bdud sdig can bar chad bgyid pa la spro ba skye bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar na rigs kyi
162a4(brgyad stong): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa
162a5(brgyad stong): dang / lcang nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'bri bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis shes
162a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa
162a7(brgyad stong): dang / yi ger 'bri bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu rigs
162a8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
162b1(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang
162b2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162b3(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba 'di la
162b4(brgyad stong): dgongs par 'gyur/ yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
162b5(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom
162b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs par 'gyur/ yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su gzung ba'i
162b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la bar chad mi nus so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces
162b8(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
163a1(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / de bzhin nyid du
163a2(brgyad stong): slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas
163a3(brgyad stong): kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
163a4(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur te/ de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
163a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
163a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol
163a7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang /
163a8(brgyad stong): yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
163b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu
163b2(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag ni/
163b3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzig
163b4(brgyad stong): so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi rnam par gzigs te/ thos shing bris pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par byas pa dang /
163b5(brgyad stong): bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byas nas/ de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de
163b6(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris
163b7(brgyad stong): nas 'chang ngam/ de bzhin nyid du slob/ de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin nyid du mi slob/ de bzhin nyid du
163b8(brgyad stong): mi bsgrub/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed par de bzhin nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ sha ri'i
164a1(brgyad stong): bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gzig
164a2(brgyad stong): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag 'bad pa dang / g.yo ba de dag kyang don chen po dang ldan par
164a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi don dam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la yang dag
164a4(brgyad stong): pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rtogs par bya bas nye bar gnas so// sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
164a5(brgyad stong): 'das pa nas/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus na/ lho phyogs su 'byung / lho phyogs nas kyang slar mtha' 'khor du 'byung / mtha' 'khob nas kyang byang phyogs su
164a6(brgyad stong): 'byung ste/ chos 'dul ba'i snying por gyur pa ni ma yin no// sha ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
164a7(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs so// sha ri'i bu
164a8(brgyad stong): de tha na yi ger bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin
164b1(brgyad stong): gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzig so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzig so//
164b2(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang phyogs dang / byang phyogs gnas su rgyas par
164b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la sha ri'i bu byang phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi gnas de na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
164b4(brgyad stong): nyan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnal 'byor du byed de/ sha ri'i gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang /
164b5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / nye bar
164b6(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
164b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs dang / byang
164b8(brgyad stong): phyogs kyis gnas na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
165a1(brgyad stong): ton bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / nye bar ston par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a2(brgyad stong): chen po de dag mang ngam/ ji snyed gcig mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang phyogs dang byang phyogs kyi gnas na/ byang
165a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du yod mod kyi/ mang po de dag kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
165a4(brgyad stong): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang /
165a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yang dag par
165a6(brgyad stong): zhum par mi 'gyur/ yid mi sod/ yid bsod par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi skrag/ mi dngang / shin du dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i
165a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ches nyung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
165a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su dri ba byas pa'o// gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
165b1(brgyad stong): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'chad do// de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed par
165b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid las brtsams te/ skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
165b3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la nga nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam byas so// de dag ni tshe rabs rjes kyang
165b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang ldan pa la yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtsams nas
165b5(brgyad stong): nyid kyi gtam byed par 'gyur/ de nyid kyi gtam la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de dag rab tu gnas shing mnyam par 'gyur/
165b6(brgyad stong): bdud kyis kyang dbye bar mi nus na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gzhan dag gis 'dod pa dang / gsang ste snyam pas dbye ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
165b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mthu bstan pa'i phyir ro// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ba'i rigs
165b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'di lta ste skye bo mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
166a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nga la mngon sum du tshig 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ srog chag
166a2(brgyad stong): brgya phrag mang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par gzung bar bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan
166a3(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o// yang dag par gzer bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// yang dag par rab tu dbye bar bgyi'o// slar mi ldog par bgyi'o//
166a4(brgyad stong): zhes smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu gang gis tshig 'di skad du smras pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de dag la yang
166a5(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su yid rang bar byas so// ngas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sems la sems kyis brtags nas byang chub tu spyod pa na/ srog chags
166a6(brgyad stong): rgya phrag mang po dang / srogs chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
166a7(brgyad stong): bzung bar bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bya'o// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya'o// yang dag par 'dzin du bzhugs
166a8(brgyad stong): par bya'o// yang dag par rab tu dbye bar bya'o// snyam du sems dpa' rjes su yi rang bar byas so// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mos pa brgya
166b1(brgyad stong): chen po dang ldan pa yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du yang lhag par dmigs par bya bar sems te/ gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
166b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du chos ston pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las mngon sum du shes rab kyi
166b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rgya cher nyan cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srogs chags
166b4(brgyad stong): brgya stong phrag mang po de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa

166b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
166b7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi 'das pa dang / ma byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos 'di dag la/ ma gzigs pa dang / mngon par mi mkhyen pa gang yang ma mchis so//
166b8(brgyad stong): rnam par mkhyen pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so// 'di ltar ma byung ba'i chos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mos pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa
167a1(brgyad stong): phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi sems can gyi sbyong ba rnam par mi mkhyen pa gang yang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar
167a2(brgyad stong): to// gang de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
167a3(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / gang de'i tshe na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi phyir// sems can thams cad kyi
167a4(brgyad stong): don du brtson pa bskyed do// tshol zhing yongs su tshol bar gyur la/ tshol ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni
