167a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la ma gzigs pa 'am/ mi mkhyen pa gang yang med// sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa
167a8(brgyad stong): kha cig gis ni yongs su btsal kyang mi rnyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni yongs su ma btsal kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
167b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sngon gyi mtha' na brtson pa ma bor bar btsal cing yongs su btsal bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang
167b2(brgyad stong): 'dod pas/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su ma btsal bar yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de las gzhan pa'i mdo shes rab kyi pha
167b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi don mngon par brjod pa de dag kyang bdag nyid dag gi drung du nye bar 'ong zhing gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de
167b4(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di brtson pa ma bor bar tshol zhing yongs su tshol bas/ de skye
167b5(brgyad stong): ba 'phos shing / tshe rabs rjes kyang she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur te/ mdo sde ma yin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang bdag
167b6(brgyad stong): nyid de'i drung du 'ong zhi bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
167b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ gzhan dag la ma lagaso//
167b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu mdo sde zab mo gzhan ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bdag nyid rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhol bar
168a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
168a2(brgyad stong): chub tu yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
168a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de la slob par 'gyur na/ sha ri'i bu de dag skye ba 'phos nas kyang / stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / mi dmigs pa
168a4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di la gzhol zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las//
168a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
168a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag gi yon tan dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu brjod na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bar du
168a7(brgyad stong): gcod pa la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
168a8(brgyad stong): stsal to// rab 'byor bar chad byed pa'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bar du gcod/
168b1(brgyad stong): pa bgyid pa'i bdud kyi las mang po ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes
168b2(brgyad stong): rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa 'chad pa de dag gi spobs pa ring po zhig na/ 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ni bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
168b3(brgyad stong): 'byor spobs pa de skyes na yang g.yeng bar 'gyur te/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gleng zhing yi ger 'dri na/ 'di yang bdud
168b4(brgyad stong): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor sems g.yeng bas kun chub par byed na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pas
168b5(brgyad stong): gzhan dang ldan pas yi ge 'dri na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dran pa mi thob na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// /
168b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor phan tshun gzhad gad zer zhing yi ger 'bri na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun ku co byed zhing yi ger 'dri na/
168b7(brgyad stong): 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mig yeng zhing yi ger 'bri na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yi ger 'bri ba
168b8(brgyad stong): dag phan tshun mi mthun par gyur na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gis 'di'i gting mi snyed do// ro ma myod do// zhes stan
169a1(brgyad stong): / las langs te 'gro ba 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lung ma bstan
169a2(brgyad stong): te zhes sems ma dad pas bstan las langs te 'gro ba 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang /
169a3(brgyad stong): grong brdal gyi ming yang 'dir ma spros/ bdag gi pha'i ming dang / rigs kyang 'dir ma spros/ bdag gang du skyes pa'i rigs kyang ma smos so snyam nas shes rab
169a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi nyan par sems shing / de de nas 'gro bar sems na/ de ji lta ji lta bur sems bskyed pa de dag gis 'gro bar sems pa de snyed du rnal 'byor du bya
169a5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor ba'i bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi nyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
169a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag la nges par mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
169a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun du bsdud pa 'di spangs zhing bor
169a8(brgyad stong): nas/ mdo sde gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun bsdad pa ma yin pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor de dag ji ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
169b1(brgyad stong): rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la slob par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
169b2(brgyad stong): la mi slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma bslabs pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par mi 'byung ste/ de ltar blo chung
169b3(brgyad stong): ba de dag 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i rtsa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs te/
169b4(brgyad stong): yal ga la 'jug par sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi jo bo las zan blang ba btang ste/ las byed pa'i mi las zan btsal bar sems pa de bzhin du/
169b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ma 'ong ba'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba 'di bor te/
169b6(brgyad stong): nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yal ga dang / 'dab ma lta bu las snying po sangs rgyas nyid btsal bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo chung ba de dag shes
169b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su bsdud par mi shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas de ma yin pa'i mdo
169b8(brgyad stong): sde gang nyan thos kyi sa mngon par bstan pa dag rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par bstan pa de dag la lhag par kun chub par bya bar sems dpa' de dag ni yal ga dang / lo/
170a1(brgyad stong): ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji
170a2(brgyad stong): ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag slob pa de ltar mi slob po// rab 'byor nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
170a3(brgyad stong): theg pa can dag ji ltar slob zhe na/ rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu
170a4(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya snyam ste/ bdag dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa sbyor ba thams cad
170a5(brgyad stong): rtsom ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab
170a6(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyang / de bzhin nyid
170a7(brgyad stong): la dgod par bya ste/ sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las zla'o zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba thams cad byang chub sem
170a8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar brtsoms par bya ste/ sems des kyang rloms sems su mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che ma mthong bar
170b1(brgyad stong): skyes bu la la zhig glang po che'i kha dog dang / dbyibs tshol te/ des mun khung na glang po che zhig rnyed nas snang ba ga la ba der btags te/ btags nas glang po che'i
170b2(brgyad stong): rjes su btsal bar sems shing / glang po che'i rjes las glang po che'i kha dog dang / dbyibs rtogs par byed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de
170b3(brgyad stong): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
170b4(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes/ mi 'dri zhing de spangs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
170b5(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang nyan thos kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar
170b6(brgyad stong): sems pa de dag de lta bur rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu rin po che tshol ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po mthong na/ der mi 'jug cing rin po che dag
170b7(brgyad stong): la mi sems mi dmigs te/ rin po che la ba lang gi mig rjes kyi nang du 'tshol bar sems/ ba glang gi rmi rjes kyi chu dang / rgya mtsho chen por mtshungs par sems na/
170b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
171a1(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed na/
171a2(brgyad stong): ma rtogs shing mi rnyed pas 'dor bar byed de/ brtson pa chung ba la gnas par 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
171a3(brgyad stong): sa mngon par ston pa de dag btsal bar sems pa de dag ni de lta bur rig par bya ste/ gang las byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bsngags pa mi 'byung ba la bdag cag cig
171a4(brgyad stong): bu dul bar bya'o// zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i nang du yang dag par bzhag pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong
171a5(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya'o// rang byang chub thob par bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la len pa med par
171a6(brgyad stong): zag pa rnams las sems yongs su grol bar yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o// zhes 'byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rab
171a7(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
171a8(brgyad stong): po la yang dag par zhugs shing / go cha chen po bgos pa yin te/ de dag gis ni nam 'du shes yang spro ba chung ngu la sems mi bskyed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam
171b1(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni 'jig rten yongs su 'dren pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa yin te/ de bas na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o// rab
171b2(brgyad stong): 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rgyal po dang / mkhar gyi rgyal por mtshungs par bya bar sems pa'i skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/
171b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems
171b4(brgyad stong): dpa'i thag pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing bris/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang / shes
171b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa dag
171b6(brgyad stong): 'byung ba 'di 'am/ rab 'byor 'di'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'
171b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes nga mi smra ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems
171b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang bshad pa de la bslab par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
172a1(brgyad stong): tu nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ma yin pa'i mdo sde gzhan dag las byang chub tu bsgrub par 'byung ba ni bul ba yin no// /
172a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan yon de dag gzigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ji ltar
172a3(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam ste/ rnam grangs du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab
172a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par ston/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par 'dzud/ yang
172a5(brgyad stong): dag par 'god do// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa chen po thob cing bsgrubs nas de bor te/ yang phyir mi ldog pa'i yongs su
172a6(brgyad stong): btsal bar sems na/ de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
172a7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu bkres pa zhig gis kha zas ro brgya bzhun phan bzhun bde ba tshe mthar thug pa'i bar du bkres pa dang /
172a8(brgyad stong): sgom pa zlog pa zhig rnyed la des de bor te/ zhag drug bcu'i 'bras chen btsal bar sems shing / kha zas ro brgya pa bor te/ zhag drug bcu'i 'bras chen za bar
172b1(brgyad stong): sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can bzhin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
172b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa blo chung ba/ lhag pa'i bsam
172b3(brgyad stong): bzhan pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag mi shes shing / khong du chud pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bor te/ mdo sde gang dag nyan
172b4(brgyad stong): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor 'di yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'di
172b5(brgyad stong): lta de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shing mkhan nam/ shing mkhan gyi slob ma zhig rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du
172b6(brgyad stong): khang pa byed par 'dod/ bsgrub par 'dod nas/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal yas khang gi tshad dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su 'tshol te/ de yongs su tshol bas/
172b7(brgyad stong): nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhal yas khang mthong ba dang / de dag gi tshad gzung bar bya ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
172b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
173a1(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtang
173a2(brgyad stong): nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su tshol bar sems te/ mdo sde gang bdag gcig pu
173a3(brgyad stong): dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes mngon par ston pa bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / zhi ba dang /
173a4(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las mnga' ba thob par byed pa de lta bu'i mdo sde dag yongs su tshol zhing de lta bur slob par sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sem
173a5(brgyad stong): dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
173a6(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye bu zhig 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bar 'dod la/ 'khor
173a7(brgyad stong): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste/ mthong nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul 'dri 'dra'o zhes mtshan mar
173a8(brgyad stong): gzung nas mkhar gyi rgyal po mthong na/ ngas mkhar gyi rgyal po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / mtshan ma bzung ste/ bye brag shes par mi nus la/
173b1(brgyad stong): 'di skad du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / mtshan ma 'di 'dra'o zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang
173b2(brgyad stong): 'khor los sgyur ba la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor nas/ nyan thos
173b3(brgyad stong): kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag btsal bar sems shing / mdo sde gang de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs
173b4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / mngon par ston pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'/
173b5(brgyad stong): de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
173b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di'ang bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang che ba zhig rnyed la/ nor bu rin po
173b7(brgyad stong): che rin thang chung zhing byin chung ba dang / mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab
173b8(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang zag byang
174a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo// rin po che 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs/
174a2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / mtshungs par bya bar sems par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / thabs mkhas pas
174a3(brgyad stong): yongs su btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
174a4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
174a5(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tha na yi ger 'bri ba la yang gang g.yeng bar
174a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i spobs pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe
174a7(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger bri rud las sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
174a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yig 'brur bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar sems shing / yi ge dag
174b1(brgyad stong): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par chags na/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174b2(brgyad stong): 'di yi ger 'bri ba la ljongs yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang /
174b3(brgyad stong): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ skyed mos tshal yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bla ma yid la
174b4(brgyad stong): byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ kun bstan pa yid la byed par 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos kun yid la byed pa dang / la can yid la byed pa dang / smad 'tshong yid la byed pa
174b5(brgyad stong): ngag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bde ba yid la byed pa dang / sdug bsngal yid la byed pa dang / 'jigs pa yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bud med yid la byed pa dang /
174b6(brgyad stong): skyes pa yid la byed pa dang / ma ning yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / snrel zhig yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha ma dang
174b7(brgyad stong): ldan par yid la byed pa dang / spun dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnyen shes dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang /
174b8(brgyad stong): bu mo dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / khyim dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos yid la byed pa dang / mal cha yid la byed pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad yid la byed pa dang
175a1(brgyad stong): 'bral gyi bya ba yid la byed pa dang / 'dod chags yid la byed pa dang / zhe sdang yid la byed pa dang / gti mug yid la byed pa dang / mdza' bshes
175a2(brgyad stong): dang / rtsa lag dang / snag gi gnyen 'tshams dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / dus tshigs yid la byed pa dang / dus bzang po dang / dus ngan pa yid la byed pa dang /
175a3(brgyad stong): klu yid la byed pa dang / rol mo yid la byed pa dang / gar yid la byed pa dang / snyan dag dang / glu tshigs dang / bsrung yid la byas pa dang / bstan bcos yid la byed
175a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / tha snyad yid la byed pa dang / mya ngan yid la byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa yid la byed pa dang / rab 'byor yid la byed pa de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang bdud sdig can
175a5(brgyad stong): nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bar chad byed par 'gyur/ sems g.yeng bar byed par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a6(brgyad stong): chen pos bdud kyi las su 'di dag rtogs par bya ste/ rtogs nas spangs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rgyal po yid la byed pa dang / gzhon nu yid la byed pa dang //
175a7(brgyad stong): glang po yid la byed pa dang / rta yid la byed pa dang / shing rta yid la byed pa dang / yi ge yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su
175a8(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang me yid la byed pa dang / 'dod pa yid la byed pa dang / nor yid la byed pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang/
175b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
175b2(brgyad stong): 'di lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dag gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti
175b3(brgyad stong): dang / tshigs su byed pa dag gis sems la gdung ba byed pa 'di yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
175b4(brgyad stong): de dag rtogs nas rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lung nod pa
175b5(brgyad stong): dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dag la thos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang zab mo zab pa dag yod pa de dag bdud sdig can dge slong
175b6(brgyad stong): gi cha byad du bsgyur nas/ sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di skad du 'di slobs shig/ 'di 'bris shig/ 'di'i lung nos shig/ 'di kha ton gyis shig/ 'di las thams cad
175b7(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes zer na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas de dag la 'dod pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor
175b8(brgyad stong): mdo sde de dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag bshad mod kyi/ de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ma
176a1(brgyad stong): bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag mngon par mi shes pa de dag ni shes
176a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di btang bar sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di btang nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i
176a3(brgyad stong): mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
176a4(brgyad stong): gzhan yang chos nyan pa la dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar 'dod na/ chos smra ba snyoms par 'gyur te/ chos ston par
176a5(brgyad stong): mi 'dod pa 'di 'ang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba snyoms par byed cing /
176a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par 'dod na/ chos nyan pa bya ba dang ldan par gyur pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
176a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa 'dun pa dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar 'dod/ bcang bar 'dod/ kun chub par byed par 'dod cing //
176a8(brgyad stong): rtogs pa dang ldan dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur na/ chos smras pa yul gzhan du btang na/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba
176b1(brgyad stong): la tshogs pa dang / mi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan/
176b2(brgyad stong): yang chos smra ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par 'dod/ klog tu bzhugs par 'dod na/ chos mnyan pa yul gzhan du zhugs par gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di yang
176b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba zang zing lhar byed/ gos lhur byed/ rnyed pa
176b4(brgyad stong): lhur byed par 'gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni sbyin par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa dang / yi ger bri ba la tshogs
176b5(brgyad stong): ba dang mi ldan par gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos
176b6(brgyad stong): mnyan pa la dad cing sbyin par 'dod/ nor yongs su btang bar 'dod na/ chos kyi rab tu gyur par smra ba la mdo sde de dag med de/ mi 'jug na/ chos mnyan pa
176b7(brgyad stong): chog ma shes par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la
176b8(brgyad stong): tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
177a1(brgyad stong): yang chos smra bal 'chad par 'dod la/ chos mnyan pa nyan mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya ba dang /
177a2(brgyad stong): kun chub par bya ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang / mnyan pa la tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
177a3(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba gnyid che zhing lus lci bar 'gyur te/ de lus lci ba de dang ldan par lus sgoms pa de dag ldan
177a4(brgyad stong): pas/ byA chad mi 'dod par 'gyur la/ chos mnyan pa ni nyan 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byur 'di yang yi ger brib dang / klag pa dang / kun chu par bya bra la tshas/
177a5(brgyad stong): pa dang mi ldan par gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab
177a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa yi ger 'bri ba rjo/ slob pa la 'azhig der 'ongs nas sems can dmyal de'i mi bsngags pa brjod/ dud 'gro'i ste gnas dang yi
177a7(brgyad stong): dgas ni tshul gyi bsngags pa brjod/ sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba'o// drung 'dra'i skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal pa'o// yid dgas kyi
177a8(brgyad stong): yul ni 'od lur sdug bsngal palo// lha ma yin gyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba'o// 'du byed rnams ni 'di ltar sdug pasngal palo// 'di nyid du sdug bcwan
177b1(brgyad stong): mthar dbyung ngo zhes zer na/ rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyis las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes
177b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa la la zhig der 'ongs nas/ lha'i sngags brjod de/ lha rnams 'di ltar skyed do// mtho rig ni 'di ltar bde'o//
177b3(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i khams ni 'di ltar bstan no// gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams ni 'di ltar mnyam par gzhag go// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
177b4(brgyad stong): rnams ni 'di ltar mnyam par bzhag go/ 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol brtags nas skye ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad
177b5(brgyad stong): du dge slong dag se gol gtogs pa srid par 'grub pa nga mi ston na 'dus byas thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ srid par sod pa thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ kham
177b6(brgyad stong): gsum pa thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar de dag thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur chos
177b7(brgyad stong): can du rig par byas nas/ mkhas pa dag gis 'di nyid du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o// lan gcig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs
177b8(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa 'di nyid thob par bya'o// yang dag par phun sum tshogs pa sdug bsngal ba mang po de dag dang / phrad par 'gyur ta re zhes gsung
178a1(brgyad stong): so// zhes zer zhing / de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis skyo bar byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
178a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba gang yin pa de dag 'khor lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de dag 'di skad du gang la bstan
178a3(brgyad stong): par byed pa de la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sbyin no// gang la bstan par byed pa de dag la ni sbyin no zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de dag de ltar
178a4(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus pas chos smra ba la gus par byed par 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de gang na mu ge dang / grub pa dang / bde ba med pa dang /
178a5(brgyad stong): srog gi bar chad du 'gyur bar yod pa de dag der 'gro bar 'gyur te/ chos mnyan pa de dag kyang gzhan las thos nas/ phyogs de na mu ge byung ste/ grub pa
178a6(brgyad stong): dang bde ba med cing / phyogs der srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur ro zhes thos la/ chos smra ba de yang rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dag phyogs
178a7(brgyad stong): 'di zhes bya bar mu ge'i 'jigs pa byung ste/ khyed der dong na mu ge'i 'jigs pas phyis 'gyod ta re/ zhes zer nas de ltar chos smra ba des thabs zab mos slong
178a8(brgyad stong): ba ste/ de dag kyang yid byung nas/ 'di ltar shes te/ 'di dag ni spangs pa'i mtshan ma yin gyis/ 'di dag ni sbyin pa 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yin te/ 'di ni
178b1(brgyad stong): sbyin pa mi 'dod do snyam nas/ bsnyen par mi byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la tshogs
178b2(brgyad stong): pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dge
178b3(brgyad stong): slong chos smra ba de gang na srog chags kyi 'jigs pa yod pa dang / gang na gcan zan gyi 'jigs pa yod pa dang / gang na mi ma yin pas 'jigs pa der ches te/
178b4(brgyad stong): 'gro 'am/ 'dug na yang gcan zan gyi 'jigs pa dang / grog sbyar gyi dgon pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa gang yod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de chos nyan pa
178b5(brgyad stong): de dag la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dag shes par gyis shig/ da ni yul gang na srog chags kyi 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gyi 'jigs pa dang / sha za'i
178b6(brgyad stong): 'jigs pa dang / grog sbyar gyi dgon pa dang / mi rgod kyi dgon pa dang / chu'i dgon pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa gang na yod pa der 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu dag
178b7(brgyad stong): shes par gyis shig/ khyed sdug bsngal 'di dag myong bar nus zhes zer zhing de dag thabs phra mos spong bar nus zhes/ de nas de dag kyang yid byung bar
178b8(brgyad stong): gyur to// yid byung nas de la bsnyen pa mi byed cing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ge
179a1(brgyad stong): 'dri ba la bar chad byed par 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
179a2(brgyad stong): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba de mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim la 'du bar 'gyur te/ de mdza' bshes
179a3(brgyad stong): kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim la 'dug des rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo gter ba'i khyim la blta bar sems so// de rtag tu lta ba des
179a4(brgyad stong): bya ba mang po'i phyir chos nyan pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ro// nga cung zad blta bar bya ba zhig yod do// cung zad 'gro dgos pa zhig yod do zer na/ rab 'byor 'di
179a5(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger bri ba dang / kun chub par bya ba la tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'
179a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar bdud sdig can ci na nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su'ang 'dzin pa dang /
179a7(brgyad stong): kun chub par mi byed pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang / mi klog pa dang / mi ston pa dang / yi ger mi 'dri ba de ltar de dang de dag gis brtsol bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
179a8(brgyad stong): de lta bas na/ bar chad ji snyed tshogs pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
179b1(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di ltar bdud sdig
179b2(brgyad stong): can ni ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par mi bgyid pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang mi klog pa dang / mi ston pa dang /
179b3(brgyad stong): yi ger mi 'dri ba de dag de lta bur thabs su sbyong zhing / 'bad pa ched stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
179b4(brgyad stong): skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes so// de bzhin
179b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ni/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'o zhes
179b6(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa spong bar 'byung ngo // nyon mongs pa spangs pa las ni/ bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed do// ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal gyis gzer cing mi yi
179b7(brgyad stong): mug ste/ mya ngan gyi zug du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'bri ba dang / kun chub par byed pa rab tu mi dga' zhing
179b8(brgyad stong): 'bad pa chen pos brtson pa cher byed de/ ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri zhing / kun chub par mi byed pa de lta bur thabs su sbyor zhing brtson par
180a1(brgyad stong): n+ya/ byed do// rab 'byor bdud sdig can dge sbyong gi cha byed du 'ongs nas/ 'bral bar byed cing 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag theg pa la gsar
180a2(brgyad stong): du zhugs pa dag 'bral bar byed de/ gang khyod nyan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ ji ltar nga'i mdo sde'i nang du chud pa mdo sde'i nang du gtogs
180a3(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// zhes rab 'byor bdud sdig can the tsom zar 'jug ste/ rab 'byor de ltar bdud sdig can dge sbyong gi cha byed du
180a4(brgyad stong): 'ongs nas dbye ba byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i blo chung ba/ blo zhan pa/ blo dman pa/ dngos por gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang
180a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa la gsar du 'jug go// de dag the tsom du gyur nas she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi 'dzin/ kun chub par
180a6(brgyad stong): mi Sh+ya/ mi 'chang / bzlog/ mi ma/ 'igar mi 'dri bar 'gyur te/ rang 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas bdud kyi rdzas su rig pa
180a7(brgyad stong): byang bzha yang 'drang sdig pa dge slong gi sa byed du 'angs nas/ byang chub ses dpa blang tsas zang mo ngas la sa byung nga/ 'ang dag pa'i bar
180a8(brgyad stong): mngon du rgyang cing dra nyan thos su gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpar mi 'gyur ro// zhes bdud kyi las nye bar sbyor/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
180b1(brgyad stong): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / kun chub par byed pa la bdud sdig can gyis/
180b2(brgyad stong): las gzhan dang gzhan dag mang du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtogs par bya'o// rtogs nas yongs su spang bar bya'o//
180b3(brgyad stong): sten par mi bya'o// brtson 'grus brtsams shing dran pa dang ldan par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
180b4(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de gang lags
180b5(brgyad stong): pa de dag la dgra mang ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste rnyed par dka' zhing rin che ba'i skad du de/ de dag dbyigs lags pas na/ de'i slad du de dag la
180b6(brgyad stong): dgra mang por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'ang phal cher bar du gcod pa mang du 'byung ste/ de la gang dag par
180b7(brgyad stong): du gcod pa'i dbang gis le lo can 'gyur zhing / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi gzung bar sems pa dang / kun chub par mi bya ba dang / mi 'chang
180b8(brgyad stong): ba dang / mi klog pa dang / kha ton du mi bya ba dang / rab tu mi 'don pa dang / lung mi nod pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / tha na yi ger mi 'dri bar sems dpa'i byang
181a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lags pa
181a2(brgyad stong): dang / de dag blo chung ba dang / blo dman pa lags pa dang / de dag blo zhan pa lags pa dang / blo phyin ci log pa lags pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po/
181a3(brgyad stong): rgya chen po dag la sems mi 'jug par rig par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
181a4(brgyad stong): stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi bzung bar sems dpa' dang / kun chub par mi bya ba dang / mi 'chang ba dang /
181a5(brgyad stong): mi klog pa dang / kha ton mi bya ba dang / rab tu mi 'don pa dang / lung mi nod pa dang / mi ston pa dang / tha na yi ger mi 'bri bar sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa
181a6(brgyad stong): de dag ni rab 'byor bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs par rig par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag theg pa la yang gsar du zhugs pa yin no// de dag ni
181a7(brgyad stong): blo chung ba rnams yin no// de dag ni blo dman pa rnams yin no// de dag ni blo zhan pa rnams yin no// de dag ni blo phyin ci log pa rnams yin no// de dag ni sangs/
181a8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis chos rgya chen po dag la sems mi 'jug par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar bdud kyi nyes pa dang / bar du gcod pa mang du 'byung mod kyi/ rab 'byor
181b1(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar sems shing kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang bar bya ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
181b2(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / tha na yi ger bri bar sems na yang / rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
181b3(brgyad stong): gyis brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su bzung bas de dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed
181b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / rab tu 'don par bya ba dang / lung nod par byed pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
181b5(brgyad stong): 'di la bdud sdig can yang bar chad bya ba'i phyir brtson pa cher byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yongs
181b6(brgyad stong): su gzung ba'i phyir brtson pa cher mdzad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bdud kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gcig pa'o//
181b7(brgyad stong): / bam po bcu gnyis pa//
181b8(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ bud med cig la bu mang ba yad de/ lnga'ag/ zul/
182a1(brgyad stong): nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am stong yod la de dag gis ma na bar gyur na/ de dag bdag cag gis/
182a2(brgyad stong): ma ci nas kyang srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas lus ma rungs par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi ma ci nas ring du gnas par 'gyur ba
182a3(brgyad stong): dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas nyam nyes par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi ma ci nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ba dang / 'di la mi bde bar reg pa la
182a4(brgyad stong): gnas pa dang / lus la yid du mi 'ong ba mi 'byung bar 'bad cing rtsol lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dis ni bdag cag bskyed de/ 'di ni bka' ba byed pa bdag
182a5(brgyad stong): cag gi srog sbyin pa dang / 'jig rten kun du ston pa yin no zhes 'di sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi reg pa gang yang byung da re zhes/ bu de dag
182a6(brgyad stong): ma de la bde bar sbyar thams cad kyis legs par bzung ba 'dzin/ legs par sba bas sbed/ legs par bcos pas 'chos shing 'di'i mig gang / rna ba ma/
182a7(brgyad stong): sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid la rlung ngam/ 'khris pa 'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa 'am/ sbrang bu 'am/ sha sbrang ngam/ grog sbur ram/ mi 'am/
182a8(brgyad stong): mi ma yin pa 'am/ nyam thag pa dang / ye 'brog gam/ mi 'dod pa 'byung ba lus la byung ba da re zhes de ltar bur de dag ma de la bsams te/ bde bas sbyar
182b1(brgyad stong): pa thams cad kyis/ 'di ni bdag cag gis ma bskyed pa 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes 'chos shing sbed la bdag gir byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
182b2(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dgongs te/ gang 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
182b3(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa
182b4(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / dgongs pa las 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na de
182b5(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed skye bo mang mo la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs
182b6(brgyad stong): brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/
182b7(brgyad stong): 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dgongs ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci nas kyang ring du gnas
182b8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci'i ming du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bdud sdig
183a1(brgyad stong): can nam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dag par bya bar mi 'gyur bar brtson par mdzad do/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
183a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yum ste bskyed pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
183a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las skyes te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
183a4(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ston pa'o// 'jig rten kun bstan pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
183a5(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di las skyes so// rab 'byor 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
183a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
183a7(brgyad stong): la rten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
183a8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ bla na med yang dag/
183b1(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa
183b2(brgyad stong): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde
183b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dag
183b4(brgyad stong): dang / ngathugs brtse ba'i phyir gzhags te/ mtsho zhing bzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
183b5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
183b6(brgyad stong): nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ bla na med
183b7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab gro gyib 'di skad ces gsol to//
183b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di bston pa'o// zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom
183'a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
183'a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'jig rten du gsungs pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
183'a3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor phung po lnga rnams ni de bzhin gshegs par 'jig rten du gsungs so//
183'a4(brgyad stong): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ste/ rab 'byor phung po lnga ni de bzhin
183'a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas phung
183'a6(brgyad stong): po lnga ji ltar bstan/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bstan/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
183'a7(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pas rab tu mi 'jigs pas na/ phung po lnga po ni 'jig rten no zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
183'a8(brgyad stong): bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs rab tu mi 'jigs pas na/ de ltar bstan to// rab 'byor phung po lnga rnams ni ngo bo nyid med pas na/ stong pa nyid
183'b1(brgyad stong): ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni 'jig pa 'am/ rab 'byor 'jigs pas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang /
183'b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du ma byed pa dang / mi skye ba dang / dngos po med pa
183'b3(brgyad stong): dang / chos kyi dbyings mi 'jig rab tu mi 'jig pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor
183'b4(brgyad stong): sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ sems can grangs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dngos po med pa rab tu mkhyen to//
183'b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams/
183'b6(brgyad stong): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
183'b7(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
183'b8(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ces na/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ses
184a1(brgyad stong): can grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs

184a5(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis sems can dpag tu med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de'i ni rnam par mnyam

184b1(brgyad stong): dpag tu med pa dag gis sems bsdus pa rnams sems bsdus po zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji lta ba de bzhin gshegs pas shes/

188a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji ltar ba bzhin tu

188a5(brgyad stong): bral ba'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab
188a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag
188a7(brgyad stong): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag
188a8(brgyad stong): gi zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ces na/ rab 'byor sems kyi bral ba gang yin pa
188b1(brgyad stong): de ni// zhes sdang dang bcas pa ma yin te/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gang yin pa de ni/ sems zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin te/
188b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems rnams
188b3(brgyad stong): zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188b4(brgyad stong): 'di la rten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi sems gti mug dang bcas pa rnams/ sems gti mug dang bcas pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
188b5(brgyad stong): tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi sems gti mug dang
188b6(brgyad stong): bcas pa rnams sems gti mug dang dang bcas pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa
188b7(brgyad stong): de ni/ sems kyi yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin/ sems kyi yang dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor
188b8(brgyad stong): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten nas sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis sems gti mug dang bcas pa rnams/ sems

189a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi gti mug dang bral ba'i sems rnams gti mug dang bral ba'i sems so// zhes yang dag pa
189a3(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi

189a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa rnams/ sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa/

194a7(brgyad stong): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dpag tu med padag gi phye ba dang /

194b2(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de dag thams cad ni gzugs la gnas shing / skye ba dag skye'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin du
194b3(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa la gnas na skye ba dag skye'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
194b4(brgyad stong): tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ phye ba dang btsums pa de dag mkhyen pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzug
194b5(brgyad stong): la rten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi nas mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya
194b6(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
194b7(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi nas mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes/
194b8(brgyad stong): ba la brten pa'o// de bzhin song bshi nas 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// de bzhin song bshinas
195a1(brgyad stong): 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no// zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa ste/ de nyid
195a2(brgyad stong): bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni mi rtag pa ste/ de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di
195a3(brgyad stong): ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag dang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go// zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs
195a4(brgyad stong): la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten
195a5(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te bdag dang / 'jig rten ni rtag pa ste/ 'di ni bden gyi gzhan gyi gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam
195a6(brgyad stong): par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa ste/ 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang
195a7(brgyad stong): 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go// zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig
195a8(brgyad stong): rten ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// /
195b1(brgyad stong): bam po bcu gsum pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mthar
195b2(brgyad stong): dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba
195b3(brgyad stong): 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ mtha' med pa dang
195b4(brgyad stong): bcas pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di gzugs la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa nyid kyang ma
195b5(brgyad stong): yin no// zhes bya ba 'di mtha' med pa yang ma yin no// zhes bya ba 'di mtha' med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid ba dan gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di
195b6(brgyad stong): ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi
195b7(brgyad stong): gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang bcas pa 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya
195b8(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa yang ma yin la mtha' med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni
196a1(brgyad stong): gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa nyid kyi yin/ mtha' med pa yang ma yin no
196a2(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// lus de srog de'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba
196a3(brgyad stong): 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// srog kyang gzhan lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor
196a4(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te/ lus de srog de'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// srog kyang
196a5(brgyad stong): gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
196a6(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang gzhan dpag tu med pa dag gi gzug
196a7(brgyad stong): la rten pa'i phye ba dang btsums pa de dag de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rten pa'i phye ba dang btsums pa de dag yang dag
196a8(brgyad stong): ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan yang dpag tu
196b1(brgyad stong): med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa yang dge pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs mkhyen to// rab 'byor de bzhin/
196b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pas gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mkhyen te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs
196b3(brgyad stong): pas gzugs mkhyen to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen te/ rab
196b4(brgyad stong): 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa
196b5(brgyad stong): mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen te// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
196b6(brgyad stong): la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dpag tu med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de
196b7(brgyad stong): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / phung po'i de bzhin nyid dang / phye ba dang btsums pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gtogs te/ rab 'byor phung po'i de bzhin nyid
196b8(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi yang de bzhin nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
197a1(brgyad stong): phung po lnga ni 'jig rten no// zhes snying du gsungs te/ rang 'byor de lta bsan byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jug rten pa'i yang de ni/
197a2(brgyad stong): nyid do// 'jig rten pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin byed do// thun du zhugs pa'i 'das bu'i de bzhin nyid byung yid pa 'i
197a3(brgyad stong): ni/ lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
197a4(brgyad stong): nyid do// phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid
197a5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
197a6(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid de/ gcig ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / mi zad pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
197a7(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste/ du ma'i dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang bral ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar
197a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi
197b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskyed pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/
197b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// ma log pa'i de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid
197b3(brgyad stong): mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis
197b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ de bzhin nyid ni zab ste/ de bzhin nyid las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub rab dbye'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
197b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dgra bcom pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu lta ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'di la mos par 'gyur//
197b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das zab mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
197b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas zab mo 'di dag mngon par rdzog
197b8(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas bshad de/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de gshegs pas/ gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni mi zad pa ste/ mi zad pa
197b9(brgyad stong): zhe na
198a1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mi zad pa nyid du bstan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
198a2(brgyad stong): rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri dag bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
198a3(brgyad stong): tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
198a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos zab mo dag rab tu bshad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di la mtshan nyid ji ltar bzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag
198a5(brgyad stong): stong pa'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'o smon pa med pa'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go/ lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o//
198a6(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'o// chos kyi dbyings so zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid
198a7(brgyad stong): 'di dag ni mi gnas pa na mkha' dang 'dra ste/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma
198a8(brgyad stong): bzhag ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugs su bgrang ba ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bgrang bar ma yin no//
198b1(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugs la rten pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rten pa ma yin mo// mtshan nyid 'di dan/
198b2(brgyad stong): ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dag gis ma bzhag pa'o// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
198b3(brgyad stong): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na yang mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid 'di dag lag gis bzhag pa yang ma yin no// lha'i bu dag gang zhig 'di
198b4(brgyad stong): skad du na mkha' 'di sus bzhag ces zer na/ lha'i bu dag de ci yang dag pas smra bas sgra 'am/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa
198b5(brgyad stong): dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ni sus kyang ma bzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
198b6(brgyad stong): nam mkha' ni 'dus ma bgyis pa lags te/ sus kyang ma bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag la bka'
198b7(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin nyid du gnas so//
198b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar 'di dag gnas pa de lta bu nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de lta bas na/ lha'i bu dag gi de bzhin gsheg/
199a1(brgyad stong): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i nu
199a2(brgyad stong): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid zab mo 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
199a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes so// chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de
199a4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab
199a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gabye
199a6(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten cing gnas pa ste/ de bzhin du chos de dag kyang rtag tu de
199a7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de dag kyang chos kho na la rten cing gnas so// chos la bkur bstir mdzad do// bla mar mdzad do// ri mor
199a8(brgyad stong): mdzad nga/ mchod do/ brjod do// gsol lo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams shes
199b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur bstir mdzad do// bla mar mdzad do// ri mor mdzad do// mchod par mdzad do// brjod par mdzad do// gsol bar mdzad do// de ci'i
199b2(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/
199b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba rnams yin no// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du/ de bzhin
199b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa ni byas pa bzo ba'o// byas pa tshor ba'o zhes zer na/ yang dag pas smra bas yang dag par smra'o// rab 'byor byas pa gzo ba/ byas pa tshor ba/ zhes bya ba
199b5(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/ theg pa gang dang gang gis gshegs pa dang / lam gang dang gang gis bla na med pa
199b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de nyid dang / lam de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'dzin cing / rjes su sbyong
199b7(brgyad stong): / rab 'byor byas pa gzob dang / byas pa tshor ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang ra
199b8(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byas pa/ ma byas pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// ma sbyar ba ma sbyar ba'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs
200a1(brgyad stong): pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar rig par bya'o// rab
200a2(brgyad stong): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug ste/
200a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten
200a4(brgyad stong): 'di ston pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni
200a5(brgyad stong): ma 'tshal/ mi mthong ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
200a6(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
200a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du chos thams cad mi shes mi mthong ba'o zhes zer ba ni/ rab
200a8(brgyad stong): 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mi shes mi mthong ba'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
200b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad stong pa yin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gnas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chos thams cad ni mi shes mi mthong ba'o// rab 'byor chos de dag thams
200b2(brgyad stong): cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rten nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor de ltar na yang shes rab
200b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// gzugs mi mthong ba dang / tshor ba
200b4(brgyad stong): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba'i phyir/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
200b5(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mthong ba lags/ ji ltar
200b6(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang ji ltar rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs la mi
200b7(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i 'du shes mi skye ba'i tshe/ de ltar gzugs mi mthong ba yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
200b8(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i sems mi skye ba'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba yin no// rab 'byor gzugs mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
201a1(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gzigs so// rab
201a2(brgyad stong): 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di rten pa'o// rab 'byor
201a3(brgyad stong): ji ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rten ston cing / ji ltar 'jig rten smos shes na/ 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten ston to// 'jig rten dben
201a4(brgyad stong): pa'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten rnam par dag pas 'jig rten smos so// 'jig rten zhi ba'o// zhes de ltar 'jig rten rton cing de ltar 'jig rten smos pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
201a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ 'jig rten bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
201a6(brgyad stong): // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsor to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas so//
201a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dpag tu mi mchis pas nye bar gnaso// /
201a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// rab
201b1(brgyad stong): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bya ba gzhal du med pa dang / bya ba dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab
201b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas shes na/ rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang /
201b3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas te/ sems kyis
201b4(brgyad stong): bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la sems las byung ba'i chos mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba gzhal
201b5(brgyad stong): du med pas nye bar gnas shes na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam pa 'am/
201b6(brgyad stong): gzhal bar mi nus te/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di bya ba dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas shes na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
201b8(brgyad stong): dpag tu med pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ang
202a1(brgyad stong): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzhal du ma mchis pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas nyid dang /
202a2(brgyad stong): rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ 'on te gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi
202a3(brgyad stong): khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis khyab pa/
202a4(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ 'on te chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/
202a5(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces gsol to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzugs
202a6(brgyad stong): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bas
202a7(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa'o// rab
202a8(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa/ de la ni sems pa yang med/ sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang med do// rab 'byor gzugs ni gzhal
202b1(brgyad stong): du med pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad gzhal du med pa'o//
202b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs ni dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dpag tu med pa ste/ rab
202b3(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad kyang dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi tshad kyang mi rig go// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
202b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang mi rig ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi tshad kyang mi rig go// rab 'byor ci'i gzugs dpag tu med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
202b5(brgyad stong): 'dre byed rnams dang / rab 'byor ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa dpag tu med/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dpag tu med ce na/ rab 'byor gzugs la tshad med do// rab
202b6(brgyad stong): 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la tshad med do// rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad med do// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs
202b7(brgyad stong): la tshad med/ rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa la tshad med/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad
202b8(brgyad stong): tshad med ce na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ na mkha' la tshang ngam sems sam/ sems las byung ba'i chos
203a1(brgyad stong): gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de
203a2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rnam grangs 'dis chos 'di dag thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/ rab 'byor rnam
203a3(brgyad stong): grangs 'dis chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa ste/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag thams cad ni rnam grangs 'dis chos thams
203a4(brgyad stong): cad kyang bsam gyi mi khyab/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni sems dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzhal ba las 'das pa'i phyir/
203a5(brgyad stong): gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor tshad dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// /
203a6(brgyad stong): nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dpag tu med pa'o// na mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa ste/ chos de dag ni mi 'phrad
203a7(brgyad stong): pa'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na chos de dag ni gzhal du med pa zhes bya'o// na mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// na mkha'
203a8(brgyad stong): gzhal du med pa'i phyir chos de dag gzhal du med pa'o// na mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ chos 'di dag dpag tu med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis/
203b1(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa 'di dag bshad na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las rnam par grol lo// dge slong gnyis stong/
