287a1(brgyad stong): de ltar yid la byed par 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no// de ci phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
287a2(brgyad stong): ni stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib po// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib na/
287a3(brgyad stong): de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba ma mchis par/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas byang chub tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang
287a4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
287a5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi 'grib po// rab 'byor gang ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi
287a6(brgyad stong): 'grib pa de bzhin du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yang stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib po// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel
287a7(brgyad stong): mi 'grib pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems yang stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib pas nas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
287a8(brgyad stong): po yang dag par bsgrub pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems
287b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dbang dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing zhum par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
287b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha
287b3(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi
287b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
287b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de gang yang dmigs sam/ bcom
287b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
287b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
287b8(brgyad stong): chos 'ga' yang stong pa nyid la mchis par dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
288a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ci gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yino// /
288a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
288a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci gzugs las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha
288a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de gang dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
288a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang
288a6(brgyad stong): dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sem
288a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
288a8(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngam/ rab
288b1(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la byang chub sem
288b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
288b3(brgyad stong): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dmig su med pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ chos de skyes bsam/
288b4(brgyad stong): skyes par 'gyur ram/ skye 'am/ 'gags sam/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'gag gam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so// bcom
288b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni de lta bu yin te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i bzod pa
288b6(brgyad stong): de lta bu yid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
288b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i lam 'dir zhugs nas/ de ltar spyod cing de ltar brtson te/ de ltar 'bad nas sangs rgyas kyi
288b8(brgyad stong): ye shes bla na med pa dang / ye shes chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / ded dpon chen po'i ye shes dang / thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do// rab 'byor/
289a1(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyis mi skye ba'i chos gang lags pa re bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
289a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par
289a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci khyod kyis chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
289a4(brgyad stong): lung bstan pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang
289a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung bston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa'i chos de ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan
289a6(brgyad stong): 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba 'am/ chos gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par
289a7(brgyad stong): rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa la/ bdag 'di snyam du chos 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
289a8(brgyad stong): rgya'o// chos 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// chos 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// snyam du mi sems dpa'i slad du'o// shes rab
289b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
289b2(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po// kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
289b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de
289b4(brgyad stong): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni blta bar bka' zhing rtogs par bka' ba ste/ na mkha' zab pa'i
289b5(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa'i phyir lta bka' ba'o// stong pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
289b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing /
289b7(brgyad stong): thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma lags so//
289b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
290a1(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba'i sem
290a2(brgyad stong): can de dag ni ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
290a3(brgyad stong): par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
290a4(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ ka' sha ka rags kyi ba 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab
290a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed
290a6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsod nams de bas ches mang du bskyed do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger
290a7(brgyad stong): 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang // kha ton byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu
290a8(brgyad stong): ma/ rigs kyi nu ma de dge pa'i chu ba gang dang ldan par 'byur ba'i bam mas kyi rung pa 'di la tha ma'i 'jam bu'i rdzing gi sems ca rnams kyi tshul khrim pa las rgya
290b1(brgyad stong): ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba rgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye
290b2(brgyad stong): rgya stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang / dper yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis/
290b3(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang /
290b4(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba des zil gyis mnan to//
290b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po byargya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des sems bskyed pa
290b6(brgyad stong): gcig gis kyang zil gyis mnan na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
290b7(brgyad stong): par byas/ rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur bas lta ci smos/ gang gis thos nas bris shing bzung bcangs/ klags/ kun chub par
290b8(brgyad stong): byas/ rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nos shing bstan te/ kha ton byas nas/ de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa la ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de
291a1(brgyad stong): dag ni/ lha dang mi dang lham du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
291a2(brgyad stong): de dag ni/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi gang yang rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /
291a3(brgyad stong): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291a4(brgyad stong): po de dag ni rgyud du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/
291a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag kyang byang chub
291a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag chen po zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ byang chub
291a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag cing / tshul khrims kyi phung po ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dres mar ma gyur pa dang / lhad ma
291a8(brgyad stong): zhags pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291b1(brgyad stong): chen po de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par dag pa dang ldan pa dag zil gyi gnon cing 'gro bar ma
291b2(brgyad stong): zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ zhi ba phun sum tshogs pa/ chung ngu na sdong dum mes tshig pa la yang gnod pa'i sems mi skyes la/ shes
291b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
291b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa zhi ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sems khong khro ba med pa dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
291b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus rtsams pa/ le lo med pa/ ma zham pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / bral ba dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
291b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' brtson 'grus brnams pa la lo long ba/ gdus pa'i bus dang sha dang / yid kyilas kyi mapa' dang lda pa dan zil khyim gar cing kri bar ma
291b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' gang bsam gtan la mos pa/ bsam gtan gyi stobs can/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bsam gtan la dbang ba/ shes rab
292a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnon
292a2(brgyad stong): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la spyod pa dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon
292a3(brgyad stong): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can thams cad dang / thabs la mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
292a4(brgyad stong): po rnams zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ de dag ni zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
292a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
292a6(brgyad stong): pa'i rig mi chad par bya ba'i phyir zhags pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyang ring du mi byed par 'gyur ro//
292a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di de ltar nan tan byed na/ byang chub kyi snying po dang mi mthun par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
292a8(brgyad stong): 'di de ltar slob na/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ byang chub
292b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob po/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la mi slob po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
292b2(brgyad stong): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i drung du/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i rgyal po bzhi 'ongs nas/ 'di skad ces zer te/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du byang chub sems
292b3(brgyad stong): rapa'i bslab pa la slobs shig/ la gor slobs shig/ gang khyod byang chub kyi byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
292b4(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas/ blang bar bya ba'i lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag yin no zhes zer ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
292b5(brgyad stong): drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi mchis par sems te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du 'chi bar sems na/ lha'i bu gzhan dag lta ci
292b6(brgyad stong): smos/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang rtag tu dgongs par 'gyu ro// byang chub
292b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ba dang / pha rol gyi gnon pa gang yang rung ba byung na/
292b8(brgyad stong): de dag dang de la yong ye mi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i
293a1(brgyad stong): yon tan lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems te/ ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di bdag nyid kyi spobs pas
293a2(brgyad stong): sgra 'am/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra snyam mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes
293a3(brgyad stong): na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus rig par bya'o// 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ni
293a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya ste/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ smra mi nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'das
293a5(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' ba ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
293a6(brgyad stong): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bshad pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
293a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / bam po nyi shu pa//
293a8(brgyad stong): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
293b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa de'i tshe/ kun dga' bo stong /
293b2(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud de dag thams cad 'di ltar dogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ci bar ma dor
293b3(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed dam/ 'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
293b4(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mo// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gnas pa'i tshe/
293b5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo bdud dag mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
293b6(brgyad stong): pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de'i tshe/ bdad sdig can dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'tshe bar byed de/ ci
293b7(brgyad stong): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang / des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
293b8(brgyad stong): de'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang zad par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'byin cing phyogs su thar pa lta bu dag kyi gtong zhing ston to// kun dga' bo byang chub
294a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi thad du bdud sdig can 'che bar sems zhing mi 'ong ste/ kha cig gi drung du ni 'ong ngo // kha cig gi
294a2(brgyad stong): drung du ni mi 'ong ngo // kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu'i drung du/ bdud sdig can brtse bar sems
294a3(brgyad stong): shing mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la mos par
294a4(brgyad stong): sems ma bskyed par gyur na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bdud sdig can brtse bar sems shing 'ong ste/ klags kyang rnyed par
294a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la/ 'di shes rab kyi pha
294a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ ma yin snyam du the tshom za bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo da ltar the tsom skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud sdig can brtse bar sems shing
294a7(brgyad stong): 'ong ste/ de la klags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pos
294a8(brgyad stong): yongs su zin par gyur la/ zab mo zab pa'i gnas dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bshad pa la mi mnyan te/ mnyan pas mi shes so// mi shes pas ji
294b1(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya zhes mi 'dri ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la yang bdud sdig can brtse bar sems shing /
294b2(brgyad stong): 'ongs te/ de la klags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa 'dzin pa la sbyor bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni bdag gi
294b3(brgyad stong): grogs po don bya ba thams cad la yang ma 'dor ro// bdag gis grogs po byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang du yod kyang de dag ni bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
294b4(brgyad stong): mi byed de/ 'di ni bdag dang 'thun pa'i grogs shig rnyed kyis/ 'di ni bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di la
294b5(brgyad stong): yang bdud sdig can brtse bar sems shing 'ong ste/ klags kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
294b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ khyod la 'di mnyan pas ci
294b7(brgyad stong): zhig bya/ mdo sde dag las de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bshad pa ltar rung snyam yang mi byed de/ kho bos ni 'di'i gting mi rnyed na/ khyod la 'di mnyan pa 'am/ bris
294b8(brgyad stong): pas ci zhig bya zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' gzhan gang dag kyang de ltar bral byed de/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di la yang bdud sdig can brtse bar sem/
295a1(brgyad stong): shing 'ongs te/ klags kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas par byed
295a2(brgyad stong): cing / bdag ni dben par spyod cing gnas te/ gzhan dag ni dben par spyod pas mi gnas so// gzhan dag la ni dben pas gnas par med do snyam nas/ de'i tshe bdud sdig
295a3(brgyad stong): can dga' mgu yid rangs par gyur cing / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ sems dga' zhing rab tu mtshim pa skyes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
295a4(brgyad stong): zhe na/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyang ring du byed snyam mo// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas smos pa 'am/ rus
295a5(brgyad stong): pa nas smos pa 'am/ spangs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de'i tshe/ de de tsam gyis de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa'i chos can
295a6(brgyad stong): gzhan dag la brnyes par byed cing / de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa gang dag gi yon tan ji snyed
295a7(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang / rnam pa gang yin pa dang / rtags gang yin pa dang / mtshan ma gang yin pa de dag med do// de dag de la med bzhin du/ de phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan
295a8(brgyad stong): rnams la nyon mongs pa bskyed de/ da gang la snang ba'i chos de dag la khyed mi snang ngo zhes bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod do// de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/
295b1(brgyad stong): bdud kyi gnas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po zhig par mi 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs/
295b2(brgyad stong): zad par mi 'gyur ba lta snyam nas/ bdud sdig can de lta de lta bur byin gyis brlob ste/ ci na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa dang / bkur stis non pa'i rang bzhin
295b3(brgyad stong): can du 'gyur zhing / tshig btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshig btsun pa des skye bo mang po 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ de dag la skye bo mang po yang mnyan pa dang dad par semaso//
295b4(brgyad stong): mthong ngam thos na yang de dag ltar 'chos shing byed de/ mthong nas de ltar 'chos shing de bzhin du mi slob/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed par 'gyur ro// de dag
295b5(brgyad stong): de ltar de bzhin nyid la slob cing de bzhin nyid la nan tan mi byed pas/ nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar sems kyi rgyud phyin ci log pas lus
295b6(brgyad stong): dang ngag dang yid kyis las ci byed pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sems can dmyal
295b7(brgyad stong): ba chen po de dag zhig par mi 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / bdud kyi gnas rnams zhig par mi 'gyur ro//
295b8(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/ bdud sdig can dga' mgu yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur ro//
296a1(brgyad stong): gzhan yang na dga' bo ma byang chub sems dpa' gang bgazhan thos kyi then pa cad dang 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ babyed par byed/
296a2(brgyad stong): gshe zhing sbyong bar byed/ gnod par sems zhing zhe sdang bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pazhing rlung ring du
296a3(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
296a4(brgyad stong): pa can gzhan dang / 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ gshe zhing spyod par byed gnod par sems shing zhe sdang bskyed na/ de la bdud sdig can shin
296a5(brgyad stong): du dga' mgu yid rangs shing / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur te/ de 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyi ga yang thams cad
296a6(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid las kyang ring du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam du soms so// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' lungs snyan pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sem
296a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po lung bstan pa dang 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ gzhi zhing spyod par byed/ gnod par sems zhing zhe sdang bskyed la/ sems la gnod
296a8(brgyad stong): cing byang chub sems dpa' des gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtang na sems bskyed pa dang / sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi skal bar go cha bgos so// de na
296b1(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyed pa de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang
296b2(brgyad stong): mchis sam/ 'on te skal pa de snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' des gdon mi 'tshal bar go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
296b3(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas par chos ston to// de la kun dga' bo gang
296b4(brgyad stong): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dang thabs shing rtsod pa de bkye nas/
296b5(brgyad stong): gshe zhing spyod pa nod par sems/ zhe sdang bskyed nas 'thol 'tshams mi byed/ phyis sdom pa mi 'dzin la/ 'khon du 'dzin cing 'khon du bzung nas 'dug
296b6(brgyad stong): na/ kun dga' bo gang zag de la 'byung ba yod par mi smra ste/ kun dga' bo gang zag de la phyir yang skal pa de snyed du gdon mi 'tshal go cha bgo bgos so// kun
296b7(brgyad stong): dga' bo gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dang 'thabs shing brtsod de bkye nas/ gshe zhing spyos/
296b8(brgyad stong): gnod par bsam zhe sdang bskyed nas/ 'thol 'tshangs byed/ 'thol 'tshangs byas nas/ phyis kyang sdom pa 'dzin la sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ ci nas bdag
297a1(brgyad stong): gis sems can thams cad kyi brtsod pa bcang par bya ba yin la/ bdag nyid brtsod par byed pa dang / smras pa la yang bdag slar ma smra bar ni
297a2(brgyad stong): ma snyed pa ste/ rnyed pa yin no// ngan par ma yin no// ngan par rnyed pa de legs par ma rnyed do// bdag gis ci nas sems can thams cad kyi za ma lta bur 'gyur bar
297a3(brgyad stong): bya ba yin la/ bdag pha rol khyod ces tshig tu smra 'am/ tshig rtsub pos lan ldon zhing / smra ba 'di ni bdag gis smras par mi bya ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa
297a4(brgyad stong): rnams la bdag ni glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / lkugs pa lta bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// pha rol gyis ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du zer ba rnams smra bar
297a5(brgyad stong): thos kyang / gzhan la ngan sems su mi bya'o// pha rol gyi nyes pa dang / skyon bdag gis shes par bya ba 'di ni bdag la legs pa yin te/ bdag gi mi 'cha' bo//
297a6(brgyad stong): bdag gis gzhan gyi nyes pa'i skyon mi nyan to snyam du bsam pa 'di ni bdag gi mi 'cha'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'khrug par mi
297a7(brgyad stong): bya ste/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad dA'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde
297a8(brgyad stong): bar sbar te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar byed zhing / bdag gis ci gnod sems bskyed dam/ pha rol gyis nyes pa chen po byas pa la yang bdag gis gnod sems
297b1(brgyad stong): mi bya na/ de la bdag 'khrug par lhag la byed de ltar bdag gis mi bya'o// bdag gis bskul bar brtan pas rtul bar bya ba'i srog gi bar byed pa la'ang / bdag
297b2(brgyad stong): 'khrug par mi bya'o// gzhan la khro gnyer ni 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i 'byung ba yin par ngas bshad
297b3(brgyad stong): do// kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams la yang de ltar gnas par bya ste/ ci nas sems
297b4(brgyad stong): can su la yang 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad la gnas par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang
297b5(brgyad stong): zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa can gzhan dag la ji ltar gnas par bya zhes/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste ston pa ji lta ba de de bzhin du byang
297b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / ston pa'o zhes de ltar gnas par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang
297b7(brgyad stong): theg pa gcig la zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang lam cig tu zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
297b8(brgyad stong): chen po 'di dag dang bsam pa 'thun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang theg pa 'thun pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ gang
298a1(brgyad stong): la 'di dag gis bslab par bya ba de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'di dag gis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab
298a2(brgyad stong): par bya'o gal te 'di dag 'dres par spyod pas gnas par 'gyur na yang / bdag gis ni 'dres par spyod pas gnas pa mi bya'o// gal te 'di dag thams cad mkhyen
298a3(brgyad stong): pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas ma 'dres par spyod cing gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
298a5(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
298a6(brgyad stong): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal
298a7(brgyad stong): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// bcom ldan 'das gal te mi 'byung ba la slob na/
298a8(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// gal te bcom ldan 'das 'gag pa ma mchis pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// de bzhin du skye ba
298b1(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / na mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
298b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po mya ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
298b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de dag la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
298b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad pa la slob na/ thams cad
298b5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la slob/ 'byung ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / nam
298b6(brgyad stong): mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ba zhes zer ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems de
298b7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed pa de zad par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor
298b8(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zad par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das zad pa ni zad pa lagaso//
299a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes/
299a2(brgyad stong): rab tu 'byed pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye bar 'gyur ram/ dngos por 'gyur ram/ dben par 'gyur ram/ 'dod chags dang bral bar
299a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ram/ na mkhar 'gyur ram/ chos su 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang
299a4(brgyad stong): gis de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhes rab tu 'byed pa mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
299a5(brgyad stong): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
299a6(brgyad stong): slob po// de bzhin nyid mi zad pa'o zhes slob bopo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa'o//
299a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob bo// stobs dag la slob po/ mi
299a8(brgyad stong): 'jig pa dag la slob po// sangs rgyas kyi chos dag la slob po// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dag la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
299b1(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar slob na/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/
299b2(brgyad stong): bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor ram/ bdud kyis rigs kyi lha dag gis rdzi bar mi nus so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/
299b3(brgyad stong): myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ myur du byang chub kyi snying po la
299b4(brgyad stong): 'dag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ rang gi spyod yul la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
299b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ mgon por 'gyur ba'i chos dag la slob po// byang chub chen po la slob po// snying rje chen po la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
299b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor ba la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems
299b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slong na/ sems can gyi khams 'bri bar yang mi bya'o zhes slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar/
299b8(brgyad stong): slob na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mi gcad par bya ba la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ bdud rtsi'i dbyings
300a1(brgyad stong): dbye'o zhes bya ba la slob po// rab 'byor bslab pa la slob po che 'di ni sems stobs zhan pas slob mi nus so// bslab pa 'di la mthu chung
300a2(brgyad stong): dus slob mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang 'di la slob pa de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi mthun mong ngo // rab 'byor de dag ni sems can
300a3(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi mgon no// gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa 'di dag ni sems can thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa thob par 'dod pa yin te/ rab 'byor
300a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas dag tu mi skye ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams
300a5(brgyad stong): mi skye/ lha ma yin gyi las su mi skye/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i nang du mi skye/ gdol pa'i gnas su mi skye/ bya ba'i rigs su mi skye/ rngon pa dang / nya ba dang / shan
300a6(brgyad stong): pa'i rigs su mi skye ste/ de lta bu'i rigs ngan pa las ngan pa/ ster ngan pa'i rigs gzhan du yang mi skye'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
300a7(brgyad stong): de ltar slob pa ni/ long bar mi 'gyur/ 'od bar mi 'gyur/ zhar bar mi 'gyur/ skyur por mi 'gyur/ theng por mi 'gyur/ zha bor mi 'gyur/ grum por mi 'gyur/
300a8(brgyad stong): blun por mi 'gyur/ lkugs par mi 'gyur/ dbang po skam par mi 'gyur/ yan lags nyams par mi 'gyur/ yan lags ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ yan lag mi sdug
300b1(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur/ mdog mi sdug par mi 'gyur/ dbyibs mi sdug par mi 'gyur/ dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshangs par mi 'gyur te/ dbang po'i
300b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbyangs phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ srog
300b3(brgyad stong): gcod par mi 'gyur/ ma byin pa len par mi 'gyur/ 'dod pas log par g.yem par mi 'gyur/ brdzun du smra bar mi 'gyur/ phra ma smra bar mi 'gyur/ tshig rtsub po
300b4(brgyad stong): smra bar mi 'gyur/ tshig kyal pa smra bar mi 'gyur/ rnab sems can du mi 'gyur/ gnod sems can du mi 'gyur/ log par lta bar mi 'gyur/ log par mtsho bas
300b5(brgyad stong): 'tsho bar mi byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ lha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye/ ngan pa'i ngang tshul can yongs su mi
300b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i chos yongs su mi 'dzin/ bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gi mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la byang chub
300b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ lha tshe rings po'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa de la yod do// rab 'byor thabs
300b8(brgyad stong): mkhas pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ bsam gtan
301a1(brgyad stong): la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur thabs mkhas pa rnal 'byor du byed do// rab 'byor byang /
301a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na/ stobs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa yong su dag par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag par
301a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
301a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos gang gis stobs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de skad ces
301a5(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
301a6(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
301a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dag mi zhum mi 'god na/ rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni ltar mi shes ma mthong
301a8(brgyad stong): bas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid mi shes ma mthong ste/ rab 'byor sems can de dag gis phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bed cing brtson 'grus
301b1(brgyad stong): brtsom ste/ bdag cag shes pas sems can rnams shes par bya'o// bdag cag mthong bas sems can rnams bstan par bya'o// zhes bslab pa 'di la bslob po// bslab
301b2(brgyad stong): pa 'di la slob po// bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stobs rnams rjes su thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
301b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag rol dag gis sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yos pa rnams kyis pha rol tu 'gro'o// rab 'byor
301b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na rdo ba med pa dang / gang na gser dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dag 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo // sa chen po la sa bon gang
301b5(brgyad stong): btsa' grangs dang / rtsa dang / sdong du ma dang / tsher ma sna tshogs kyis gang ba de lta bu ni shin du mang ngo // rab 'byor sems can gyi ris na gang dag 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
301b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'i slob pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bslab pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ni nyung ngo // sems can gyi rigs na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab
301b7(brgyad stong): pa la slob pa'i sems can de dag ni shin du mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi rigs na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i srid thob par 'gyur ba'i
301b8(brgyad stong): las yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gi/ sems can gyis ris ni mkhar gyis rgyal po'i srid thob par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/
302a1(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni shin du mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi rigs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
302a2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes lam chen po 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shin du
302a3(brgyad stong): nyung ngo // sems can gyi rigs na sems can gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin du mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi rigs
302a4(brgyad stong): na sems can gang dag brgya byin nyid du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni nyung ngo // sems can gyi rigs na/ sems can gang dag lha'i 'jig rten du
302a5(brgyad stong): skye bar 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa de dag ni shir du mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi rigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes
302a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor sems can gyi rigs na sems can gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi brlab pa la slob pa de dag ni shin
302a7(brgyad stong): du mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi rigs na sems can gang tshangs pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa de dag ni shin
302a8(brgyad stong): du nyung ngo // sems can gyi rigs na sems can gang dag tshangs pa'i 'khor du skyes par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni shin du mang ngo //
302b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du sems kyi rigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor
302b2(brgyad stong): sems can gyi rigs na byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de dag ni shin du mang ngo // rab 'byor
302b3(brgyad stong): de lta bas na sems can gyi rigs na sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor de bas kyang gang
302b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa shin du nyung ngo // rab 'byor nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ba de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'i nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni
302b5(brgyad stong): nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa nyung ba bas kyang ches nyud kyang de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
302b6(brgyad stong): chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni shin du nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ngo // rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
302b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyung ba bas ches nyung ba/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis grangs su bgrang bar 'dod pas/
302b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi
303a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gnod sems kyi tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye ba ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ the tsom dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ ser sna
303a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ ngang tshul dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye/ g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sem
303a3(brgyad stong): mi skye/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pas/ pha rol
303a4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsdus shing pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ro//
303a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su song bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jig tshogs lta
303a6(brgyad stong): ba'i nang du lta ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa la pha rol tu phyin pa
303a7(brgyad stong): thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu srog gi dbang po'i nang du dbang po thams cad 'das par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du shes
303a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro//
303b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu srog gi dbang po 'gag na/ dbang po thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
303b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad 'gag par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// yongs su gzung bar
303b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
303b4(brgyad stong): bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu slob po//
303b5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sems can du bsdus nas/ sems can de
303b6(brgyad stong): dag mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can yang mang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis sems
303b7(brgyad stong): can lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 'tsho'i bar du 'dug cing sems can de dag thams
303b8(brgyad stong): cad gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byed dang / bde ba'i mchog thams cad kyis rim gror byas na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang
304a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
304a2(brgyad stong): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chung ngu na se gol
304a3(brgyad stong): gtogs pa srid du sgom na/ de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni don de ltar che ste/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
304a5(brgyad stong): par byed pa'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
304a6(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad
304a7(brgyad stong): kyi nang na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas
304a8(brgyad stong): kyi yul rjes su thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu 'gyur ba rjes su thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas brtsod par 'dod pa dang /
304b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrogs par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rjes su thob par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
304b2(brgyad stong): chos kyi gtam byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
304b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la des gang na bslab par 'gyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis
304b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
304b5(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa la yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslab par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
304b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyis phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par bya'o// zhes mi slob bdag la nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes mi
304b7(brgyad stong): slob/ slob par mi byed/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi yon tan gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/ de la yang mi gnas so// 'di ltar rnam par spyod cing /
304b8(brgyad stong): 'gal bar mi byed de/ bdag gis nyan thos kyi yon tan 'di dag bshad par bya'o// rab tu ston par bya'o zhes slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
305a1(brgyad stong): @dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
305a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ de ma yin pa'i sbyin gnas nyan thos dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa thams cad zil gyis gnon
305a3(brgyad stong): to// de skad ces thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
305a4(brgyad stong): pa mi 'dor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
305a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa las yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du rigs par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang ring du
305a6(brgyad stong): byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen
305a7(brgyad stong): pa nyid ni thob byed pa'o snyam du sems shing de ltar shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par mi shes
305a8(brgyad stong): la/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su bsdad
305b1(brgyad stong): pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor gal te de ltar spyod na/ byang chub
305b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ myur ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/
305b3(brgyad stong): nyi shu lnga pa'o// // bam po nyi shu gcig pa'o//
305b4(brgyad stong): / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa nyid kyang / sems can thams cad 'di ltar zil gyis gnon na/
305b5(brgyad stong): nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa lta ci smos/ sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
305b6(brgyad stong): 'jug pa de dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin/ sems can de ni 'tsho ba yang legs par mtsho ba yin/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
305b7(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa lta ci smos/ sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni re bar
305b8(brgyad stong): bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man d+ha ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas me tog snyim par thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
306a1(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor nas/ tshig tu yang 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa gang dag gis/
306a2(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
306a3(brgyad stong): de dag gis 'tshal ba dang / yongs su bsams pa dang / yongs su bzung ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams 'byor par gyur cig de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongs su
306a4(brgyad stong): rdzogs par gyur cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang byung gi chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/
306a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog par
306a6(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i gang zag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
306a7(brgyad stong): zhugs pa las/ slar ldog par sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye ste/ 'khor ba na mchis pa'i sdug bsngal rnams mthong bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
306a8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu smon lam rgya cher bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag lta bu 'di dag dang ldan pa dag/ ci nas bdag rgal bas re
306b1(brgyad stong): dbyukA byung bas dbyung bar bgyi//
306b2(brgyad stong): sems can bsgral bar bgyi/ grol bas dgrol bar bgyi/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par bgyi'o// zhes de de ltar sems bskyed/

306b5(brgyad stong): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la yang rjes su yid rang ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog
306b6(brgyad stong): pa'i chos nyid la yang rjes su yid rang bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces
306b7(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka ri rab ri'i rgyal po srang grangs su btsal ba'i tshad ni bzung
306b8(brgyad stong): bar nus kyi ke'u shi ka rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// ke'u shi ka yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
306b9(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams srang grangs su bcal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyis/ ke'u shi ka rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni bzung bar
307a1(brgyad stong): mi nus so// ke'u shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su bcal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka rjes su yid rang /
307a2(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// yang ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su bcal ba'i tshad
307a3(brgyad stong): ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// ke'u shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen
307a4(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su btsal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
307a5(brgyad stong): bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol

307a7(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de lta bu la bsod nams legs mI nyan/ ma 'tshal ba rjes su yid rang ba'i mi sems pa de dag bdud

308a7(brgyad stong): mtho rigs su skye bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag gis sems can grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad bde bar

310a8(brgyad stong): no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zab mo la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zab mo la yang spyod la/
310b1(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar don de mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan
310b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa cang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
310b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar gang mngon sum du bgyid pa de nyid kyang mi dmigs/ gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de yang mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'di skad bshad pa
310b4(brgyad stong): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi zhum mi 'gong / mi skrag mi dngang / dngang par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
310b5(brgyad stong): spyod do snyam du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to// /
310b6(brgyad stong): snyam du de ltar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgyang rib du bsrings so snyam
310b7(brgyad stong): du yang mi sems na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni 'di snyam du bdag kha cig dang ni nye'o kha cig dang
310b8(brgyad stong): ni ring ngo snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha' la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub
312a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang
312a2(brgyad stong): nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312a3(brgyad stong): pa la rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di snyam du sgyu ma byed pa ni bdag dang nye'o// skye bo'i tshogs
312a4(brgyad stong): gzhan 'dus pa 'di dag ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu la rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad
312a5(brgyad stong): du de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang / bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
312a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo // snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
312a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan na 'di snyam du/ dmigs
312a8(brgyad stong): pa gang gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de ni bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang /
312b1(brgyad stong): rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
312b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/
312b3(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam
312b4(brgyad stong): par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul pa bgyi ba gang gi slad du sprul pa'i bgyi ba de yang bgyid la/ sprul pa de yang
312b5(brgyad stong): rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bgyi ba gang gi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa bsgom pa bgyi ba de yang bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312b7(brgyad stong): pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing mkhan mkhas pa 'am/ shing mkhan gyi slob ma yis shing las
312b8(brgyad stong): bgyis pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyi 'phrul 'khor sbyar bar bgyis nas/ de bgyi ba gang gi don du bgyis pa bgyi ba de bgyid kyang / shing gi tshogs de ni rnam par
313a1(brgyad stong): rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shing gi tshogs de la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
313a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bgyi ba gang gi don bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bgyi ba yang bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313a3(brgyad stong): de rnam par rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus
313a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po
313a6(brgyad stong): la spyod pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kye ma byang chub
313a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni snying po ma yin pa la spyod pa'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang
313a8(brgyad stong): po rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sngon par bsgrub pa dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha
313b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / de ltar spyod kyang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed pa'i
313b2(brgyad stong): sems can de dag ni phyag bya ba yin te/ gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid spyod kyang chos nyid mngon sum du mi byed na/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems
313b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams dga' bar byed pa yin par bya'o snyam mo de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po de dag gi sems kyi
313b4(brgyad stong): rtog pa sems kyi shes nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' de mngon sum du mi byed pa'i byang chub
313b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' ba spyod pa yin gyi/ lha'i bu rnams gang sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// snyam
313b6(brgyad stong): du go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' byed pa yin mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/ sems can rnams ni dben pa'i phyir sems
313b7(brgyad stong): can de dag kyang shin du yang dag par med de/ yang dag par med pas/ dmigs su med de/ de ltar 'dal bar bya ba rnams shin du yang dag par med de/ dmigs su medado//
313b8(brgyad stong): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sems can dag 'dul bar bya'o snyam nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhag
314a1(brgyad stong): so// lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams gdul bar bya'o// snyam du sems so// lha'i bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkhar dben pa'i phyir/
314a2(brgyad stong): sems can rnams dben par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang sems can rnams yang dag par med cing dmigs su med pa
314a3(brgyad stong): rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos na/ rnam grangs 'dis dka' ba byed pa yin no// lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos par bya'o snyam du sems dpa' ni nam
314a4(brgyad stong): mkha' dang brtsod par bya'o snyam du sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa 'di/ sems can de dag kyang shin
314a5(brgyad stong): du dmigs su med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs te/ de yang sems can dben pa'i phyir de lta bur rig par
314a6(brgyad stong): bya'o// de ltar gdul bar bya ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dben par rig par bya'o// gal te 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa
314a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zham par ma gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i
314a8(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir gzugs dben par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can dben pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
314b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa dben par rig par bya'o// de ltar sems can dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bar du dben par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar chos thams
314b2(brgyad stong): cad dben pa nyid du blta'o// lha'i bu dag gal te de ltar chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi byed
314b3(brgyad stong): na/ 'di ltar zham par mi byed pa 'di'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
314b4(brgyad stong): la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zham par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis
314b5(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa'i slad du zhum par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
314b6(brgyad stong): dben pa nyid du bshad pa zhags par mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang zham par
314b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang gis chos gang zhum par gyur pa'i chos de yang dmigasu ma mchis so//
314b8(brgyad stong): gal te de skad du brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi 'gyur/ yid mi gsod/ yid gsod par mi 'gyur/
315a1(brgyad stong): kun du zhum par mi 'gyur/ yang dag par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par ma bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha/
315a2(brgyad stong): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i
315a3(brgyad stong): bdag por bcas pa dang / dbang ldan dang bcas pa rnams thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'dod
315a4(brgyad stong): dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod napas
315a5(brgyad stong): 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems cad rnams dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha ji snyed
315a6(brgyad stong): yod pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'jig rten gyis khams
315a7(brgyad stong): grangs med tshad dpag tu med pa dag tu med pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar bzhags te/ mtsho zhing bzhes
315a8(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzag
315b1(brgyad stong): te/ rab 'byor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa de dag la phan 'dogs shing dgongs par mdzad do// rab
315b2(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dang / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
315b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams phan 'dogs shing dgongs par mdzad de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
315b4(brgyad stong): chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// de la bdud dam bdud kyi rigs gzhan dag gis byed par byed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi
315b5(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur la/ bdud de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud kyi sde mngon par sprul kyang /
315b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor bdud sdig can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa de la/ bla na med
315b7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bye bar mi nuso// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bdud sdig can
315b8(brgyad stong): du gyur pa lta zhog go// rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur la bdud
316a1(brgyad stong): sdig can de dag re res kyang bdud kyi sde de snyed sprul kyang / rab 'byor bdud sdig can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
316a2(brgyad stong): kyis dgongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor byang chub
316a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis thub pa dka' ba yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/
316a4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ des sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba yin/ des chos thams cad stong par brtags pa yin te/ rab 'byor chos de gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang
316a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyis rigs kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
316a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis po gzhan dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems
316a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis po gzhan dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi rigs kyis thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
316a8(brgyad stong): ji skad du smras pa bzhin byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni
316b1(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi rigs kyis lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/
316b2(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyang nye bar sems par 'gyur nye bar 'ongs nas kyang dri bar bya ba sems/ yongs su dri bar sems/ bsnyen bkur bya bar sems so// de la spro ba yang bskyed
316b3(brgyad stong): par byed de/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ 'di lta ste shes rab
316b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa la spyod pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod de ltar gnas pa de nyid gnas shing de ltar spyod na/ sems can mgon
316b5(brgyad stong): med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur/ sems can gzhi med pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur/ sems can gnas med pa rnams kyis gnas su 'gyur/ sems can skyabs med
316b6(brgyad stong): pa rnams kyis skyebs su 'gyur/ sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur/ sems can gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur/ sems can rten
316b7(brgyad stong): med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur/ sems can dmus long rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes lha'i bu de dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la spro ba
316b8(brgyad stong): bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'dis gnas
317a1(brgyad stong): pa de dag gnas la 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
317a2(brgyad stong): yongs su bskor/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du 'dar cing bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
317a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de dag gi ming
317a4(brgyad stong): dang / rus dang / gzugs dang / kha dog rnams yongs su brjod cing chos ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la ched du brjod pa/ yang ched du brjod
317a5(brgyad stong): do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
317a6(brgyad stong): gtsug phud can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gang dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
317a7(brgyad stong): mi bskyod pa'i drung na/ tshangs par spyod pa dag gi ming dang / rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa
317a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / da ltar nga nyid sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
317b1(brgyad stong): dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ming dang /
317b2(brgyad stong): rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol
317b3(brgyad stong): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod
317b4(brgyad stong): cing chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
317b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing / chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa
317b6(brgyad stong): yang ched du brjod pa yin no// rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang /
317b7(brgyad stong): rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs rnams yongs su brjod nas/ chos 'chad cing ched du brjod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom
317b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams sam/ gtogs de ma lags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
318a1(brgyad stong): gzhan gyi ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs rnams yongs su brjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par mdzad pa/
318a2(brgyad stong): ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams ma rtogs par/ sangs rgyas
318a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gang gi ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa'i gang zag
318a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa yod do// yang de dag gang zhe na/ gang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
318a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i drung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su slob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rjes su slob pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/
318a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam pa ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ming dang /
318a7(brgyad stong): rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
318a8(brgyad stong): rin po che tog gi byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu slob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rjes su spyod pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang
318b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs
