346b2(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir mi ldog pa yin no// rig kyi bu byang chub sem dpa' se sa dpa' chen po
346b3(brgyad stong): chos 'phag de'i drung du song shig dang / de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyuraro// rig kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas dge ba'i bshes gnyer yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
346b4(brgyad stong): rdzog pa'i byang chub yang dag pa ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng stod pa/ yang dag pa dga' bar byed pa yino// rig kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar tshol ba
346b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu stsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma chad par song shig dang / ring por mi thog par shes rab kyi pha rol
346b6(brgyad stong): du phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rtag tu dus thos nas dga' mgu yid rang rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur
346b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gi phog na/ yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang dag sdug bsngal 'di la thar bar byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa dag gis/
346b8(brgyad stong): nam rnyed snyam seMs dpa' de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par byed cing / chos gang yang
347a1(brgyad stong): thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i skyes bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sem pa ma gtogs chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub
347a2(brgyad stong): sem dpa' sems dpa chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ phyogs thams cad la mi gan pa'i 'du shes bskyes nas/ tinge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thaMd ngos
347a3(brgyad stong): nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
347a4(brgyad stong): chos thar 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang /
347a5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mi shes pa sil ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md bdag gi dngos
347a6(brgyad stong): po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thas kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes
347a7(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / sem can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas
347a8(brgyad stong): pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang 'bru sna tshog sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin rnam par blta ba zhes
347b1(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thob zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting /

347b7(brgyad stong): dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med
347b8(brgyad stong): par lta ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / lta bar 'gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya

350b2(brgyad stong): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/
350b3(brgyad stong): yon tan thams cad kyis pha rol du phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can
350b4(brgyad stong): mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/ sems can gzhan
350b5(brgyad stong): dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de
350b6(brgyad stong): dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ mi su 'dod nga su nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar bur yongs bsgrib so// /
350b7(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang gi tshe/ bdag nyo bar ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs cig tu song nas/ 'chi ma phyung ste 'di ltar bdag gi
350b8(brgyad stong): lus brtsongs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya snyam nas/ lus nyo bar yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni/
351a1(brgyad stong): du s+ya/ thob pa ngan pa thob bo snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
351a2(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gis lus yongs su btang bas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam/ ma yin pa byang chub
351a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du bdag gis sad par bya'o// snyam te/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub
351a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ga der song ste/ 'od nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
351a5(brgyad stong): 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la 'chi ma phyung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/
351a6(brgyad stong): lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas/ de la'ang 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya ba
351a7(brgyad stong): dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gis lus nyo ba yang ma snyed do// snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des
351a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu nga la mis ni bya ba med kyis/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag
351b1(brgyad stong): dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag nga la dgos te rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis
351b2(brgyad stong): bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag gis lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol
351b3(brgyad stong): du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// snyam nas/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u
351b4(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no// zhes byas
351b5(brgyad stong): pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu
351b6(brgyad stong): mtshon rnon po thogs nas/ lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so// brla g.yas pa sha med par gtogs nas/ rus pa cog tu rtsigs pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong
351b7(brgyad stong): dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du bla sha med par gtogs/ rus pa cog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthod
351b8(brgyad stong): nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la/ bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshongs/
352a1(brgyad stong): @dban masu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen btogatu drug la ba der song ste/ byin nas byang chubs pas dpa' sems dpa' na po//
352a2(brgyad stong): t+ya du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di sa bu'i nam dag byed snying dang / thag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci shig bya// rtag tu dus bu ma de la
352a3(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas
352a4(brgyad stong): 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyis bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di
352a5(brgyad stong): ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bskur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig
352a6(brgyad stong): 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bum rigs kyi bu de ni gang langs slab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / rabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur
352a7(brgyad stong): te/ de la ngas spangs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyis rten du 'gyur
352a8(brgyad stong): lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byed bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dad/
352b1(brgyad stong): 'od zer mnga' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms dang / mi 'jigs pa'i dang / so so yang
352b2(brgyad stong): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag
352b3(brgyad stong): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
352b4(brgyad stong): pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thaMd la kun du bgo sha
352b5(brgyad stong): bya'i/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul
352b6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag 'di lta bu re re'i
352b7(brgyad stong): phyir/ skal pa gang ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed du lus btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rig
352b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskur stir bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ bI dUr+ya 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog
353a1(brgyad stong): gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gong sa ma/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/
353a2(brgyad stong): bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dang / sdug sngal dag ma byed cig/ kho mo yang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phar
353a3(brgyad stong): ga la ba der dong ste/ bdag dang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya bya'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par bya'o// de nas lha'i
353a4(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyis lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i mdun na
353a5(brgyad stong): 'dag nas/ 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yid dam la la rten pa ni legs legs/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
353a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu rdzogs pa
353a7(brgyad stong): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyis kyi bu ngal snying dang / khrag dang / rkang gis byas pa med
353a8(brgyad stong): kyis khyod sod pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi mchog gsol/ rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog ji lta bu cig sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa/ brgya byin nas sangs rgyas kyis
353b1(brgyad stong): chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di nga'i yul du rgyu rab ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan
353b2(brgyad stong): 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan gsal cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu des smras pa/ bdag gis lus yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i
353b3(brgyad stong): gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gi
353b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
353b5(brgyad stong): lung stan cing / bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo ba med par mkhyen ce na/ badren pa de dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis lus sngon bzhin du 'gyur cig
353b6(brgyad stong): ces byas pa dang / skad cig yud tsam zang gcig nyid la sangs rgyas rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ byang chub sems
353b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu da'i sa lus sngon bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems
353b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la lan glan par spobs pa ma bskyed nas/ de nyid tshong dpon gyis bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
354a1(brgyad stong): rtag tu du la 'di skad ces sba so// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ kho mo'i khyim gang na yod pa der dong ngo // kho mos pa ma las nor blangs te/
354a2(brgyad stong): des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mchog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bskur stir bya ba yin no//
354a3(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo der 'grogs te/ de rang gi khyim ga la yod pa der dong ngo // de nas
354a4(brgyad stong): tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas// pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yang yum gser dang / dadug dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
354a5(brgyad stong): 'dug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdungs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dang / bdag la stsol
354a6(brgyad stong): cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang bdag cag 'grog
354a7(brgyad stong): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo de'i ga
354a8(brgyad stong): mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smraso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dra de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de da lta ga na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs
354b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu deng lha'o bskol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di
354b2(brgyad stong): lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab
354b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang dag bskur stir bgyi bar 'tshal bas/
354b4(brgyad stong): de'i lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/ de sngal bsngal zhing yang mi bde nas mi dag par sems so// zhes mchis te des nga'i lus tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo bar ma rnyed do zhes
354b5(brgyad stong): bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu du des
354b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod bye ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags de la yang bskur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de
354b7(brgyad stong): las rag las pa 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// khyod mi 'dod de/ nga mchod
354b8(brgyad stong): sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dgongs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bus des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no// zhes smras nas/
355a1(brgyad stong): mtshon rnon po thogs pa bdag gis lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs brla'i sha gtogs te/ rus pa bcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/
355a2(brgyad stong): rus pa dang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzigs pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du bdag nyid lan
355a3(brgyad stong): tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /
355a4(brgyad stong): des bdag la 'di skad ces mchis te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang pa sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor ci yang med
355a5(brgyad stong): mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
355a6(brgyad stong): la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o zhes mchis na/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/
355a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa 'am/ yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ des bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyis yon tan bsam gyis
355a8(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes mchis te/ sangs rgyas
355b1(brgyad stong): kyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba chen po rab tu skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i
355b2(brgyad stong): gnas la spro bar bgyid pa shin du dga' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya
355b3(brgyad stong): chen po dag yod la ci'i phyir chos la mchod par mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la ston lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad
355b4(brgyad stong): bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
355b5(brgyad stong): la bkur stir bya ba'i nor mang po dag khyod la byin no// bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchis so//
355b6(brgyad stong): bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongasu brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa yang dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o//
355b7(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis na/ yab yus gyis bkor kyi phung po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
355b8(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o// // bam po nyi shu bzhi pa'o//
356a1(brgyad stong): / de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i bka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa lags na/ khyod
356a2(brgyad stong): de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab/ 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa sems can thams cad la bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/
356a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i bka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang ba'i bu mo nged dang khyod lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen
356a4(brgyad stong): po chos 'phags lta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro// nged kyang 'gro ba'i go skabs phye zhig/ de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la
356a5(brgyad stong): mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gis yang bar chad mi bgyid do// de nas tshong
356a6(brgyad stong): dpon gyi bu mo ngas shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// brgyan gyis brgyan pas me tog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang /
356a7(brgyad stong): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ gser dang dngul gyis me tog thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam
356a8(brgyad stong): pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / shing rta gcig tu
356b1(brgyad stong): zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs de dag gis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas pa ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyogs ga la ba de log su
356b2(brgyad stong): dong ste/ mthar gyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ rgyang ring po zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna tshogs bdun rnam
356b3(brgyad stong): par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim
356b4(brgyad stong): pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor zhing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos
356b5(brgyad stong): gang ba/ grong bar gyi srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du btams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btag
356b6(brgyad stong): ba/ legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor/
356b7(brgyad stong): brgya phrag mang po dang / brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/
356b8(brgyad stong): dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse cig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par bzhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs
357a1(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mi chab po snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs
357a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du shing rta las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo
357a3(brgyad stong): la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der
357a4(brgyad stong): dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/
357a5(brgyad stong): tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu rtsegs pa de'i dra bas bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag
357a6(brgyad stong): sgron me'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi gnod dbul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir//
357a7(brgyad stong): a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang bu rtsegs pa de'i dbus na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khri gcig btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgros
357a8(brgyad stong): bzhi bzhag nas/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bI dur+ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshog/
357b1(brgyad stong): rnam pa tha dad 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu
357b2(brgyad stong): brtsegs pa de bkod pa med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / lha'i tsan
357b3(brgyad stong): dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la mthor mngon par mthor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor
357b4(brgyad stong): ba mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
357b5(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod stong phrag du ma dang / rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog ka san d+ha ra ba dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dag
357b6(brgyad stong): gis mthong zhing mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyen 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir brdung / de skad ces smras pa dang /
357b7(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang
357b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslab pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ yon
358a1(brgyad stong): @tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob pa yin na/ khyod mi shes/
358a2(brgyad stong): sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
358a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni khang bu brtsegs pa
358a4(brgyad stong): 'di'i nang na/ gser gyi glegs bam la bI durar+ya zhu bas bris byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rgya rim pa bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/
358a5(brgyad stong): nged kyis khyod la snyan par bka'/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang 'tshogs nas
358a6(brgyad stong): de dag gi me tog dang / phreng ba'i chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
358a7(brgyad stong): ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa'
358a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya ba'i phyir chas shas kyi bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog dang /
358b1(brgyad stong): bdugs pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
358b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
358b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdugs pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdags
358b4(brgyad stong): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis gtor mngon par gtor to// mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me
358b5(brgyad stong): tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa bzhig tu gyur to// gser dang dngul gyis me
358b6(brgyad stong): tog dag gtor nas/ na mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug
358b7(brgyad stong): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
358b8(brgyad stong): chen po chos kyi rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di rdzu 'phrul che zhing
359a1(brgyad stong): 'di ltar mthu che zhing / 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa na/
359a2(brgyad stong): yang rdzu 'phrul che rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ ci 'dra bar 'gyur snya mo//
359a3(brgyad stong): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ de dag tham
359a4(brgyad stong): cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag pa 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gsheg
359a5(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ka pa spyod pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
359a6(brgyad stong): 'phags kyis gang gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'di lta bu'i chos mngon
359a7(brgyad stong): sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur stir byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha
359a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la
359b1(brgyad stong): ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs
359b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog shig ces smras so// de nas
359b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyis bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par byas/
359b4(brgyad stong): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
359b5(brgyad stong): kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
359b6(brgyad stong): la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol shing 'brog dgon par
359b7(brgyad stong): byin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gi sgra de thos nas/ shar phrog
359b8(brgyad stong): ga la ba der log su mchis nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid gcig tu mchi bar gyi/ su la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed
360a1(brgyad stong): par gyur pa ma dris so snyam ste/ der bdag yid mi bde zhing shin du gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin/
360a2(brgyad stong): du gdungs pas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi/ gzhan du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid gcig tu mchis par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha
360a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di su las nyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba/ sgra de las ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs zhig byung ste
360a4(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
360a5(brgyad stong): 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ ji ltar
360a6(brgyad stong): btams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la
360a7(brgyad stong): bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa
360a8(brgyad stong): phyogs de nas mi skrod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa ni ting 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na/ phyogs bcu'i
360b1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs phyung bar mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni
360b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyi kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// zhes de bzhin
360b3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la legs par bstan nas/ mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin
360b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag gis gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhad snyam mo// de nas bdag gi yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa'
360b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas
360b6(brgyad stong): shin du bslab lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de/ bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam
360b7(brgyad stong): nas/ rigs kyi bu la de bzhin gshegs pa de gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud par bdag 'dren/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de
360b8(brgyad stong): dag byon pa dang / bzhad par 'tshal cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhad pa bdag la bshad
361a1(brgyad stong): du gsol// rtag tu ngu'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
361a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas ma
361a3(brgyad stong): byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de
361a4(brgyad stong): skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gsheg
361a5(brgyad stong): pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba
361a6(brgyad stong): med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin/
361a7(brgyad stong): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu namakha'i
361a8(brgyad stong): khams la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ na mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/
361b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu de
361b2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid la ni gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu
361b3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nyi mas gdugs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas der chu btung ngo zhes de
361b4(brgyad stong): dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'od/ gang du song chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi
361b5(brgyad stong): rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ gang du song rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/
361b6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyi smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/
361b7(brgyad stong): de chu ni rang bzhin gyi ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs
361b8(brgyad stong): pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par chags par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chags pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon
362a1(brgyad stong): pa'am/ bzhud par rtog de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dperan/
362a2(brgyad stong): skyes bu chu med pa chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o//
362a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am bzhed pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na//
362a4(brgyad stong): sgyu ma'i sprul pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ bung bu chung gi tshogs sam/ 'gro ba med do rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
362a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
362a6(brgyad stong): gcig gas/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig
362a7(brgyad stong): mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong / rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/
362a8(brgyad stong): gang du bzhud rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam na chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te/ yang dag pa ma lagaso// chos 'phags
362b1(brgyad stong): kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungaso// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de/
362b2(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi la pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming mtshan gyi sku
362b3(brgyad stong): dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin
362b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhad par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par 'dong ba 'dod par 'gyur ba'o// de dag
362b5(brgyad stong): thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs
362b6(brgyad stong): kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu las de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes/ yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes
362b7(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshes
362b8(brgyad stong): pas chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid du rab tu shes so de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par mi
363a1(brgyad stong): rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur
363a2(brgyad stong): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin
363a3(brgyad stong): gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs
363a4(brgyad stong): 'tshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i tshe dag byung ste
363a5(brgyad stong): de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen dang gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ rten nas byung ba'o// rin po che dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
363a6(brgyad stong): gang du yang mi phod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na/ rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen de dag med na rin po che rab tu 'byed pa yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
363a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sku mngon par grub par yang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
363a8(brgyad stong): 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las
363b1(brgyad stong): byung ba yin no// de nas kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grung bar 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par
363b2(brgyad stong): yang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pi wang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang mi 'ongs 'gag pa gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ rten nas byung ba/
363b3(brgyad stong): rgyu las rag las pa/ rkyen las rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste pi wang gi khog pa las brten lpags pa la brten/ rgyud la rten/ shing bu la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i
363b4(brgyad stong): rtsol ba las brten nas/ pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de yed pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / rgyud las yang ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung /
363b5(brgyad stong): mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung med kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgra grag la sgra de 'gags pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi
363b6(brgyad stong): bu sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gdung yongs su 'grub pa yang rgyal rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba da mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gi
363b7(brgyad stong): ma yin/ rkyen gcig gi ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbyed pa ma yin te/ rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa
363b8(brgyad stong): las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang / gang du yang mi bzhad de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon
364a1(brgyad stong): / pa dang bzhud pa de ltar lta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par bgyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad
364a2(brgyad stong): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad chos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing //
364a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang bzhad pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yos pa
364a4(brgyad stong): chen po 'byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul
364a5(brgyad stong): rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad dkrogs shing spa skong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtsa dang /
364a6(brgyad stong): shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der log su 'dud par gyur to// rus ma yin pa'i
364a7(brgyad stong): me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang phab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
364a8(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad zer te/ rig kyi bu khyod kyi 'thus der bdag cag gis
364b1(brgyad stong): kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/ gang 'jigs tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thoso zhes mdzer to//
364b2(brgyad stong): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sa g.yos
364b3(brgyad stong): pa byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon/ mi bzhad pa 'di khyod kyis dris te
364b4(brgyad stong): kho bos ston pas/ srog chags brgya stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / khrag khrig phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
364b5(brgyad stong): bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnam la/ chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
364b6(brgyad stong): rtag tu du dga' ba dang rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur to// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa
364b7(brgyad stong): med pastan 'di bris pa/ sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
364b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir the tshom mi za'o// bdag ni the tshom med
365a1(brgyad stong): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyuraro// snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dag dang ldan pas ta la
365a2(brgyad stong): bdun tsam du na mkha' la 'phag so// ta la bdun tsam du 'dug ste bdag na mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du
365a3(brgyad stong): sems/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems kyis shes nas/
365a4(brgyad stong): de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir gyis shig/
365a5(brgyad stong): 'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthus/ srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can tha~Md kyi phyir ji ltar
365a6(brgyad stong): spro bar byed pa de lta bur/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro ba med pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
365a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor te/ rab tu gtor
365a8(brgyad stong): nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par dga' ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod/
365b1(brgyad stong): kyi rim gro dang / zham 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo// des bdag gi lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
365b2(brgyad stong): kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dag dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
365b3(brgyad stong): ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyed la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag mthong bar gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig
365b4(brgyad stong): tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ bkur stir bgyid/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa'
365b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/
365b6(brgyad stong): nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyod ngas blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas/ khyod kyis rjes su
365b7(brgyad stong): 'thun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag par bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon
365b8(brgyad stong): gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rtag lnga brgya yang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
366a1(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags la phul lo// rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongasu longs spyod pa'i khyod la 'bu'o// de nas rna'i dbang po
366a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu leg so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang
366a3(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// yongasu gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes
366a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas mnyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis byang chub sems
366a5(brgyad stong): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rlag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
366a6(brgyad stong): mkhas pas yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing ta lnga
366a7(brgyad stong): brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la sbyin no// de nas byang chub sem
366a8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bstan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nung par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
366b1(brgyad stong): rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'am nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gis mi tshal 'di ni mi lags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'/
366b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag la 'greng ba dang / 'chags pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyi gnas par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang
366b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du/ ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin grangs med
366b4(brgyad stong): dpag tu med pa dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang lo bdun
366b5(brgyad stong): gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / ro la rkang pa 'am/ ma skyes te gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
366b6(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags nam langs par 'gyur/ bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas/ chos ston
366b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams nas/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyis legs par byugs nas/ me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems
366b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de ltar legs par byugs par bya'o// snyam tshong dpon gyi
367a1(brgyad stong): bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyi dus 'das par byed do// bya ba zad kyang de'i rjes
367a2(brgyad stong): su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun nas ting nge
367a3(brgyad stong): 'dzin de las langs ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyuraro zhes grags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lha'i sgra de tho
367a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / dga' 'gu yid rangs/ rab tu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyag nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyi
367a5(brgyad stong): spras pa bsham so// de nas bu mo de dag gis bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der gtang ngo //
367a6(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs der chag chag btab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems
367a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus chu rnyed nas/ yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa
367a8(brgyad stong): de mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun du chu btsal kyang ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/
367b1(brgyad stong): bdag gi lus phug la khrag gi sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367b2(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gis gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod
367b3(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhi 'khor ba dag na/ bdag gis lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su/ zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
367b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gis lus kun du phug nas/ rang gis khrag gi sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug chag chag btab po// byang chub sems dpa' sems
367b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag
367b6(brgyad stong): gi sa sa phyogs de chag chag pa btab te/ gang dag de la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyis bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par ma gyur par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367b7(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du
367b8(brgyad stong): chos 'dod pa dang / ji tsam du yid dam la brten pa ni/ ji tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
368a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdus
368a2(brgyad stong): bsngal dpag tu med pa las thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to// snyam du sem so// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i can
368a3(brgyad stong): dan gyi phye mas chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri ngas pa dang / brgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshang bas dris khyab po//
368a4(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dril 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam
368a5(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su 'chol ba bla med pa'o// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
368a6(brgyad stong): de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so//
368a7(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi bstan
368a8(brgyad stong): ni bting/ sa phyogs ni phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
368b1(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po dang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems
368b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu lnga'i me tog man d+ha ra ba 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu man d+ha ra ba bkram par gyis
368b3(brgyad stong): shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dag pa la yang gtor cig ces/ des de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba khal stong
368b4(brgyad stong): byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram par bya'o// me tog kha cig
368b5(brgyad stong): gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang /
368b6(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin de las lang te/ chos kyi bstan gang na yod pa der 'ong nas/ bstan bting ba 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun gyis ltas nas/ shes rab kyi
368b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 'di
368b8(brgyad stong): lta ste dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
369a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos dzad
369a2(brgyad stong): dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad
369a3(brgyad stong): rlom sems med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sem su med pa nyid do// chos thang khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do//
369a4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thar mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thaMd skye
369a5(brgyad stong): ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// na mkha'
369a6(brgyad stong): mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// brgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas
369a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// na mkha' rtogs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
369a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
369b1(brgyad stong): shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i kham
369b2(brgyad stong): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// na mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med
369b3(brgyad stong): pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos
369b4(brgyad stong): thad dmig su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmig su med do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
369b5(brgyad stong): 'jig pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid// chos tha~Md bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
369b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa
369b7(brgyad stong): nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos tha~Md rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
369b8(brgyad stong): khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thaMd ro cig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thaMd skye ba med pa zhes bya ba/
370a1(brgyad stong): tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i/
370a2(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
370a3(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams
370a4(brgyad stong): dang / me'i kham dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / na mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
370a5(brgyad stong): dang / chos tha~Md ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thad kyi rang bzhin dmig su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam
370a6(brgyad stong): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thaMd byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos theng bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur te//
370a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug bcu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
370a8(brgyad stong): byin pa brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
370b1(brgyad stong): tu dus/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag bcu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyog dang /
370b2(brgyad stong): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /
370b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo //
370b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ chos ston pa dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
370b5(brgyad stong): mdun gyis ltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab
370b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gar skyes pa thad du yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ skyes pa thams cad du yang gang dang gang du/ sangs rgyas
370b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur pa de dang de dag tu bskyed de/ mtha' ni rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'di dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// des mi khom
370b8(brgyad stong): pa thams cad ni spangs/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrub so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'di kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
371a1(brgyad stong): chen po rnams kyi/ thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa yin par rig par bya// rang 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha~Mng mkhyen pa'i ye shes
371a2(brgyad stong): thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha
371a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su bzung ba'i phyir zungs shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
371a4(brgyad stong): rab tu ston cing / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/
371a5(brgyad stong): kun chub par bya// mngon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal/
371a6(brgyad stong): ba legs par bris nas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na za' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /
371a7(brgyad stong): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ mchod par bya/ brjod par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdam ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
371a8(brgyad stong): bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ston pa lag so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis
371a9(brgyad stong): ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid
371b1(brgyad stong): du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas te/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo da ltar nga bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes pa'i
371b2(brgyad stong): sku 'di nyid khyod kyis dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / ri mor byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byos shing / kun dga' bo ci nas shes rab kyi
371b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyed la lan gnyis gsum du yongasu gtad do// rjes su gtad do// rjes su yongs su gtad
371b4(brgyad stong): do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin
371b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
371b6(brgyad stong): dang / rab tu 'don par bya ba dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
371b7(brgyad stong): bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byeba'i
371b8(brgyad stong): mor byed/ mchod par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur
371b9(brgyad stong): byed pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
372a1(brgyad stong): stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /
372a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang /
372a3(brgyad stong): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung /
372a4(brgyad stong): pa la mngon par bstod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i
372a5(brgyad stong): le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das ma
372a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stod pa rdzogs s+ho// bkra shis/
372a7(brgyad stong): zhus dag
